sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ntho e itseng kapa motho ya itseng ya fapaneng le tlwaelo, kapa se lebeletsweng, hangata ka tsela e makatsang, e tshwenyang, e fosahetseng kapa e kotsi. / Baamehi dipatlisisong tsena ba ile ba fetisetswa ho setsebihadi ka lebaka la ho se tlwaelehe ha ditekanyetso tsa tsebe e bohareng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: selo goba motho yo a fapanego go tlwaelo, setlwaedi goba letetšwego, ka mokgwa wa go makatša, go tshwenya, go se dumelelege goba go ba kotsi. / Batšeakarolo mo go thuto ye ba ile ba šupetšwa go setsebi sa tsebe, nko le mogolo ka lebaka la dikelo tša bokagare bja tsebe tšeo di sa tlwaelegago.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: sa tshwane le mo go tlwaelegileng kgotsa mo go lebeletsweng, gantsi e le ka tsela e e bonalang e kete e a gakgamatsa, e a tshwenya, ga e a siama kgotsa e kotsi / Palo ya dikoromosomo ga e a tlwaelega.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: intfo noma umuntfu lowehlukile kuloko lokwetayelekile, noma lokulindzelekile, imvamisa ngendlela lebukeka ngalokungakatayeleki, lekhatsatanako, lekabi noma leyingoti. / Labahlanganyeli balesifundvo bandluliselwa kudokotela lokhetsekile lobukene nekugula kwendlebe, imphumulo nemphimbo mayelana nekukalwa kwencenye yendlebe lesemkhatsini.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshithu kana muthu ane a si fane na zwo ḓowelwaho, zwa nga misi kana zwo lavhelelwaho, kanzhi zwi vhonala zwi zwiswa, zwo khakhea kana zwi tshi ofhisa. / Vhashelamulenzhe kha risetshe (ṱhoḓisiso) vho rumelwa ha makone wa zwa nḓevhe, ningo na mikulo nge vha vha na ṱhaluwo/phambuwo dza mielo ya bako ḽa nḓevhe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xin'wana kumbe un'wana loyi a hambaneke eka leswi tolovelekeke, leswi tivekaka swinene kumbe leswi languteriweke, ngopfungopfu hi ndlela leyi langutisekaka yi ri leyi pheweke, leyi vilerisaka, leyi hoxekeke kumbe leyi nga nghozi. / Vatekaxiave eka dyonzo va rhumeriwile eka xitivinkulu xa ndleve, nhompfu na kholokholo hikokwalaho ka mimpimo leyi nga tolovelekangiki ya ndleve ya le xikarhi.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: okhunye okuhlukileko kunalokho okujayelekileko, okuvamileko nanyana okulindelweko, esikhathini esinengi ngokwendledlana erarako, etshwenyako, embi nanyana enobungozi. / Abahlanganyeli esifundweni balayelwe kusolwazi wendlebe, wepumulo kanye nomphimbo ngesimanga sokuhluka ngokungakandi kweemedo zendlebe engaphakathi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: into okanye umntu ohlukileyo kwinto eqhelekileyo, yesiqhelo okanye elindelweyo, ngamaxa amaninzi ngendlela engaqhelekanga, exhalabisayo, engalunganga okanye enengozi. / Abathathi-nxaxheba kuphononongo bathunyelwa kwingcali yendlebe, impumlo nomqala ngokusekelwe kwimilinganiso engaqhelekanga yomphakathi wendlebe.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: yinto ethile noma umuntu othile owehlukile kulokho okwejwayelekile, okuvamile noma okulindelekile, imvamisa lokhu kuba ngendlela esuke yehlukile, ikhathaza noma inobungozi. / Ababambiqhaza kulolu cwaningo bedluliselwa kungoti owelapha indlebe, ikhala kanye nomphimbo ukuze ayokala ubungako obungajwayelekile endlebeni.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: not allowing for other opinions / Her view on the morality of people’s actions is absolute.

ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kungavumeli leminye imibono / Umbono wakhe ngekutiphatsa kwebantfu uphelele.

nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: asivumeli eminye imibono / Umbono wakhe ngezenzo zemikghwa emihle yabantu ngewamambala.

zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukungavumeli imibono yabanye / Umbono wakhe ekuziphatheni kwezenzo zabanye abantu uphelele.

ven: u ita uri zwi vhe zwa vhukuma
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: make something absolute / The danger of people who follow one particular ideology is that they absolutise the ideas in it and consequently accept no other ideas as valid.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: iets absoluut maak / Die gevaar van mense wat een spesifieke ideologie aanhang, is dat hulle die idees daarin verabsoluteer en gevolglik geen ander idees as geldig aanvaar nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho etsa hore ntho e itseng e se fetohe / Kotsi ke hore batho ba latelang mohopolo o qollehileng ha ba fetohe mehopolong eo mme kahoo ha ba amohele mehopolo e meng jwalo ka nnete.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira selo gore se felelele / Kotsi ya batho ba go latela kgopolo ye tee ke gore ba dira dikgopolo tša bona gore di felelele gomme mafelelong ga ba dumele dikgopolo tše dingwe go ba tša nnete.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: dira gore selo e nne se se sa fetogeng / Kotsi ya batho ba ba latelang kgopolo nngwe e e rileng ke gore ba tsepisa megopolo mo go yone mme ka ntlha ya moo ba bo ba sa tlhole ba bona dikgopolo tse dingwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kwenta lokutsite kungatsekise / Ingoti yebantfu labalandzela umcondvo munye lotsite kwekutsi bangatsekisa umcondvo lokuko bese bagcina ngekungamukeli leminye imicondvo njengaleliciniso.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ita uri tshithu tshi vhe tsha vhukuma / Khombo ya vhathu vha tevhelaho pfunzotherwa ndi uri vha ita uri mihumbulo ire khayo i vhe ya vhukuma na u dzulela u ṱanganedza uri a huma miṅwe mihumbulo yo dziaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku endla swin’wana swi hetiseka. / Khombo ra vanhu lava va landzelelaka vonelo rin’we ro karhi hi leswaku va cinca mavonelo eka wona naswona hi ku landzelela swo karhi ku nga amukeli man’wana mavonelo tanihi ya nkoka.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuqinisekisa kwamambala kwento / Ubungozi bababntu abalandela umbono munye okhethekileko kukuthi baqinisekisa ngokwamambala imibono leyo bese-ke bangasathatha eminye imibono ezwakalako.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: yenza into iphelele / Ingozi yabantu abalandela iinzululwazi ngengcinga enye ethile kukuba baphelelelisa izimvo kuyo kuze okulandelayo bangamkeli ezinye izimvo njengezilungileyo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza okuthile kuphelele / Ingozi yabantu abalandela umbono othile wukuthi benza leyo mibono ibe ngephelele futhi ekugcineni bangamukeli eminye imibono njengefanele.

ven: u dzulela u vha zwa vhukuma
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: attitude that meaning is immutable and things are therefore unconditionally valid / The absolutism in her approach to religious issues scares many people.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: houding dat betekenis onveranderlik en dinge dus onvoorwaardelik geldig is / Die absolutisme in haar benadering tot geloofskwessies skrik baie mense af.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: boikutlo bo hlalosang hore dintho tse ding di ke ke tsa fetolwa mme kahoo ke nnete e sa fetoheng / Boikutlo ba hae bo sa fetoheng ha ho tluwa ditabeng tsa bodumedi bo tshosa batho ba bangata.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: mokgwa wa gore tlhalošo e feletše gomme ka gona dilo ke tša nnete go felela / Maatla ao a feletšego mo go laoleng ditaba tša bodumedi a tšhoša batho ba bantši.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: boikutlo jwa gore bokao jwa selo ga go na jaaka fa bo ka fetolwa, mme ka ntlha ya moo dilo di ntse fela jaaka di ntse ga di ka ke tsa fetolwa / Tsela e a gatelelang dilo ka yone mo dikgannyeng tsa bodumedi e tshosa batho ba le bantsi.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: indlela lacabanga ngayo kutsi inshokutsi ayinogucuka kantsi netintfo ngalokunjalo tisemtsetfweni ngalokungenambandzela / Kungatsekisa kundlela lachuba ngayo tindzaba tenkholo yesabisa bantfu labanyenti.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: kusedzele kwa uri ṱhalutshedzo a i shandukisei nahone zwenezwo zwithu zwo tea hu si na na zwiṅwe. / U dzulela u vha zwa vhukuma kha kusedzele kwavho kha zwithu zwa vhureleli zwi shavhisa vhathu vhanzhi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: vonelo ra leswaku nhlamuselo yi nga pfuki yi cincile na swilo hikokwalaho ka ku kala swipimelo swo ka swingari swa nkoka. / Vuheri eka maendlelo ya yena eka timhaka ta vukhogeri ma chavisa vanhu vo tala.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: yindlela yokuthi ihlathululo iyakholwakala begodu ngalokho-ke izinto zithathwa njengeziliqiniso ngaphandle kombandela / Ukuqinisekisa kwamambala endleleni ayisebenzisako kezekelo ithusa abantu abanengi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: uluvo lokuba intsingiselo ayinakuguqulwa kwaye ke ngoko izinto zichaneke ngokungenamqathango / Ulawulo olusezandleni zomntu omnye kwindlela ajongana ngayo nemiba yezenkolo yoyikisa abantu abaninzi.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isimo sokuthi incazelo ingengaphenduki nokuthi izinto ziba ezingalungile ngokungenamibandela / Ukuba ngokuphelele endleleni yakhe yezindaba zenkolo kwethusa abantu abaningi.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: find something so interesting that you do not pay attention to anything else / She was completely absorbed in her book and didn’t hear a word I said. / to hold someone’s attention or interest completely / He recently finished the work that had absorbed him for almost two years. / to take new information into the mind and learn and understand it / Without any prior knowledge or a printed text at our disposal, it was difficult to absorb all the information he presented on nuclear fission.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: nuwe inligting in die verstand inneem en dit leer en verstaan / Sonder enige voorafkennis of ’n gedrukte teks tot ons beskikking was dit moeilik om al die inligting wat hy oor kernsplyting aangebied het, te absorbeer.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho tshwarella kgahleho kapa thahasello ya motho ka ho phethahala. / O ne a kgahlilwe ke buka ya hae mme ka hona ha a ka a utlwa letho leo ke neng ke le bua.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go tšea tshedimošo ye mpsha le go e nokela ka monaganong le go ithuta le go ikwišiša. / Ka ntle le tsebo ya peleng goba temana ye e gatišitšwego yeo e lego pele gago, go be go le boima go tšea tshedimošo ka moka yeo e bego e hlagišwa ka ga fišini ya nyuklea.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go fitlhela sengwe se go gogela jaana mo e leng gore ga o bone tse dingwe tsotlhe / Buka ya gagwe e ne e mo gapile thata jaana mo e leng gore ga a utlwa sepe se ke neng ke se bua.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kufaka lwatiso engcondvweni uphindze ulufundze futsi uluvisise. / Ngaphandle kwelwati lwaphambilini noma lokubhaliwe lebesingakusebentisa kwaba lukhuni kutsi sifake engcondvweni lonkhe lwatiso lwatiswa lwekakhiswa kwenukliya.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u kokodza tshoṱhe dzangalelo kana lutamo lwa muthu. / O vha o tou kungea tshoṱhe nga bugu lwe a si pfe na tshithihi tshe nda amba.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku koka nyingiso wa un'wana kumbe ntsakelo wakwe hi ndlela leyi hetisekeke. / A kokiwile nyingiso wakwe hinkwawo hi buku yakwe hikokwalaho a nga twangi ni rito na rin'we leri ndzi ri vuleke.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukudosa abantu ekutheni bakulalele kikho koke okutjhoko. / Bekadoswe ngilokho akufundako encwadini akhange ezwe nokuthi ngithini.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuthatha ulwazi olutsha ulufake engqondweni uze ulufunde yaye uluqonde. / Ngaphandle kolwazi naluphina lwangaphambili okanye into ebhaliweyo esinayo, bekunzima ukufunxa lonke ulwazi olunikelwa ngokucandeka kwenyukliya.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: thola into ethakazelisa kakhulu kangangokuthi awunaki enye into / Wayegxile kakhulu encwadini yakhe futhi akazwanga nelilodwa igama engilishilo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: a short summary / The abstract of the article summarises the main findings. / a short summary / main findings. / existing as an idea, but not as a physical thing / Love is regarded as an abstract idea. / existing as an idea, but not as a physical thing. / Love is regarded as an abstract idea. / physical thing. / Love is regarded as an abstract idea. / summary of the major aspects of an academic paper / The abstract at the beginning of a long academic article is useful if you want to know if the article is relevant to you. / summary of the major aspects of an academic paper / academic article is useful if you want to know if the article is relevant to you. / thing / Love is regarded as an abstract idea. / to infer abstract meaning from something / The knowledgeable reader can abstract certain universal truths from a good literary text.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: abstrakte betekenis uit iets aflei / Die kundige leser kan sekere universele waarhede uit ’n goeie literêre teks abstraheer.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: mohopolo o leng teng, empa o sa tshwarehang / Lerato le tadingwa e le mohopolo o sa tshwareheng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go kwešiša tlhalošo ya kakaretšo go tšwa go se sengwe / Mmadi yoo a nago le tsebo a ka akaretša dinnete tše dingwe tša go felela go sengwalwa sa go ithuta se sebotse.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshobokanyo ya dikarolo tsa konokono mo kgannyeng e o ithutang ka yone / Ntlha kgolo mo tshimologong ya kgang e telele e o ithutang ka yone e a thusa fa o batla go itse gore a kgang eo e a go ama kgotsa jang.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: lokukhona, kepha hhayi lokuphatsekako. / Lutsandvo lutsatfwa njengemcondvo longabonakali.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshithu tsho dziaho. / Lufuno lu pfi ndi khumbulelwa.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku kumbetela nhlamuselo ku suka eka swin’wana. / Muhlayi loyi a nga ni vutivi byo tala a nga ha humesa ntiyiso wun’wana emisaveni hinkwayo ku suka eka xitsariwa lexi tsariweke kahle.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: okuba khona njengombono, kodwana ingasi njengento ephathekako. / Ithando lithathwa njengombono ocatjangwako.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: into ekhoyo njengoluvo, kodwa hayi njengento ephathekayo. / Uthando luthathwa njengoluvo olungaphathekiyo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isandulela sezingxenye ezinkulu zephepha lezemfundo / Isandulela esisekuqaleni kwe-athikili ende yezemfundo siwusizo uma ufuna ukwazi ukuthi i-athikili iyakufanela yini.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: (the process of formulating) general ideas from concrete data / The thematic motifs of a text are an abstraction, ideas that readers are able to infer from the concrete textual data.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: (die formulering van) algemene idees uit konkrete gegewens / Die tematiese motiewe van ’n teks is ’n abstraksie, idees wat lesers uit die konkrete teksgegewens kan aflei.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: (tshebetso ya ho bopa) mehopolo e akaretsang ho tswa ho datha e tiileng / mohopolo o sa tshwareheng, mehopolo eo babadi ba kgonang ho utlwisisa moelelo wa datha e tiileng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: (tshepetšo ya go dira) dikgopolo tša kakaretšo go tšwa go data ya nnete / Dibopego tša tematiki tša sengwalwa ke kakaretšo, dikgopolo tšeo babadi ba kgonago go di kwešiša go tšwa go data ya dingwalwa tša nnete.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: (thulaganyo ya go tlhaola) dikgopolo tse di akaretsang mo tshedimosetsong e e buang ka kgang nngwe e e rileng / Tsela e se se kwadilweng se rulagantsweng ka yone ke tsela ya go tlhomolola kgopolo e e rileng, dikgopolo tse babadi ba ka kgonang go di tlhaloganya fa ba bala tshedimosetso nngwe e e buang ka kgang nngwe e e rileng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: (inchubo yekwakha) umcondvo lotayelekile kulwati loluphatsekako / Inhloso yengcikitsi yembhalo ingumcondvo, umbono bafundzi labakhonako kuwuniketa inshokutsi kumniningwane wembhalo lophatsekako.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: (maitele a u sika) mihumbulo nyangaredzi u bva kha data i kwameaho / Thero ngudwa dza tshibveledzwa ndi muṱalukanyo, mihumbulo ine vhavhali vha kona u wana u bva kha data ya tshibveledzwa i kwameaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: (endlelo ra ku vumbiwa) mavonelo yo katsa hinkwaswo ku suka eka datara yo tika. / Ku xaxameta hi ku ya hi nhlokomhaka mahungu ya xitsariwa i nkomiso, mavonelo lama vahlayi va kotaka ku kumbetela ku suka eka datara ya xitsariwa xo tika.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: (ihlelo lokwakha) imibono evulekileko ukusukela elwazini eliphathekako / Umnqopho wommongo womtlolo ngikho okuhlathulula ubujamo bomtlolo, imibono lapho abafundi bathola khona ilwazi lezomtlolo eliqinisekisiweko.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: tekanyo eo ntho e itseng e ka dumelwang / Ho sa natswe thahasello eo ditsebi tse ngata tsa fisiksi di bileng le tsona ka thiori ya quantum ya Niels Bohr, Einstein o ile a belaela ho amoheleha ha yona.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: maemo ao selo se kgolwago goba go dumelelwana ka sona / Le ge bafisika ba bantši ba na le kgahlego ya teori ye bohlokwa ya Niels Bohr, Einstein o gonona go ba maleba ga yona.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: selekanyo se sengwe se ka dumelwang kgotsa ga dumalanwa ka sone / Lefa baithutasaense ba le bantsi ba amogetse kgopolo ya ga Niels Bohr ya gore go na le tsela e e rileng e dilo di amanang ka yone le maatla, Einstein ene o ne a sa bone gore eo ke kgopolo e e ka amogelegang.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: lizinga lokutsite kungakholwa noma kuvunywe ngalo / Ngaphandle kwemdlandla wetati temvelo letinyenti ngethiyori yekhwantamu yaNiels Bohr, Einstein ukungabatile kwamukeleka kwayo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshikalo tshine tshithu tsha nga kholwa kana u tendiwa / Naho vhorasaintsi vhe na mafulufulu kha Thyeori ya Vho Niels Bohr ya ndeme, vho Einstein vho timatima u ṱanganedza hayo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xiyimo lexi eka xona nchumu wu nga tshembiwaka kumbe ku nga twananiwaka eka wona. / Handle ka vuhiteki bya vativasayense vo tala va swa ntumbuluko eka thiyori ya antswiso wo nyawula ya Niels Bohr, Estein u kanakana vuamukelo bya kona.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: indlela into engakholwakala ngayo nofana kuzwane ngayo / Nangaphandle kokuthi amafiziksti amanengi anekareko embonweni kaNiels Bohr oqakathekileko, u-Eistein uyangabaza ukuwamukela.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ubungakanani into ekunokukholwa kuyo kwaye kuvunyelwana ngayo / Nangaphandle kwenzondelelo yamagcisa efiziki ngethiyori yobungakanani bento efunekayo kaNiels Bohr, uEinstein wakuthandabuza ukwamkeleka kwayo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: izinga into ethile engakholelwa noma kuvunyelwane ngalo / Naphezu komdlandla wososayensi abaningi mayelana ne-quantum theory ka-Niels Borh, u-Einstein wangabaza ukwamukeleka kwayo.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: fa o amogela kgotsa o dumela gore sengwe se siame kgotsa se boammaaruri / Tsela e Einstein a nyatsang kgopolo ya ga Niels Bohr ya go amana ga dilo dingwe le maatla ka yone e fapaana thata le tsela e baithutasaense ba le bantsi ba amogetseng kgopolo eno ka diatla tsoopedi ka yone.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: loko u amukela kumbe u tshemba leswaku xin’wana xi lulamile kumbe ntiyiso. / Vonelo ra nkoka ra Einstein eka thiyori ya antswiso wo nyawula wa Niels Bohr ri le ku tikeni ku hambana eka ku hiseka ka vativasayense va swa ntumbuluko ku amukela eka swona.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku amukeriwa ka ntiyiso kumbe vukona bya swin’wana / Ku amukela ka khamphani ka swihoxo swa swa timali swi tlhontlhile ku sandziwa hi matimba.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho dumella kapa ho amohela ntho e itseng, esita le haeba o sa e rate / Ba ne ba bua taba e se nang thahasello dipolotiking le e amohelwang, kapa e senye ke fanyehilwe ke bolaodi.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho fumana ntho e itseng kapa mosebetsi o thata le mekutu ka nako e telele / Phumano ya degree ke ketsahalo ya bohlokwa bophelo ba moithuti e mong le e mong.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ndlela ya madyondzelo kumbe ya makumelo ya xikili. / Dyondzo eyunivhesiti a ko va ntsena makumelo ya vutivi lebyintshwa; kambe swi tlhela swi va hi mayelana ni ku hluvukisa mikoka yo karhi na mikoka ya munhu ya le ndzeni.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho fapanya mehopolo kapa boitshwaro e le ho sebetsana le boemo bo botjha ka katleho. / Dithuto tsa yunivesithi di lokela ho kgema le ditlhoko tsa mebaraka.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go fetola dikakanyo tsa gago kgotsa maitsholo a gago go samagana le seemo se sešwa ka katlego. / Dikhose tsa yunibesithi di tshwanetse go tshwanela ditlhokego tsa lefatshe la kgwebo le kgwebisano.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuntjintja imibono yakho noma indlela yekutiphatsa kute kutsi ubukane nesimo lesisha ngemphumelelo. / Tifundvo tasenyuvesi tifanele kutsi tetayele, tihambisane netidzingo tasemakethe.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u shandula kuhumbulele kana vhuḓifari hu u itela u kona u livhana na nzulele ntswa. / Khoso dza yunivesithi dzo tea u shandulelwa ṱhoḓea ntswa dza maraga wa mishumo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku cinca mianakanyo kumbe matikhomelo ya wena ku endlela ku tirhana ni xiyimo lexintshwa hi ndlela leyi humelelaka. / Tikhoso ta le yunivhesiti ti fanele ku tekelela swidingo swa ndhawu ya le makete.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukutjhugulula imibonwakho nanyana indlela yokuziphatha ukuze uqalane nobujamo obutjha ngepumelelo. / Amakhosi weyunivesithi kufanele akhambisane neendingo zendawo yomsebenzi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukutshintsha izimvo okanye ukuziphatha kwakho ukuze ujongane nemeko entsha ngempumelelo. / Izifundo zeyunivesithi kufuneka zilungele iintswelo zemalike.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukushintsha imiqondo yakho noma ukuziphatha kwakho ukuze ukwazi ukubhekana nesimo esisha ngempumelelo. / Izifundo ezenziwa enyunivesi kufanele ukuthi zihlangabezane nezidingo zezindawo zokukhangisa ngemisebenzi.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: change or adjustment to meet a new goal or adapt to a new environment / The doctoral student must make adaptations to his first chapter, because certain aspects are not congruent with the wording in his title.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: verandering om aan ’n nuwe doel te beantwoord of by ’n nuwe omgewing aan te pas / Die doktorale student moet aanpassings maak aan sy eerste hoofstuk, omdat sekere aspekte nie met die bewoording in sy titel ooreenstem nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: phetoho kapa tokiso ho fihlella sepheo se setjha kapa ho amohela tikoloho e ntjha / Moithuti wa doktereiti o tlameha ho etsa dikamohelo kgaolong ya hae ya pele, ka hobane dikarolo tse ding ha di nyallane le mantswe a sehlooho sa hae.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: phetogo goba mpshafatšo go fihlelela nepo ye mpsha goba fetogela go tikologo ye mpsha / Moithuti wa bongaka o swanetše go dira diphetogo go kgaolo ya gage ya mathomo, ka gore dikarolo tše dingwe ga di swane le mantšu a thaetleng ya gagwe.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go fetola boemo gore o kgone go fitlhelela mokgele o mosha kgotsa o fetogele kwa boemong jo bosha / Moithuti yo o ithutelang bongaka o tshwanelwa ke go dira diphetogo dingwe mo kgaolong ya gagwe ya ntlha, ka gonne dikarolo dingwe ga di tsamaisane le mafoko a a a dirisitseng mo setlhogong.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuntjintja noma kufanelisela kuhlangabetana nenhloso lensha noma / Umfundzi lowenta tebudokodela kufanele ente kufanelisela kusahluko sakhe sekucala, ngoba letinye tincenye ativumelani nemagama kusihloko sakhe.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshanduko kana nzudzanyo u itela u swikelela ndivho ntswa kana u ḓiḓowedza vhupo vhuswa / Mutshudeni wa vhudokotela u tea u khwinisa ndima yawe ya u thoma, ngauri zwiṅwe zwiteṅwa a zwi elani na maipfi a ṱhoho yawe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku cinca kumbe vuhundzuluxo byo fikelela xikongomelo xintswa kumbe ku cinca ku va ndhawu yintswa / Muchudeni wa swa vudokodela u fanele ku cinca eka xiyenge xa yena xo sungula, hikuva swiphemu swin'wana a swi yelani na matirhiselo ya marito eka nhlokomhaka ya yena.

nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: e tlaleleditšwe go seo se bego e letetšwe goba seo go dumelelanwego ka sona / Direkwa ntle tša tlaleletšo tša nama ya kgomo ya Amerika di beakantšwe go fihlelela nyakego yeo e golago.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: e e tsentsweng mo godimo ga e e neng e lebeletswe kgotsa mo godimo ga e go dumalanweng ka yone / Go rulagantswe gore go romelwe dinama tse dingwe tsa kgomo tsa Amerika mo nageng gore di kgone go lekana batho ba ba oketsegang ba ba di batlang.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kungetwe kuloko bekulindzelekile noma kuloko bekuvunyelwene ngako / Lenye inyama yenkhomo yase- Amerika lengeniswa emaveni ihlelelwe kuhlangabetana netidzingo letiphakeme.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwo engedzwaho kha zwi lavhelelwaho kana zwo tendelaniwaho khazwo / Zwiṅwe zwiṱunḓwa zwa ṋama ya kholomo ya Amerika zwo pulaniwa u swikelela ṱhoḓea ine ya khou aluwa.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku engetela eka leswi languteriwaka kumbe ku nga twananiwa ehenhla ka swona / Ku engetela ku tundza nyama ya homu eAmerika swi kunguhatiwile ku fikelela ku tlakuka ka ku laviwa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: kungezelelwa kilokho okulindelweko nofana kilokho okuvunyelwene ngakho / Inyama engezelelweko evela e-Amerika ihlelelwe ukuhlangabezana neendingo ezikhuphukako.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: okongezwe koko bekulindelekile okanye kwinto ebekuvunyelwene ngayo / Ukungeniswa ngaphakathi elizweni okongezelelekileyo kwenyama yenkomo yaseMelika kucetyelwe ukuba kuhlangabezane nemfuno enyukayo.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: malebana le go nna le dikeletso kgotsa maikutlo a mabedi a a thulanang ka nako e le nngwe / Ke pelopedi ka kgang eno, ka gonne ke tlhaloganya melemo le masula a yone. Ga se ka metlha batho ba tlhaloganyang tsela e ke leng pelopedi ka yone.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: an error in chronology in which a person or thing is placed in the wrong historical time / It’s an anachronism when a soldier in a WWII film talks to his fiancé on his cellphone.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: phoso tlhahlamanong ya nako eo motho kapa ntho e behileng sebakeng se fosahetseng nakong ya histori / Ke anakronisimi ha lesole filiming ya WWII le bua le kgarebe ya lona ka selefounu.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: phošo ka tatelano moo motho goba selo di bewago nakong ya histori yeo e fošagetšego / Ke selo sa tlhago ge lešole mo filiming ya WWII le bolela le moratiwa wa lona mo selefounong ya lona.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go baya motho kgotsa sengwe mo tiragalong e e sa tsamaisaneng le nako ya yone mo ditiragalong / Ga go tsamaisane le nako ya teng fa lesole mo baesekopong ya Ntwa ya Bobedi ya Lefatshe le bua le lekgarebe la gagwe ka selulafouno.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: liphutsa ngekulandzelana lapho umuntfu noma intfo ibekwa esikhatsini semlandvo lesingasiso / Kusidzala uma lisotja kulifilimu i- WWII likhuluma nesitsandvwa salo ngamakhalekhukhwini.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: vhukhakhi ha vhurangelani hune muthu kana tshithu tsha vheiwa kha tshifhinga tshi si tshone tsha ḓivhazwakale / Ndi khanedzano ya vhurangelani musi ḽiswole ḽi re kha fiḽimu ya WWII ḽi tshi amba na musidzana ane ḽa khou ṱoḓa u mu mala kha luṱingothendeleki.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kumbe nchumu lowu wu vekiweke eka nkarhi wa swa matimu yo hoxeka. / I swa xikhale loko socha eka filimu ya WWWII ri vulavula na xigangu xa rona hi selifoni ya rona.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: iphoso ngokulandela ngendlela umuntu nanyana into ibekwe ngayo ngokwesikhathi esiphosakeleko somlando / Kuyiphoso ngokomlando bonyana ijoni efilimini le- WWII lisebenzise ufunjathwako ukucoca nomkalo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: impazamo malunga nenzululwazi ngamaxesha eziganeko apho umntu okanye into ibekwa kwixesha elingachanekanga lezembali / Yimposiso malunga nexesha lesiganeko xa ijoni kwibhanyabhanya ye-WWII lithetha nalowo liza kutshata naye ngeselula yalo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: iphutha ekunembeni kokulandelana kwezenzakalo lapho umuntu noma into ibekwa esikhathini esingalungile emlandweni / Kuyiphutha kuya ngokunemba kwesikhathi lapho isosha efilimini Yempi Yezwe II lixoxa nentombi yalo kumakhalekhukhwini.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: incompatible with the time in which something happens / The soldier’s cellphone conversation in the film about World War II is anachronistic. Such an anachronistic scene detracts from the authenticity of the events.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ha ho nyallane le nako eo ntho e itseng e etsahetseng ka yona / Moqoqo wa lesole ka selefounu filiming ya Ntwa ya II ya Lefatshe o anakronisitiki. Pontsho e jwalo e anakronisitiki e kgelosa nneteng ya diketsahalo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: Fapanego le nako yeo selo se diregago / Poledišano ya selefoune ya lešole mo filiming ya Ntwa ya II ya lefase e fapana ka tatelano. Tiragalo yeo ya go fapana ka tatelano e fokotša go tšwa bonnete bja ditiragalo
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: sa dumalane le nako e tiragalo e diragetseng ka yone / Ga go tsamaisane le dinako tsa teng fa lesole le bua ka selulafouno mo baesekopong ya ditiragalo tsa Ntwa ya Bobedi ya Lefatshe. Tiragalo eno e e sa tsamaisaneng le se se neng se direga ka nako eo e dira gore tiragalo eno e bonale e se boammaaruri.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: akuhambisani nesikhatsi intfo leyenteka ngaso / Inkhulumo yamakhalekhuwini welisotja efilimini cishe ngesikhatsi Semphi Yemhlaba II yakudzala Sehlo sakudzala siyaphuma ebucinisweni betehlo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwi sa elani na tshifhinga tshine zwa khou itea ngatsho / Nyambedzano ya luṱingothendeleki ya ḽiswole kha fiḽimu nga ha Nndwa ya Ḽifhasi ya Vhuvhili i hanedzana na vhurangelani. Luṱa ulwo lune lwa hanedzana na vhurangelani lu xedza vhungoho ha zwiwo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku hambana ngopfu hi nkarhi laha swin'wana swi humelelaka / Mbulavurisano hi selifoni wa socha eka filimu ya mayelana ni Nyimpi ya Misava ya Vumbirhi i swa xikhale. Muxaka lowu wa xiyenge xa xikhale wu sandzaka ku suka eka ntiyiso wa timhaka.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukungakhambisani nesikhathi salokho okwenzekako / Imicoociswano yejoni ngofunjathwako efilimini elimayelana nePi yesiBili yePhasi kuyiphoso ngokomlando. Isehlakalo esiyiphoso ngokomlando lesi siphazamisa isiqinisekiso sezehlakalo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: akungqinelani nexesha eyenzeka ngalo into / neMfazwe yeHlabathi ye-II yimposiso malunga nexesha lesiganeko. Umboniso onemposiso malunga nexesha lesiganeko onjalo uphazamisa ukunyaniseka kwezihlo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: akuhambisani nesikhathi okuthile okwenzeka ngaso / Ingxoxo kamakhalekhukhwini yesosha efilimini emayelana Nempi Yezwe II inephutha kuya ngokunemba kwesikhathi. Isiqephu esinjalo siphazamisana nokunemba kwezenzakalo.

nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: iimbalo ezingakahleleki / Isitjhidelaniso esifaneleko sentengo kuzokuba yi- R90.

tso: leswi simekiweke ehenhla ka nhlawulo wa nkatsakatso wa mbuyelelo
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: based on individual discretion or preference / Their reasons for appointing him as captain seemed to be completely arbitrary since he had never excelled at the sport. / based on individual discretion or preference / captain seemed to be completely arbitrary since he had never excelled at the sport.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: gebaseer op individuele oordeel of voorkeur / Hulle redes vir sy aanstelling as kaptein blyk heeltemal arbitrêr te wees, aangesien hy nog nooit in dié sport uitgeblink het nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: itshetlehile ka kgetho ya motho ka mong; ha e bonahale e theilwe ka lebaka. / Mabaka a bona a ho mo kgetha e le sebapadi se seholo a bonahala e le a boikgethelo ka botlalo ka hobane ha a so ka a ipaka hore o na le tsebo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka boikgethelo bja motho goba kgetho; go sa theiwa mo go lebaka. / Mabaka a bona a go mo kgetha bjalo ka mokapotene go bonala e le ka boithatelo ka ge a sa ka a phadima mo dipapading.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ikaegile ka fa motho ka nosi o bonang ka teng kgotsa o ratang ka teng; mme ga go bonale e kete go ikaegile ka lebaka. / Mabaka a bone a go mo thapa jaaka kapotene e ne e kete a dirilwe gotlhelele ka boithatelo gonne ga a ise a tsamaye a gaise mo metshamekong.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngekuya ngekubona kwemuntfu noma kutsandza; ngekungamiseli esizatfwini. / Sizatfu sabo sekumbeka abe ngukabuteni sibonakala singakamiselwa ndzawo ngalokuphelele ngoba akatange asabe sihlabane kulomdlalo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tsini na u vha tshonetshone kana tsha vhukuma. / Kamara i anganyelwa u vha tshikwea mithara dza fumimbili – a huna mielo yoneyone.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: leswi simekiweke ehenhla ka mavonelo ya munhu ha un'we ha un'we kumbe ntsakelo wakwe; kambe ku nga ri leswi simekiweke ehenhla ka xivangelo xo karhi. / Swivangelo swa vona swa ku n'wi thola tanihi kaputeni swi langutisekile swi ri leswi simekiweke ehenhla ka nhlawulo wa nkatsakatso wa mbuyelo hi ndlela leyi hetisekeke tanihiloko a nga kalanga a kombisa vuswikoti bya xiyimo xa le henhla swinene eka swa mitlangu.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: kumayelana nokusebenzisa izinto ngendlela umuntu anyula ngakhona; kungatjhejwa isizathu. / Iinzathu zabo zokumqatjha njengokaputeyini ziqaleka zenziwe ngokuzilawula ngombana akakaze asebenze kuhle kwezemidlalo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokusekelwe kubulumko okanye ukhetho lomntu ngokuzimeleyo; hayi ngokungathi kusekelwe kwisizathu. / Izizathu zabo zokumalatha njengomphathi ingathi zezokuzithandela ngokupheleleyo njengoko engazange agqwese kwezemidlalo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okususelwe ekucabangeni komuntu oyedwa; okungabonakali kugxile emcabangweni. / Izizathu zabo zokumqoka kwabo ukuthi abe ngukaputeni zibukeka zinokuchema okukhulu ngoba akakaze nje adlale kahle selokhu kwathi nhlo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to mediate between parties / My father had to get an arbitrator to arbitrate so he and his neighbour could settle their dispute.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: as bemiddelaar tussen partye optree / My pa moes ’n arbiter kry om te arbitreer sodat hy en sy buurman hul geskil kon oplos.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho kena dipakeng bakeng sa batho ba babedi ba tsekisanang / Ho ile ha hlokahala hore ntate a fumane mokena-dipakeng ho kena dipakeng pakeng tsa hae le moahisani hobane ba sa kgone ho rarolla tsekisano ya bona.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: mmoelanyi gare ga mekgatlo / Papa o ile a swanela ke go wetša moahlodi go ahlola gore yena le moagišane wa gagwe ba fediše diphapano.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go baakanya kgotlhang mo gare ga ditlhopha tse pedi / Rre o ne a tshwanelwa ke gore a batle motsereganyi gore a tle go tsereganya gore ene le moagelani wa gagwe ba kgone go baakanya kgotlhang ya bone.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kulamula emkhatsini wemacembu / Babe kwadzingeka atfole umlamuleli atolamula khona yena namakhelwane wakhe bangalungisa kungevani kwabo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u haṱula vhukati ha vhathu vhavhili / Khotsi anga vho tea u wana muhaṱuli uri a haṱule u itela uri vhone na muhura wavho vha kone u dzudzanya khanedzano.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku kondletela exikarhi ka vanhu vambirhi / Tata wa mina u fanele ku kuma mulamuri ku lamula leswaku yena na muakelani wa yena va ta kota ku lulamisa nkwetlembetano wa vona.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukulamula hlangana nabantu ababili / Ubaba wafanela ukuthola umlamuli ukulamula ukuze yena nomakhelwana wakhe bangaqeda umbango.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukulamla phakathi kwamaqela / Utata wam kufuneke ukuba afumane umlamli ukuba alamle ukuze yena nommelwane wakhe bayiphelise imbambano yabo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukulamula phakathi kwamalungu / athole umlamuli ukuze alamule impikiswano ephakathi kwakhe nomakhelwane wakhe.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: mediated between parties and decided by an arbitrator or referee / The arbitrated settlement resulted in the acceptance of the new contract between my father and his neighbour.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: wat tussen partye bemiddel en deur ’n arbiter of skeidsregter beslis is / Die arbitrêre skikking het gelei tot die aanvaarding van die nuwe kontrak tussen my pa en sy buurman.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho kena dipakeng tsa batho ba babedi ba tsekisanang le ho etsa qeto ke mokena-dipakeng kapa referi / Tharollo e kenweng dipakeng e qeteletse ka kamohelo ya kontraka e ntjha pakeng tsa ntate le moahisani wa hae.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: Boelantšwe gare ga mekgatlo gomme ya phethwa ke moahlodi goba mosepdiši / Kwano ye e ahlotšwego e dirile gore go be le kamogelo ya kontraka ye mpsha gare ga papa le moagišane waa gagwe.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: motsereganyi a baakanya kgotlhang mo gare ga batho ba babedi / Tumalano e e tseregantsweng e ne ya felela ka gore rre le moagelani wa gagwe ba konteraka e ntšhwa.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kulanyulwe emkhatsini wemacembu kwancunywa ngumlamuli noma lohlulelako / Sivumelwano lesilanyuliwe sente kuvunywe ikontileka lensha emkhatsini wababe wami namakhelwane wakhe.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u haṱula vhukati ha vhathu vhavhili na muhaṱuli kana mulamuli / Khaṱhulo yo haṱulwaho yo bveledza u ṱanganedza khonṱhiraka ntswa vhukati ha khotsi anga na muhura wavho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku lamula exikarhi vanhu vambirhi na ku boha hi mulamuri kumbe n’watipempe / Ndhawu leyi lamuriweke yi hetelele yi va eka ku amukeriwa hi ntwanano wuntshwa exikarhi ka tata wa mina na muakelani wa yena.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: -lamulile hlangana kwabantu ababili godu isiqunto sithathwe mlamuli nofana usofengwana / Isiqunto esithathiweko ngokulamula kukwamukela isivumelwano esitjha hlangana kwakababa nomakhelwana wakhe.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ulamle phakathi kwamaqela kwaye kwenziwa isigqibo ngumlamli okanye ngumgwebi / Ekuvunyelwene ngako ekulamleni kukhokelele ekwamkeleni ikontraki entsha phakathi kukatata wam nommelwane wakhe.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: kulanyulwe phakathi kwamalungu futhi kunqunywe ngumlamuli noma ngunompempe / Impikiswano elanyuliwe yahilela ekwamukeleni inkontilakhi entsha phakathi kukababa wami nomakhelwane wakhe.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: a neutral person who mediates between parties out of court and help to settle a dispute / The arbitrator in the wage dispute case should look at both employee’s and employer’s arguments as objectively as possible.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: ’n neutrale persoon wat buite die hof tussen partye bemiddel en ’n geskil help besleg / Die arbiter in die loongeskilsaak behoort so objektief moontlik na beide die werknemers en die werkgewers se pleidooie te kyk.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: motho ya sa nkeng lehlakore ya kenang dipakeng tsa batho ba babedi ba tsekisanong kantle ho lekgotla la dinyewe ho rarolla tsekisano ya bona / Mokena-dipakeng tsekisanong ya nyeweng ya tsekisano ya moputso o tlameha ho sheba mabaka a mohiruwa le mohiri bakeng sa maikutlo a kgonahalang.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: motho yo a sa tšeego lehlakore yoo a boelanyago mekgatlo ye mebedi ka ntle ga kgorotsheko gomme a thuša go rarolla kgakgano / Moahlodi mo tiragalong ya kgakgano ya megolo o swanetše go lebelela bobedi mošomi le mongmošomo ntle le go tšea lehlakore ka moo go kgonegago.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: motho yo o sa tseyeng letlhakore yo o baakanyang kgotlhang mo gare ga ditlhopha tse pedi ba se mo kgotlatshekelo mme a thusa go rarabolola kgotlhang / Motsereganyi mo kgetsing ya dituelo o tshwanetse go leba ka bobedi kgang ya mothapi le ya mothapiwa ka kelotlhoko ka mo a ka kgonang ka gone.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: umuntfu losemkhatsini lolamulako emkhatsini wemacembu ngaphandle kwekuya enkantolo nekusita kusonjululwe kungevani / Umlamuli ecaleni lekungavumelani ngeliholo kufanele abuke kuphikisana kwemcashwa nemcashi ngendlela lengakhetsi.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: muthu o imaho nga eṱhe ane a dzudzanya mafhungo vhukati ha vhathu nga nnḓa ha khothe na u vha thusa u dzudzanya khanedzano dzavho / Muhaṱuli kha milandu ya khanedzano dza miholo u tea u sedza khanedzano dza mutholi na mutholiwa sa dzine dza vha na mbuno nga nḓila I konadzeaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: munhu wo ka a nga seketeli tlhelo loyi a lamulaka exikarhi ka vanhu vambirhi ehandle ka khoto na ku pfuna ku lulamisa nkwetlembetano / Mulamuri eka nandzu wa nkwetlembetano wa muholo u fanele ku languta eka mikwetlembetano ya mutirhi na muthori havumbirhi tanihilaha swi kotekaka hakona.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: umuntu ongathathi ihlangothi olamula hlangana kwabantu ababili ngaphandle kwekhotho bese usiza ngokuqeda umbango / Umlamuli ecaleni lombango womrholo kufanele aqale ihlangothi nomqatjhi nelesisebenzi ngendlela engathathi ihlangothi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: umntu ongathathi cala olamla phakathi kwamaqela ngaphadle kwenkundla kwaye awancede aphelise imbambano / Umlamli kwityala lembambano yemivuzo kufuneka ezijonge zombini iingxoxo eyomsebenzi kunye neyomqeshi engathathi cala kangangoko kunokwenzeka.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: umuntu ongathathi uhlangothi phakathi kwamalungu ngaphandle kokuya enkantolo ukuze kuxazululwe impikiswano / Umlamuli wecala lempikiswano elimayelana nomholo kufanele abheke kokubili izimpikiswano zesisebenzi nomqashi ngaphandle kokuthatha uhlangothi ngangokunokwenzeka.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: supply logical reasons for your point of view / She argues in such a way that everyone can easily follow her line of reasoning. / to give reasons for your opinion on a particular matter / He argued that South Africa should stop selling power to neighbouring countries because it was facing massive shortages within the country. / to give reasons for your opinion on a particular matter / selling power to neighbouring countries because it was facing massive shortages within the country. / to give reasons to support an idea with the aim of persuading others / The speaker argues that poverty is one of the most important causes of crime.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: redes gee wat ’n idee ondersteun met die doel om ander te oorreed / Die spreker voer aan dat armoede een van die belangrikste oorsake van misdaad is.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho fana ka mabaka a utlwahalang bakeng sa maikutlo a hao / le e mong habonolo a kgonang ho latela kamoo a nahanang kateng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: efa mabaka a go kwagala a kgopolo y agago / O bolela ka tsela yeo mang le mang a ka kwešišago bonolo mokgwa wa gagwe wa go fahlela.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go neela mabaka a mogopolo wa gago ka setlhogo se se rileng. / go emisa go rekisetsa dinaga tsa boagisanyi motlakase gonne e ne e lebagane le ditlhaelo tse dikgolo mo nageng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuniketa tizatfu tekusekela umbono ngenhloso yekugcugcutela labanye / Sikhulumi siphikisa kutsi inhlupheko ngulenye yetimbangela tebugebengu.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwine muthu a khou guda. / Sia ḽawe ḽa vhukoni ḽi katela na ngudanyambo, mofoḽodzhi na sementiki.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku nyika swivangelo swa vutlhari bya miehleketo ya vonelo ra mavonelo ya yena / U kaneta hi ndlela ya leswaku un'wana na un'wana a kota ku landzelela hi ku olova layeni ya yena ya miehleketo.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukunikela iinzathu ngombonwakho ngendaba ethileko. / Waphikisana ngokuthi iSewula Afrika kufanele ilise ukuthengisela iinarha ezibomakhelwana amandla ngombana beyiqalene nokutjhoda okukhulu enarhenayo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukunika izizathu zoluvo lwakho ngomba othile. / Uxoxe ngokuthi uMzantsi Afrika kufuneka uyeke ukuthengisa amandla kumazwe obumelwane ngenxa yokuba sijongene nokungqongophala okukhulu phakathi kwelizwe.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukunika izizathu zombono wakho mayelana nodaba oluthile. / Wabeka uvo wathi iNingizijmu Afrika kumele ime noma iyeke ukuthengisa amandla kagesi kumazwe angomakhelwane ngoba kwayona iNingizimu Afrika ibhekene nokushoda kakhulu kwamandla kagesi kuleli lizwe lethu.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: exposition of a case characterised by postulation of point of view, evidence, consideration of conflicting views and systematic structuring of thoughts leading to a logical conclusion / In her paper she develops a coherent argument in which she thoroughly supports the facts. / for the purpose of expressing views / For argument’s sake, let’s think about the possibility that global warming is not going to be a global crisis. / postulation of point of view, evidence, consideration of conflicting views and systematic structuring of thoughts leading to a logical conclusion / In her paper she develops a coherent argument in which she thoroughly supports the facts.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: uiteensetting van ’n saak wat gekenmerk word deur die postulering van ’n standpunt, bewyse, oorweging van teenstrydige sienings en sistematiese strukturering van gedagtes wat lei tot ’n logiese gevolgtrekking / In haar seminaar ontwikkel sy ’n samehangende argument waarin sy stellings deeglik met feite ondersteun.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: sepheo sa ho bolela maikutlo / Ho beha lebaka la ho tshetsa moqoqo, ha re nahaneng ka kgonahalo ya hore ho futhumala ha lefatshe ho ke ke ha ba le qomatsi ya lefatshe.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ka nepo ya go tšweletša dikgopolo / Go no ngangišana, a re naganeng ka kgonagalo ya go ruthela ga lefase e ka se be bothata bja lefase.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: ka boikaelelo jwa go tlhalosa dipono / Go tsosa kgang, a re re go ka direga gore go thutafala ga lefatshe ga e ye go nna bothata jwa lefatshe lotlhe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuvetwa kwelicala lelinetimphawu tekuvetwa njengeliciniso, bufakazi, kubukwa kwemicondvo yekungcubutana nekuhlelwa kwemicondvo ngekulandzelana kuholele kusiphetfo lesihlelekile / Ephepheni lakhe usungula imphikiswano lehambisanako lapho asekela khona emaciniso ngendlela.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: hu na ndivho ya u bula mihumbulo / U itela khanedzano ino, kha ri humbule nga ha khonadzeo ya uri mufhiso wa ḽifhasi a u nga ḓo vha dziedzi ya ḽifhasi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi xikongomelo xo hlamusela mavonelo / Handle ka nkwetlembano, a hi ehleketeni hi mayelana ni leswi humelelaka leswaku xitsundzuxo xa misava hinkwayo a xi nga vi xiphiqo xa misava hinkwayo.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngomnqopho wokuveza imibono / ngekghonakalo yokuthi amatjhuguluko wokutjhisa kwebhoduluko ephasini loke angekhe kube mraro wephasi loke.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ekhoyo umbono, ubungqina, ukuthathela ingqalelo iimbono eziphixanayo kunye nolwakheko ngendlela ethile kweengcinga ezikhokelela kwisiphelo esinengqiqo / Kwiphepha lakhe uphuhlisa ingxoxo enamatheleneyo apho ayixhasa ngokupheleleyo imiba.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuvezwa kwecala okuhlanganisa ukwethulwa kwemibono, ubufakazi, ukucabangela imibono engqubuzanayo kanye nokwakhiwa kwemibono ehlanganisa zonke izingxenye okuhilela esiphethweni esizwakalayo / Ephepheni lakhe wakha impikiswano ebumbene lapho esekela ngokuphelele amaqiniso.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: exposition of an argument characterized by postulation of point of view, evidence, consideration of conflicting views, systematic structuring of thoughts leading to a logical conclusion / I always follow her line of argumentation easily, because her statements logically follow one another with clear links and ample evidence. / logical exposition or explanation of your point of view / His argument convinced me thanks to the evidence he supplied for his statements.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: logiese uiteensetting of verduideliking van jou standpunt / Sy argumentasie het my oortuig danksy die bewyse wat hy vir sy stellings gelewer het.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: tlhaloso e hlakileng ya taba e nang le mabaka a utlwahalang a ntlha e hlahiswang, bopaki, ho nahanela maikutlo a kgohlano le ho hahama mehopolo e lebitsang sephethong se utlwahalang / Kamehla ke kgona ho latela habonolo lebaka la hae, ka hobane dipolelo tsa hao di latellana hantle ka mahokelo a hlakileng le bopaki bo bongata.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: pego ya dikgopolo, bohlatse, go naganišiša ka dikgopolo tša go thulana le go beakanya gabotse ga dikgopolo tšeo di dirago mafelelo a mabotse / Nako le nako ke latela tsela ya gagwe ya ngangišano bonolo, ka gore ditatamente tša gagwe di latelana gabotse ka dikgokagano tša go kwagala le bohlatse bja go tlala.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go tlhagisa kgotsa go tlhalosa pono ya gago ka tsela e e utlwalang / Tsela e a neng a tlhalosa kgang ya gagwe ka yone e ne ya ntlhatswa pelo ka ntlha ya bosupi jo a neng a bo ntsha go tshegetsa dipolelo tsa gagwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuvetwa kwelicala lelinetimphawu tekuvetwa njengeliciniso, bufakazi, kubukwa kwemicondvo yekungcubutana nekuhlelwa kwemicondvo ngekulandzelana kuholele kusiphetfo lesihlelekile / Ngihlala ngilandzela kuphikisa kwakhe malula, ngoba titatimende takhe tilandzela lesinye ngendllela ngekuchumana lokucacile kanye nebufakazi lobunyenti.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u bveledza khanedzano hune ha vhonala nga khumbulelo ya nḓila ya kuvhonele, vhuṱanzi, zwine wa zwi dzhia sa mihumbulo I hanedzanaho, kudzudzanyelwe kwa mihumbulo lwa sisṱemetheki zwine zwa livhisa kha khunyeledzo / Ndi dzulela u tevhela kuhanedzele kwawe hu si na vhuleme, ngauri mafhungo awe a a tevhekana zwavhuḓi hu na vhuṱumani vhu re khagala na vhuṱanzi vhunzhi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: mpaluxo wa endlelo ra nkwetlembano wu hlawulekisa hi xihlambanyiso xa mhaka ya mavonelo, vumbhoni, vukheta byo xopaxopa mavonelo ya nkwetlembetano na mavumbelo ya xivumbeko xa miehleketo leyi kongomisaka eka mahetelelo ya vutlhari bya miehleketo / Mikarhi hinkwayo ndzi landzelela ntila wa yena wa nkwetlembetano wo olova, hikuva switatimente swa yena swa landzelelana hi vutlhari bya miehleketo hi ku hlangana ko twala na vumbhoni byo tala.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuvezwa kokuhleleka nofana ihlathululo yombono wakho / Iphikiso lakhe lingenze ngakholwa, ngithokoza ubufakazi abunikeleko eentatimendeni zakhe.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: inkcazelo okanye ingcaciso enengqiqo yombono wakho / Ingxoxo yakhe indiqinisekisile ndibulela ubungqina abunikileyo kwingxelo zakhe.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuvezwa kwempikiswano okuhlanganisa ukwethulwa kwemibono, ubufakazi, ukucabangela imibono engqubuzanayo kanye nokwakhiwa kwemibono ehlanganisa zonke izingxenye okuhilela esiphethweni esizwakalayo / Ngilandela kalula indlela yakhe yempikiswano, ngoba izitatimende zakhe zilandelana ngokunengqondo futhi zinokuhlobana okucacile nobufakazi obanele.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: using reason and logic to make or support an argument / In an argumentative essay you have to adopt a firm line of reasoning for or against a case.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: waarby rede en logika gebruik word om ’n argument te voer of ondersteun / In ’n beredeneerde opstel moet jy ’n ferm redenasie vir of teen ’n saak aanneem.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho sebedisa lebaka bakeng sa ngangisano. / Ho kgothaletswa hore mofuta wa moqoqo wa ngangisano o be le dikgato tse tharo: maikutlo, ngangisano le qetello.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go šomiša mabaka go dira ngangišano. / Go šišinywa gore taodišo ya mohuta wa ngangišano e na le dikgato tše tharo: thesese, ngangišo le phetho.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: -dirisang mabaka go dira kganetsano. / Go tshitshinngwa gore mofuta wa tlhamo ya ngangisano o na le dikgato tse tharo: thesisi, ngangisano le bokhutlo.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kubeka umbono ngekuniketa tiatfu. / Kubekwa umbono wekutsi i-eseyi lephikisako inetigaba letintsatfu: itisisi, kuphikisa kanye nesiphetfo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u tikedza muhumbulo wau wa tshithu tshigede nga mbuno. / O popa/ bula uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi tea u sa tsha rengisela mashangomaḽedzani muḓagasi ngauri na ḽone ḽi na ṱhahelelo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku tirhisa ku ehleketisisa ku endla cincano wa miehleketo. / Ku ringanyetiwa leswaku xitsalwana xa njhekajekisano xi ni switeji swinharhu: thesisi, njhekajekisano na nghimeto.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukusebenzisa isizathu ukobana uphikisane. / Kuphakanyiswa bona umhlobo we-eseyi enepikiswano uneengaba ezintathu: ithisisi, ipikiswano kanye nesiphetho.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukusebenzisa isizathu ukwenza impikiswano. / Kucetyiswa ukuba isincoko sohlobo lokuphikisana sinezigaba ezintathu: ithisisi (ingcingane), ukuphikisana nesigqibo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukusebenzisa isizathu ukwenza inkulumo. / Kuthiwa i-eseyi elandayo inezigaba ezintathu: i-thesis, inkulumo kanye nesiphetho.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: expression of creative skill which is aesthetically satisfying, striking or moving / The famous pianist entertains the audience as he transforms piano playing into a true art.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: uitdrukking van kreatiewe vaardigheid wat esteties bevredigend, treffend of aangrypend is / Die beroemde pianis voer die gehoor mee deur klavierspel te omvorm tot ’n ware kuns.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: polelo ya tsebo ya boqapi e kgotsofatsang ka mokgwa o hlollang, e tsosang maikutlo kapa o susumetsang / Sebapadi se tummeng sa piano se thabisa bamamedi ba sona ha se bapala piano ka mokgwa o bontshang bonono ba nnete.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tšweletšo ya mabokgoni a boithomelo yeo e kgotsofatšago gabotse, go utolla goba do sepela / Moletši wa piano wa go tuma o thabiša babogedi ge a fetoša piano a ralokela go bokgabo bja nnete.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go bontsha bokgoni jwa go taka ka tsela e e kgotsofatsang, e e kgatlhang kgotsa e e tlhotlheletsang / Motshameka piano yo o tumileng o itumedisa bareetsi jaaka fa a dirisa botaki jwa mmatota go tshameka piano ya gagwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuvetwa kwemakhono ekwakha lanelisako, lashaya ngekhatsi, noma lachubeka ngenshisakalo / Umshayi piyano lowatiwako utfokotisa tihlwele njengoba antjintja kudlala ipiyano ibe buciko beliciniso.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u bulwa ha tshikili tsha vhusiki tshine tsha fusha lwa vhutsila, tshi kungaho kana tshi ṱuṱulaho dzangalelo / Mutambapiano a ḓivheaho u mvumvusa vhaṱaleli musi a tshi shandukisa u lidza piano zwa vha vhutsila ha vhukuma.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: mpaluxo wa vuswikoti byo tshula lebyi enerisaka hi ku nandzihaenerisa, byo tsakisa byo koka mahlo / Muchayi wa piyano wa ndhuma u nyanyula vahlaleri tanihi ku cinca matlangelo ya piyano ku va vutshila bya ntiyiso.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuvezwa kwekghono lokutlama elanelisa ngobuthandabuhle, ngokuraga nofana ukuragela phambili / Umbethi wepiyano odumileko uthabisa ababukeli nakathuthukisa ukudlalwa kwepiyano ukuba bukghwari bamambala.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuvakalisa isakhono esinoyilo esonelisa ngokukholisayo, esibonakalayo okanye esichukumisayo / Umdlali piyano odumileyo wonwabisa abaphulaphuli njengoko etshintsha ukudlala ipiyano ekwenza ubugcisa bokwenene.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubonisa ikhono lobuciko elihle, elikhangayo noma elishukumisayo / Umdlali wopiyano ujabulisa izethameli zakhe njengoba eshintsha ukudlala kwepiyano kuba ubuciko bangempela.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: characteristic of art / His artful performance at the piano entertained the audience.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: kenmerkend van kuns / Sy kunstige optrede by die klavier het die gehoor vermaak.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: sebopeho sa bonono / Pontsho ya hae ya bonono ha ho bapala piano e ile ya thabisa bamamedi
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: semelo sa bokgabo / Tiragatšo a gagwe ya bokgabo ka piano e thabišitše .
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: selo se se nang le botaki mo go sone / Mokgwa o a neng a tshameka ka tsela ya botaki ka yone mo pianong o ne o itumedisa bareetsi.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: luphawu lwebuciko / Umsebenti wakhe webuciko kupiyano watfokotisa sihlwele.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwiṱaluli zwa vhutsila / Kulidzele kwawe kwa vhutsila kha piano zwo mvumvusa vhaṱaleli.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xivumbeko xa swa vutshila / Maendlelo ya yena ya swa vutshila eka piyano yo nyanyula vahlaleri.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: umukghwa wobukghwari / Ukudlala kwakhe ipiyano ngobukghwari kuthabise ababukeli.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: uphawu lobugcisa / Ukudlala kwakhe ngobugcisa ipiyano konwabise abaphulaphuli.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isici sobuciko / Umdlalo wakhe wobuciko wopiyano wajabulisa izethameli.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: not genuine or authentic, but imitated or unnatural / Communication on social networks such a Facebook is artificial because authentic personal contact is lacking. / not genuine or authentic, but imitated or unnatural / Communication on social networks such as Facebook is artificial because authentic personal contact is lacking.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: nie eg of outentiek nie, maar nageboots of onnatuurlik / Kommunikasie op sosiale netwerke soos Facebook is kunsmatig omdat outentieke persoonlike kontak ontbreek.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: eo e seng yan nete, empa ya nketsisane kapa eo e seng ya tlhaho / Dikgokahano ho di-social netweke tse kang Facebook ha se tsa nnete empa boikopanyo le motho eo ka sebele ha bo yo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: yeo e sego ya nnete goba ya botšo, eupša e ekišitšwe goba e se ya tlhago / Kgokagano mo dinetwekeng tša leago go swana le Facebook ke ya maitirelo ka gore ga e na botšo bja kgokagano ya motho.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: e seng sa mmatota, mme se tshwana le se sengwe kgotsa e se sa tlholego / Puisano mo mekgweng ya tlhaeletsano le ditsala e e tshwanang le bo-Facebook ke ya maitirelo ka gonne go a bo go se na go kopana ka tsela ya mmatota le batho ba o buang le bone.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: akusiko kwemvelo noma kweliciniso, kodvwa kukotjiwe noma akusiko kwemvelo / Kuchumana kumanethiweki etenhlalo njengeFacebook kwentiwe ngoba inamba yekuchumana yemuntfu leliciniso ayikho.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshi si tsha vhukuma kana ngoho, fhedzi tsho edziselwaho kana tshi si tsha mupo / Vhudavhidzani kha netiweke dza vhudavhidzani dzi nga ho sa Facebook ndi tshiedza ngauri a hu na vhukwamani ha iwe muṋe ha vhukuma.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xo ka xingari xa xiviri kumbe ntiyiso, kambe xi tshuriwile kumbe xi nga riki xa ntumbuluko / Mbhurisano wa le ka netiweke ku fana na tanihi Feyisibuku i xiencenyiso hikuva vuhlanganyisi bya munhu i bya xiviri bya kayivela.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: akusingokokuzenzela nofana kwamambala, kodwana kulingisiwe nofana akusingokwemvelo / Ukuthintana okuseenkundleni zokuthintana ezinjenge-Facebook kubunjiwe ngombana kutjhoda imininingwana yamambala yomuntu.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: engeyoyenene okanye yenyaniso, kodwa elinganisiweyo okanye engeyoyendalo / Unxibelelwano kumakhasi onxibelelwano afana neFacebook lwenziwe kuba alukho uqhagamshelwano lobuqu lokwenyani.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: akukona okwengempela noma okungokoqoboo, kodwa ngokulingisiwe noma akukona okwemvelo / Ukukhulumisana kwezokuxhumana zomphakathi njenge-Facebook okokuzenzisa ngoba akukhona ukuxhumana kobuso nobuso.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: that which is not genuine or authentic, but immitated or unnatural / Many people criticise the artificiality of social networks like Facebook because they prefer direct personal contact.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: dit wat nie eg of outentiek is nie, maar nageboots of onnatuurlik / Baie mense kritiseer die kunsmatigheid van sosiale netwerke soos Facebook omdat hulle direkte persoonlike kontak verkies.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ntho eo e seng ya nnete, empa ya nketsisane kapa eo e seng ya tlhaho / Dikgokahano ho di-social netweke tse kang Facebook ha se tsa nnete empa boikopanyo le motho eo ka sebele ha bo yo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: yeo e sego ya nnete goba ya botšo, eupša e ekišitšwe goba e se ya tlhago / Batho ba bantši ba sola tiragatšo ya dinetweke tša leago go swana le Facebook ka gore ba nyaka kgokagano ya thwii ya motho.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: selo se e seng sa mmatota, mme se tshwana le se sengwe kgotsa e se sa tlholego / Batho ba le bantsi ba nyatsa mekgwa ya tlhaeletsano le ditsala e e tshwanang le bo- Facebook ka gore ke dilo tsa maitirelo ka gonne ba batla go bonala ka namana le batho ba ba buang le bone.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: loko lokungasiko kwemvelo noma lokuliciniso, kodvwa kukotjiwe noma akusiko kwemvelo / lobumbumbulu balamanethiweki etenhlalo lanjengeFacebook ngoba anconota inombolo mbamba yemuntfu.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: vhukuma, fhedzi zwi re nyedziselo kana zwi si na mupo / vhuedza ha netiweke dza matshilisano sa Facebook ngauri vha funa u kwamana na vhathu thwii.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: leswi swi nga riki swa xiviri kumbe ntiyiso, kambe swi encenyetiwile kumbe a hi swa ntumbuluko / Vanhu vo tala va sola manyunyu ya mbhurisano wa vanhu eka Feyisibuku hikuva wu rhandza ku kongomisa vutihlanganisi bya vanhu.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: lokho ekungasikho kwamambala nofana kweqiniso, kodwana kulingisiwe nofana akusi ngekwemvelo / Abantu abanengi bahlaba ukubunjwa kweenkundla zokuthintana ezinjenge-Facebook ngombana zikhetha indlela yokuthintana bunqopha nomuntu ngeminingwana yakhe.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: oko kungeyonene okanye nyaniso, kodwa okulinganisiweyo okanye okungekokwendalo / Abantu abaninzi bagxeka ukungabi kokwenene kwamakhasi omnxibelelwano afana neFacebook kuba bekhetha uqhagamsshelwano ngqo lobuqu.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: ability or skill in producing art that is good or beautiful / Michelangelo’s artistry can be seen in his famous figures on the roof of the Sistine chapel in Rome. / ability or skill in producing art that is good or beautiful / famous figures on the roof of the Sistine chapel in Rome.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: vermoë of vaardigheid om kuns te skep wat goed of mooi is / Michelangelo se kunstenaarskap kan gesien word in sy beroemde figure op die dak van die Sistynse kapel in Rome.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: bokgoni kapa tsebo ya ho hlahisa bonono bo molemo le bo botle / ditshwantshong tse tummeng marulelong a Sistine chapel Roma.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go kgona goba bokgoni bja go tšweletša bokgabo bja gabotse goba bjo bo botse / Bokgon bja Michelangelo bo ka bonwa ka dibopego tša gagwe tša go tuma ka marulelelo a kereke ya Sistine ka Roma.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: bokgoni kgotsa kitso ya go dira sengwe se se takilweng se se molemo kgotsa se sentle / Bokgoni jwa ga Michelangelo mo go tsa botaki bo bonala mo ditshwantsho tsa gagwe tse di tumileng mo marulelong a ntlo ya kobamelo ya Sistine kwa Roma.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: lwati noma likhono lekusungula buciko lobulungile noma lobuhle / Buciko bamichelangelo ungabubona kumisebenti yakhe eluphahleni lelisontfo iSistine eRoma.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: vhukoni kana tshikili tsha u bveledza vhutsila tshi re tshavhuḓi kana tsho kunaho / U kona u bveledza vhutsila ha Vho Michalangelo zwi nga vhonala kha zwifanyiso zwi ḓivheaho zwi re kha ṱhanga ya kereke ya Sistine kha ḽa Roma.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: vuswikoti kumbe xikili eka ku humesa vutshila lebyi nga kahle kumbe byo saseka / Vutshila bya Michelangelo byi nga vonaka eka ntsengo wa yena wo duma eka lwangu ra muako wa kereke ya Sistine eRhoma.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukukghona nofana ikghono lokukhiqiza ubukghwari obuhle nofana obukarisako / Ubukghwari bakaMichelangelo bungabonakala emisebenzini yakhe edumileko ngaphezu kwesonto i-Sistine eRoma.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukukwazi okanye isakhono sokuvelisa ubugcisa obulungileyo okanye obuhle / Ubugcisa bukaMichelangelo bunokubonwa kwimifanekiso yakhe edumileyo kumaphahla ecawa iSistine eRome.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ubungcweti noma ikhono lokwenza ubuciko obuhle / Ubuciko bukaMichelangelo bungase bubonakale kule mifanekiso esophahleni lweSistine Chapel eRoma.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to believe, consider or declare that something is caused by or exists because of someone or something else / The poem is ascribed to Chinua Achebe, but some scholars believe it was written by Wole Soyinka.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: glo, oorweeg of verklaar dat iets veroorsaak word deur of bestaan as gevolg van iemand of iets anders / Die gedig word toegeskryf aan Chinua Achebe, maar sommige geleerdes meen dit is geskryf deur Wole Soyinka.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho dumela, ho ananela hore ntho e itseng e bakwa ke kapa e teng ka lebaka la motho ya itseng kapa ntho e itseng. / Thothokiso e nehetsweng kapa e rehelletsweng ka Chinua Achebe, empa bafuputsi ba bang ba dumela hore e ngotswe ke Wole Soyinka.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go kgolwa, go akanya goba go bega gore se sengwe se hlotšwe ke goba se gona ka lebaka la yo mongwe goba se sengwe. / Theto e ka ga Chinua Achebe, eupša dirutegi tše dingwe di kgolwa gore e ngwadilwe ke Wole Soyinka.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: tlhomamisa gore sengwe se bakilwe ke mongwe kgotsa sengwe kgotsa se teng ka ntlha ya mongwe kgotsa sengwe se sele. / Ba neela Chinua Achebe leboko, mme barutegi bangwe ba dumela gore le kwadilwe ke Wole Soyinka.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kukholwa, kucabanga, noma kucinisekisa kutsi intfo letsite ibangelwa ngulokutsite noma ikhona ngenca yemuntfu noma intfo letsite. / Lenkondlo kukholelwa kutsi yaChinua Achebe, kepha labanye bafundzi bakholelwa ekutsini yabhalwa nguWole Soyinka.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u shumisa ngelekanyo kha u tikedza muhumbulomuṱalusi. / Hu pfi dezethesheni ya mbunoṱhaṱhisi i na nṱha tharu: muhumbulomulangi, muhumbulomuṱalusi na phenndelo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku pfumela, ku swi tekela enhlokweni kumbe ku hlambanya leswaku xin'wana xi vangiwa hi kumbe xi va kona hikwalaho ka un'wana kumbe xin'wanavu. / Xitlhokovetselo xi fambelanisiwa ni xa Chinua Achebe kambe swidyondzeki swin'wana swi tshemba leswaku xi tsariwile hi Wole Soyinka.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukukholwa, ukuthatha nanyana ukuqunta bona into ibangelwa ngokuthileko nanyana yenzeka ngesimanga sento ethileko nanyana somunye umuntu. / Ikondlo yenzelwe u-Chinua Achebe, kodwana abanye abarhubhululi bakholwa bona beyitlolwe ngu-Wole Soyinka.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukukholwa, ukucinga okanye ukubalela ukuba into ethile idalwe okanye ikho ngenxa yomntu othile okanye into ethile. / Umhobe ubalelwa ku-Chinua Achebe, kodwa izifundiswa ezithile zikholelwa ukuba ubhalwe ngu-Wole Soyinka.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ibangelwa noma ikhona ngenxa yomuntu othile noma ngenxa yento ethile. / Inkondlo inikelwe kuChinua Achebe, kodwa ezinye izifundiswa zithi yabhalwa nguWole Soyinka.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: karolo e itseng ya boemo bo itseng, mohopolo, moralo, jwalojwalo. / Tshebediso e mpe ya dithethefatsi e ama mekga yohle ya bophelo bo botle ba motho le botho ba hae.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go nna le thata e e feletseng / Gare, puso go dira ya bobusaesi fela, ga ba kgaotse go gatelela matshwao lefa e le afe a go tsuologa.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku va ni matimba hinkwawo yo lerisa / Eka matiko man’wana eAfrika na le Vuxenixikarhi, endlelo ra mfumo i ra ku lerisa hi ku hetiseka, na nawu wo tshikelela vaakatiko ku ya ku yile hi swikombiso swin’wana na swin’wana swa vudzolonganyi.

xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukusebenzisa amandla apheleleyo / Kumazwe athile eAfrika kunye nakuMbindi Mpuma, uhlobo lukarhulumente lolukazwilakhe ngokungqongqo, ngengcinezelo elukhuni kuzo naziphi impawu zovukelo.

ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kucacisa lokutsite kucace futsi kuvisiseke, ukubeke ngendlela lecacile. / yethiyori kutifundvo takhe ngendlela yekutsi tiyavisiseka kubafundzi bakhe.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku endla leswaku swi va erivaleni kumbe swi va leswi twisisekaka. / Nkambisiso wa matsalwa wu nga nyika vuxokoxoko lebyi lavekaka ku basisa swikongomelo swa ndzavisiso wa un'wana.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: clear and comprehensible / Dr. Koopman’s special lecture was so clarifying that I finally understood all the theoretical principles. Her clarifying notes also help a lot.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: hlakile le ho utlwisiseha / Thuto e kgethehileng ya Dr. Koopman e bile e hlakisang hoo qetellong ke ileng ka utlwisisa melao kaofela ya thiori Dinoutu tsa hae tse hlakisang di boetse di thusa haholo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kwagala le go kwešišega / Thutophahlošo ya go ikgetha ya Ngaka Koopman e be e hlalošega moo ke elego ka feleletša ke kwešišitše dikgopolo tša teori. Dinoutso tša gagwe tša go hlalošega le tšona di thušitše kudu.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: se se utlwalang e bile motho a kgona go se tlhaloganya / Tlhatlhelelo e e kgethegileng ya ga Ngaka Koopman e ne e tlhalosa dilo sentle jaana mo e leng gore la bofelo ke ne ka kgona go tlhaloganya melaometheo yotlhe. Dintlha tsa gagwe tse a di dirisang go tlhalosa dilo le tsone di thusa thata.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: lokucacisekako nalokuvisisekako / Sifundvo lesikhetsekile sa-Dkt. Koopman besicacisa kakhulu ngekutsi ngagcina ngivisisa tonkhe tinchubomgomo tethiyori Emanothi akhe ekucacisa nawo asita kakhulu.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: khagala na nga vhuḓalo / Dokotela Koopman yo vha i tshi bvisela khagala zwe nda fhedzisela ndo pfesesa milayo ya thyeori. Notsi dzavho dza u bvisela khagala na dzone dzo thusa vhukuma.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku vonaka na ku twisiseka / Dyondzo yo hlawuleka ya Dkt Koopman a yi hlamuseli swinene leswaku ndzi twisisa hi ku hetiseka hinkwayo milawu ya swa thiyoti. Ku hlamusela ka yena tinotsi nakmbe swi pfuna swinene.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokubonakala ngokuzwisisakala / Ilektjha ekhethekileko kaDorh. Koopman beyingehlathululako okwenze bonyana ekugcineni ngizwisise yoke imigomo yombono. Amanowutsi wehlathululo yakhe nawo asiza khulu.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ecacileyo kwaye eqondekayo / Isifundo esikhethekileyo sikaGqirha Koopman besicacisa kangangokuba ndide ndayiqonda yonke imithetho-siseko yethiyori ekugqibeleni. Amanqaku akhe acacisayo ancede kakhulu kananjalo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: kucacile futhi kuyaqondakala / Isifundo esikhethekile sikaDkt. Koopman sasicace ngendlela yokuthi ekugcineni ngaziqonda zonke izimiso zezinkolelo-mbono ezicatshangelwayo. Amanothi wakhe acacisayo nawo awusizo kakhulu.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: the quality of being clearly expressed and explained / The clarity with which Lechte explains difficult psychological principles makes Julia Kristeva’s work more accessible. / the quality of being expressed clearly / For the sake of clarity, the topics will be discussed in detail and examples will be given. / to be clear / Dr. Mohapi will always reformulate a definition for the sake of clarity so that everyone can understand it. / to be clear / definition for the sake of clarity so that everyone can understand it.
