afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: soos, van of met betrekking tot die kuns van die oudheid / Shakespeare, Vondel, Goethe en Schiller is van die klassieke skrywers van hul eeu.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: jwalo ka, mabapi le tsa boholoholo / Shakespeare, Vondel, Goethe le Schiller ba hara bangodi ba tlelasiki ba lekgolo le bona la dilemo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ka, ya goba malebana le bokgabo bja dinako tša kgale / Shakespeare, Vondel, Goethe le Schiller ba gare ga bangwadi ba kgale ba nako ya bona.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go go malebana le sengwe sa botaki sa bogologolo / Shakespeare, Vondel, Goethe le Schiller ke bangwe ba bakwadi ba dibuka tsa bogologolo ba lekgolo la bone la dingwaga.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kusukela,, noma ngenhlonipho kubuciko bakudzala / Shakespeare, Vondel, Goethe na Schiller bangulabanye balabo babhali labasezingeni betikhatsi tabo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: sa, tsha kana maelana na vhutsila ha zwifhinga zwa kale / Vho Shakespeare, Vho Vondel, Vho Goethe na Vho Schiller vha vhukati ha vhaṅwali vha kale vha ṅwaha ḓana wavho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tanihi, ka kumbe hi mayelana ni vutshila bya vukhale / Shakespeare, Vondel, Goel na Schiller hi van’wana va va vatsari va khale va vona va malembexidzana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku-, nge- nofana nokuhlonipha ubukghwari bakade / UShakespeare, Vondel, Goethe noSchiller bahlangana nabatloli bamatlasikhi wangenkhathi zabo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokunxulumene nobugcisa bamaxesha amandulo / U-Shakespeare, Vondel, Goethe no-Schiller baphakathi kwababhali boddi lwamandulo benkulungwane yabo yeminyaka.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okwakudala noma ngokuhlobene nokuba okungasoze kwabuna / UShakespeare, uVonde, uGoethe noSchiller bangabanye ababhali bakudala bekhulu leminyaka.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: trend in the arts, literature and architecture that follows the models of Greek and Roman antiquity (the Classics); it had its first revival in Europe during the Renaissance and was further developed in the artistic pursuits and design during Neo- Classicism; architecture and literature strictly followed the form of classical works; this often resulted in a cold, impersonal style and loss of content quality / Classicism is a style that is associated with German poets like Goethe and Schiller. / trend in the arts, literature and architecture that follows the models of Greek and Roman antiquity (the Classics); it had its first revival in Europe during the Renaissance and was further developed in the artistic pursuits and design during Neo-Classicism; architecture and literature strictly followed the form of classical works; this often resulted in a cold, impersonal style and loss of content quality / Classicism is a style that is associated with German poets like Goethe and Schiller.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: neiging in die kunste, letterkunde en argitektuur wat die modelle van die Griekse en Romeinse oudheid (die Klassieke) volg; dit het sy eerste herlewing in Europa gedurende die Renaissance en word verder ontwikkel in die artistieke strewe en ontwerp van die Neo-Klassisisme; argitektuur en letterkunde volg die vorm van klassieke werke streng na; dit lei dikwels tot ’n koue, onpersoonlike styl en ’n verlies aan inhoudskwaliteit / Klassisisme is ’n styl wat geassosieer word met Duitse digters soos Goethe en Schiller.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: mehaho e latelang dimodele tsa boholoholo tsa SeGerike le SeRoma (Ditlelasiki); e bile le tsosoloso ya pele Yuropa nakong ya Renaissance le di ile tsa ntshetswa pele mesebetsing ya bonono le meralo nakong ya Neo-Classicism; mehaho le dibuka di ile tsa latela ka thata mesebetsi ya bongodi ya tlelasiki; sena hangata se ne se hlahisa setaele se se nang maikutlo, se se nang botho le tahlehelo ya boleng ba se kahare / Botlelasiki ke setaele se amahanngwang le dithoko tsa SeJeremane tse jwalo ka Goethe le Schiller.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: setaele go bokgabo, dingwalwa le thutaboagi tšeo di latelago dimmotlolo tša kgale tša Segerik le Seroma ( tša Kgale); e bile le tsošološo ya yona ka Yuropa nakong ya Go thoma lefsa gomme ya kaonafatšwa gape ka mešongwana ya bokgabo le sebopego nakong nakong ya Tsošološo ya Sekgale; thutaboagi le dingwalwa di latetše thwii mokgwa wa mešomo ya kgale; se gantši se feleletša ka setaele s go hloka maikutlo sa magareng le go lahlegelwa ke boleng bja diteng / Sekgale ke setaele seo se amantšhwago le direto tša Sejeremane go swana le Goethe le Schiller.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: selo sa botaki, buka le setshwantsho se se takilweng se se tshwanang le sa dilo tsa bogologolo tsa Segerika le Seroma (sa dilo tsa Tlelasiki); se tsosolositswe lantlha kwa Yuropa ka nako ya Poelano mme sa nna sa godisiwa go ya pele mo dilong tsa botaki le tsa tlhamo ka nako ya maiteko a go Tsosolosiwa ga Dilo tsa Bogologolo; ditshwantsho tse di takilweng le dibuka di ne di latela sebopego sa dibuka tsa bogologolo fela; seno gantsi se ile sa felela ka setaele sa go kwala se se senang maikutlo se se se nang dinonofo tsa botho e bile se se kwadilweng e se sa boleng jo bo kalo / Botlelasiki ke setaele se se amanngwang thata le baboki ba Bajeremane ba ba tshwanang le Goethe ke Schiller.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: threnda kutebuciko, tembhalo kanye netekudvweba takhiwo lokulandzela tindlela temaGrika neMaroma takudzala(kwakudzala); kwaba nekuvuseleleka kwako kwekucala e-Yurophu ngesikhatsi sekuVuselelwa kantsi kwachubeka nekutfutfukisa imisebenti netindlela tebuciko ngesikhatsi se- Neo-Classicism; badvwebi betakhiwo nebembhalo balandzela luhlobo lwemisebenti yakudzala; loku kube nemphumela wesitayela lesibindzile, lesingenabuntfu kanye nekulahleka kwekhwalithi yalokucuketfwe / I-Classicism yindlela lehambisana nabosonkondlo besiJalimane njenga-Goethe na-Schiller.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: maṅwalwa na nyolo ane a tevhela maedza a zwifhinga zwa kale zwa Gerika na zwa Roma (zwa Tshikale); o vha e na mvusuludzo yao ya u thoma ya Yuropa musi wa U bebwa hafhu na u dovha u bveledzwa hafhu kha u lwela vhutsila na nyolo musi wa zwa Tshikale zwo Vusuludzwaho; nyolo na maṅwalo zwine zwa tevhedzwa nga kha mishumo ya tshikale; hezwi kanzhi zwo bveledzwa kha tshitaila tshi sa pfadzi, tshi si na vhukwamani na muthu na u xelelwa nga ndeme ya zwi re ngomu / Kiḽasizimu ndi tshitaila tshine tsha elana na vharendi vha Dzheremane vha nga ho sa Vho Goethe na Vho Schiller.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: matsalwa na ntivovuaki leri landzelelaka tinxaka ta Magiriki na Varhoma ta vukhale (swa xiKhale); ri na ku pfuxetiwa ro sungula eYuropa hi nkarhi wa Mpfuxeto na ku hluvukisa ku yisa emahlweni eka ku sala hi le ndzhaku ka swo endliwa hi vutshila na dizayini hi nkarhi wa Leswintshwa swa Khale; ntivovuaki na matsalwa hi ku hetiseka swi landzela hi xivumbeko xa mitirho ya swa khale; leswi mikarhi yo tala swi hetelelelaka eka ku titimela, ndlela ya nkalantwelavusiwana na ku lahlekeriwa hi mhaka ya nkoka / Vukhale i ndlela leyi yi yelanaka ni switlhokovetselo swa Majarimani yo fana na Goethe na Schiller.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: Injayelo ebukghwarini, emitlolweni nemidwebeni yamaplani wemakhiwo elandela imifuziselo yendlela yakade (amaTlasikhi) yamaGrigi anamaRoma; ibe nemvuselelo yayo yokuthoma eYurobhu ngesikhathi semVuselelo begodu yaragela phambili ngokuthuthuka ngokulandelela ubukghwari nemitlamo nge-Neo-Classicism; imidwebo yamaplani wemakhiwo yalandela khulu indlela yokwakheka kwemisebenzi ethandekako yakade; lokhu kanengi kwaletha umphumela ositayela esimakaza, esingakaphathelani nabantu nesulahlekelwa lizinga lokumumethweko / Itlasizimu sitayela esihlotjaniswa neembongi zamaJeremani ezinjengaboGoethe noSchiller.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: umzila kwezobugcisa, uncwadi kunye neenzululwazi ngokwakha ezilandela imodeli zamaxesha amandulo amaGrike namaRoma (ezoDidi lwamaNdulo); kwavuselelwa kuqala eYurophu ngexa leMpucuko kwaze kwaphuhliswa ngokungaphaya kuba lulandelwa ezobugcisa noyilo ngexa lokuvuselela kweSimbo seXesha loDidi lwaMandulo; iinzululwazi ngezakhiwo noncwadi okwalandelwa ngokungqongqo luhlobo lwemisebenzi yamaxesha amandulo; oku ixesha elininzi kwakhokelela kwisimbo esingaqaqambanga, esingenabuqo kunye nelahleko yomgangatho wesiqulatho / Okodidi lwamandulo sisimbo esinxulunyaniswa nembongi zaseJamani ezifana noGoethe noSchiller.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: izincwadi nezokwakha ezilandela izinhlobo zesiGreki nesiRoma (Ezingasoze zabuna); yaqalisa eYurophu phakathi nenkathi ye-Renaissance futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi yathuthukela kwezobuciko nezokudizayina phakathi ne-Neo- Classicism; ezokwakha nezincwadi kwalandela imisebenzi yezingasoze zabuna; ngokuvamile lokho kwahilela esitayeleni esingathandeki, esingenabuntu futhi esingenayo ikhwalithi enhle yokuqukethwe / I-Classicism isitayela esihlobene nezimbongi zaseJalimane ezifana noGoethe noSchiller.

tsn: motho yo o ratang dilo tsa tlelasiki
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: a scholar or student in the languages, letters and culture of the ancient Greeks and Romans / The classicist George Chapman undertook one of the best translations of the Iliad into English. / according to the rules of classical art / In ornaments and furniture excavated in Pompeii, one sees classic trends such as strict, symmetrical and precise lines. / letters and culture of the ancient Greeks and Romans / The classicist George Chapman undertook one of the best translations of the Iliad into English.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: ’n geleerde of student in die tale, lettere en kultuur van die antieke Grieke en Romeine / Die klassikus George Chapman het een van die beste vertalings van die Ilias in Engels onderneem.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: scholar kapa moithuti wa dipuo, mangolo le setso sa MaGerike le MaRoma a boholoholo / Ratlelasiki George Chapman o ile a etsa e nngwe ya diphetolelo tsa pele tse tswileng matsoho tsa SeIliad ho ya Senyesemaneng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka melao ya bokgabo bja kgale / ntšhitšwego go Pompeii, motho o bona mekgwa ya kgale bjalo ka methaladi ya thwii, ye e lekanetšego le ya go felela.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: mokanoki kgotsa moithuti mo dipuong, makwalo le setso sa dilo tsa Bagerika le Baroma ba bogologolo / Monna yo o ratang dilo tsa tlelasiki e bong George Chapman o ne a simolola porojeke e e duleng diatla ya thanolo ya puo ya se-Iliad a isa kwa Seesemaneng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngekwemitsetfo yebuciko bakadzeni / nefenisha letagujwa epompeii, umuntfu ubona emathrendi lafana nekucinisa sandla, kufananisa nemigca lefana ncamashi.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: rapfunzo kana mutshudeni wa dzinyambo, maḽeḓere na mvelele ya Vhagerika na Vharoma Vhakale / Mudzia tshikale Vho George Chapman vho vho ita iṅwe ya phindulelo dza khwinesa dza Iliad u ya kha Tshiisimane.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi ku ya hi milawu ya vutshila bya khale / Eka swikhavisiwa na fanichara leyi pfukuriweke eka Pompeii, un’wana u vona fexeni ya khale ku fana na mitila yo xopaxopa, yo ringana na yo kwatsaa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: umfundi nofana isifundiswa kezamalimi, iincwadi namasiko wamaGrigi namaRoma wakade / Itlasizisti uGeorge Chapman wathatha igadango ekungelihle khulu lokutjhugulula isi-Iliad asize esiNgisini.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ingcali okanye umfundi kwiilwimi, oonobumba kunye nenkcubeko yamaGrike namaRoma akudala / olunye loguqulo olugqwesileyo lwe-Iliad eluguqulela esiNgesini.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isazi noma umfundi wezilimi, amagama nesiko lesiGreki nesiRoma sakudala / UGeorge Chapman i-classicist wenza ukuhunyushwa okuhamba phambili kakhulu kwesi-Iliad kuyakusiNgisi.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: everything to do with Greek and Roman antiquity / The lecturer brought the world of the Classics to life with her lectures.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: alles wat te make het met die Griekse en Romeinse oudheid / Die dosent het met haar lesings die wêreld van die Klassieke verlewendig.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ntho e nngwe le e nngwe e amanang le SeGerike le SeRoma tsa boholoholo / Lektjhara e ile ya phedisa lefatshe la Tlelasiki dithutong tsa yona.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: se sengwe le se sengwe seo se bolelago ka sekgale sa Segerika le Seroma / Thutophahlošo e tlišitše lefase la Mešomo ya bokgabo bophelong ka thutophahlošo ya gagwe.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: sengwe le sengwe se se amanang le dilo tsa bogologolo tsa Segerika le Seroma / Motlhatlheledi o ne a dira gore dilo tsa Tlelasiki go nne jaaka e kete re a di bona ka tsela e a neng a ruta ka yone.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xin’wana na xin’wana lexi fambelanaka na vukhale bya Magiriki na Varhoma / Muleteri u tisile na swa Vukhale swa misava hinkwayo swo hanya eka dyondzo ya yena.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: into enye nenye emayelana nemisebenzi yesikhathi sakade samaGrigi namaRoma / Ilektjhara yaletha ngobutja iphasi lamaTlasikhi ngamalektjha wakhe.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: yonke into enento yokwenza namaxesha amandulo amaGrike namaRoma / Umhlohli uzise impilo kwihlabathi lezinto zeeNdidi zaMandulo kwizifundo zakhe.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: zonke izinto ezimayelana nezasendulo zesiGreki nesiRoma / Umfundisi wenza ukuthi Ezakudala ezihamba phambili ziphile ezifundweni zakhe.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku longoloxa swin'wana hi mitlawa ku ya hi swihlawulekisi. / Tinovhele ti tlawahatiwa ku ya hi muxaka wa tona wa vutshila bya matsalwa.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ka tsela eo ho leng bonolo ho bona, ho tlwa kapa ho utlwisisa / Dr. Seakhoa kamehla o bolella baithuti mehopolo e metjha ka tsela eo ka hlakileng ba e utlwisisang.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ka tsela yeo e lego gore go bonolo go bona, go kwa goba go kwešiša / Ngaka Seakhoa nako le nako o tsebiša dikgopolo tše difsa go baithuti gore ba di kwešiše gabonolo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: ka tsela e go leng bonolo go bona, go utlwa kgotsa go tlhaloganya / Ngaka Seakhoa ka metlha o ruta baithuti dikgopolo tse disha ka tsela e ba kgonang go di bona sentle.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngendlela lelula kubona, kuva noma kuvisisa / Dkt. Seakhoa uhlala etfula imicondvo lemisha kubafundzi khona batoyivisisa ngalokucacile.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: nga nḓila ine zwa vhonala zwavhuḓi, u pfala na u pfesesea / ḓivhadza miṱalukanyo miswa kha matshudeni uri vha kone u i pfesesa zwavhuḓi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi ndlela yo olova ku vona, ku twa na ku twisiseka / Dkt Seakhoa mikarhi hinkwayo u tirhisa marito lamantshwa eka machudeni ku endlela leswaku va twisisa hi ku hetiseka.

xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngendlela ekulula ukubona, ukuva nokuqonda ngayo / UGqirha Seakhoa usoloko esazisa imiba emitsha kubafundi ukuze bayiqonde ngokucacileyo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngendlela okulula ukuyibona, ukuyizwa noma ukuyiqonda / Njalo uDkt. Seakhoa wethula imibono emisha kubafundi ukuze bayiqonde ngokucacile.

tsn: polelo e e buiwang nako le nako mme o e utlwile mo go ba bangwe
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: overused or unoriginal phrase / Politicians are best known for their use of clichés, such as WE HAVE COME A LONG WAY and TOGETHER WE WILL BUILD THE FUTURE.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: oormatig gebruikte of onoorspronklike frase / Politici is veral bekend vir hul gebruik van clichés, soos ONS HET ’N LANG PAD GEKOM en SAAM BOU ONS DIE TOEKOMS.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: polelo e sebedisweng haholo kapa e se feletsweng ke moelelo wa mantlha / Boradipolotiki ba tsejwang haholo ka ho sebedisa di-tleliché, tse kang KE HOLE MOO RE TSWANG TENG le RE LE NGATA-NNGWE RE TLA HAHA BOKAMOSO.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go šomiša kudu goba sekafoko seo e sego sa bošo / Boradipolotiki ba tsebega kudu ka mebolelwana, ya go swana le RE TŠW KGOLE gomme MMOGO RE TLA AGA BOKAMOSO.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: polelo e motho a e buang thata go sa tlhokege kgotsa e a e utlwileng ka ba bangwe / Boradipolotiki ba itsege thata ka go dirisa ga bone thata polelo dingwe gantsintsi, tse di tshwanang le RONA LE LONA RE TSWA KGAKALA le FA RE IPOPA NGATANA RE TLA AGA BOKAMOSO.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: libintana elisetjentiswe kakhulu noma lelingasilekucala / Bosopolitiki batiwa kancono ngekusebentisa kwabo tihabiso, njenga SICHAMUKA KHASHANE na SISONKHE SITOLAKHA LIKUSASA.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: ḽifurase ḽi si ḽa vhukuma ḽo shumiseswaho / Vhorapolotiki vha ḓivhelwa u shumisa dzikholitshi, dzi nga ho sa RI BVA KULE na RI ROṰHE RI ḒO FHAṰA VHUMATSHELO.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xvulwana lexi tirhisiwaka ku tlula mpimo kumbe xo ka xingari xa xiviri / Van’watipoliti va tiveka swinene eka ku tirhisiwa ka swivulwana leswi tirhisiwaka hi ntolovelo, ku fana na tanihi HI HUMA KULE SWINENE naswona KUN’WE HI TA AKA VUMUNDZUKU.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: semantic relation between parts of a text or elements in a text that ensures that the text flows logically / It is important that there is cohesion between sentences and paragraphs in a text, but overall coherence is also important in order for the text to make sense at the macro level.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go tlhatlhoba dilo go bona gore di tshwana go le kana kang kgotsa di farologana go le kana kang. / Motlhotlhomisi o batla go bapisa diphitlhelelo tsa ga jaana le tsa dingwaga tse tharo tse di fetileng.

nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tekolo ya dilo go bona a moo di swanago goba di fapanago / Mo taodišong ye o swanetše go dira papetšo ya peakanyo ya pele le ya morago ya Beethoven.

ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ṱolwa ha zwithu u itela u vhona uri zwi fana u swika ngafho kana zwi fhambana u swika ngafhi / Kha maanea aya vha tea u ita mbambedzo ya mbumbeo thangeli na dza kale dza Beethoven.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xikambelo xa swilo i ku lava ku vona hilaha swi fanaka kumbe swi hambanaka / Eka xitsalwana lexi u fanele ku endla mfananiso wa swiphemu swo sungula na swa le ndzhakunyana swa Beethoven.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlola izinto ukuze ubone bonyana zifana kuphi nokuthi zikhluka kuphi / Kile-eseyi kufanele umadanise ukwakheka kwe- Beethoven kwangaphambilini nekwanjesi.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho bokella dikarolo tse fapaneng hammoho ka tsela e dumellanang / Benjamin o tla hokahanya mesebetsi ya hae e fapaneng ya setjhaba ka moralo o hlophisehileng wa thuto, ho seng jwalo, dithuti tsa hao di ke ke tsa atleha.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go kopanya dielemete tša go fapana ka tsela ya khutšo / Benjamin o tla swanela go kgokaganya mešongwana ya gagwe ye e fapanego le leano la go ithuta la peakanyo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira gore dikarolo tse di farologaneng di dire mmogo ka kutlwano / Benjamin o tlile go tshwanelwa ke go gokaganya ditiro tse di farologaneng tsa gagwe mo setšhabeng le thulaganyo ya gagwe ya go ithuta, go seng jalo ga a na go kgona go ithuta.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuletsa emalunga lahlukene kanyekanye ngendlela levanako / Benjamin kutodzingeka ahlanganise imisebenti yakhe lehlukile neluhlelo lekufundza loluhlelekile, uma kungasinjalo tifundvo takhe titohlupheka.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ṱanganya zwipiḓa zwo fhambanaho nga nḓila ya mulalo / dzawe dza matshilisano dzo fhambanaho na pulane ya ngudo ya sisiṱemethiki, zwa sa ralo ha nga bveleli kha ngudo dzavho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku tisa swiphemu swo hambana ndhawu yin’we hi ndlela yo tirhisana / Benjamin u ta fanela ku kondletela migingiriko yo hambana ya vanhu hi endlelo ra pulani ya dyondzo, handlekaswona tidyondzo ta yena ti ta xaniseka.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukulinganisa izakhi ezimbili ngendlela ehle / UBenjamini kufanele alinganise imisebenzi yakhe ehlukileko yomphakathi ngeqhinga elihlelekileko, ngaphandle kwalokho iimfundo zakhe zizokudosa emhlweni.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlanganisa izinto ezingafaniyo ngendlela evumelanayo / UBenjamin kuza kufuneka alungelelanise imisebenzi yakhe yasekuhlaleni eneyantlukwano nesicwangciso sokufunda esisigxina, okanye izifundo zakho ziya kungaqhubi kakuhle.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlanganisa izici ezahlukene ngendlela evumelanayo / Kuzodingeka ukuthi uBenjamin ahlanganise imisebenzi yakhe ehlukahlukene yokuchitha isizungu nohlelo lwakhe lokutadisha oluhlelekile, kungenjalo ngeke aphumelele ezifundweni zakhe.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: dikarolo tse di farologaneng di kgona go dirisana sentle / Thuto e e gokagantsweng sentle le ditiro tse dingwe tsa setšhaba e botlhokwa thata gore o atlege.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go rulaganngwa ga dikarolo tse di farologaneng go dira gore di kgone go dira mmogo ka nako e le nngwe / Rotlhe re a itse gore go botlhokwa go le kana kang go rulaganya ditiro tse di sa amaneng le thuto le ditiro tse di amanang le thuto gore o kgone go atlega mo go ithuteng ga gago.

ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: nzudzanyo ya zwipiḓa zwo fhambanaho u itela uri zwi shume kathihi nga tshifhinga tshithihi / Roṱhe ri a zwi ḓivha uri ndi zwa ndeme hani u vha na pfananyo ya nyito dza nga nṱha ha kharikhuḽamu na pulane ya ngudo uri hu vhe na u guda hu bvelelaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: nhlangano wa swiphemu swo hambana wu endla leswaku va tirha kun’we eka nkarhi wun’we. / Hinkwerhu hi tiva hilaha nkoka wo kondletela migingiriko yo engeteriwa na pulani yo dyondza swi humelelaka eka dyondzo.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlanganiswa kwezakhi ezihlukileko ukuze zisebenzisane zoke ngesikhathi sinye / Soke siyazi bonyana kuqakatheke kangangani ukuba netjhebiswano lemisebenzi yangemva kwesikolo nehlelo lokufunda ukuze kube nokufunda okuyipumelelo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukulungelelwanisa kwamalungu awohlukeneyo ukwenza ukuba asebenze kunye ngexesha elinye / Sonke siyazi ukuba lubaluleke kanjani ulungelelwaniswa kwemisebenzi engaphaya kweyenziwayo yokufunda kunye nesicwangciso sokufunda ekufundeni okunempumelelo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlanganisa izici ezahlukahlukene ukuze zisebenzisane ngesikhathi esisodwa / Sonke siyazi ukuthi kubaluleke kangakanani ukuhlanganiswa kwemisebenzi yangemuva kwesikole nohlelo lokutadisha ukuze uphumelele.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: Go ya kwa tengteng mo bokaong jwa lefoko ka go gatelela dikarolo tse di kwa tengteng tsa lefoko leo / Derrida o dumela gore mafoko ga a na bokao jo bo feletseng, ka gonne mafoko a nna a ntse a itlhatlhamolola one ka boone.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kubukela phansi inchazelo yembhalo ngekuveta kungcubutana kwemvelo nekuphikisana / Derrida ukholelwa kutsi imibhalo ayinayo inchazelo yekugcina, ngoba imibhalo ihlala itidzilita ngekwayo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u dzhiela fhasi ṱhalutshedzo ya tshibveledzwa nga u sumbedza khuḓano na phambano dzi vhonalesaho / Vho Derridda vha tenda uri zwibveledzwa a zwi na ṱhalutshedzo ya u fhedzisela, ngauri zwibveledzwa zwi dzulela u ḓifhaṱulula zwone zwiṋe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku tekela hansi nhlamuselo ya tsalwa hi ku kombisa leswi nga tsariwa na mikanetano / Derriba u tshemba leswaku switsariwa a swi na nhlamuselo ya makumu, hikuva switsariwa hi mikarhi hinkwayo swi tihunguta hi swoxe.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukunganaki ihlathululo yomtlolo ngokuveza ukutjhayisana nokudosana okuvelileko / UDerrida ukholelwa ekutheni umtlolo awunahlathululo yokugcina, ngombana imitlolo iragela phambili ngokungazakhi wona ngokwayo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuthoba intsingiselo yombhalo ngokuqaqambisa imbambano nempikiswano yemvelo / yokugqibela, kuba imibhalo iqonda ubudlelwane phakathi kombhalo nentsingiselo rhoqo ngokwayo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukunganaki incazelo yombhalo ngokugqamisa ukuphikisana nokungqubuzana okubalulekile / UDerrida ukholelwa ukuthi imibhalo ayinayo incazelo yokugcina, ngoba imibhalo ihlale njalo izihlaziya.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: philosophical school of thought that rejects the generally accepted view that words in texts form a coherent meaning / Derrida, the French father of deconstruction, rejects the notion that a writer’s intent determines the meaning of a text.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: filosofiese denkrigting wat die algemeen aanvaarde siening verwerp dat woorde in ’n teks ’n samehangende betekenis vorm / Derrida, die Franse vader van dekonstruksie, verwerp die opvatting dat die bedoeling van ’n skrywer die betekenis van ’n teks bepaal.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: maikutlo a filosofi a hanang maikutlo a amohelwang ka kakaretso a hore mantswe a leng tabeng e ngotsweng a bopa moelelo o momahaneng / Derrida, ntate wa Lefora wa qhaqhollo, o hana maikutlo a reng sepheo sa mongodi se bontsha moelelo wa taba e ngotsweng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: sekolo sa filosofi ya dikgopolo seo se ganago kgopolo yeo e dumeletšwego ka kakaretšo ya gore mantšu mo dingwalweng a dira tlhalošo ya kwagala / Derrida, tate wa Mofora wa tekolo, o gana kgopolo ya gore nepo ya mongwadi e laola tlhalošo ya sengwalwa.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: filosofi e e ganang kgopolo e e amogelwang ya gore mafoko a bopa bokao jo bo utlwanang / Derrida, monna wa Mofora yo o tlileng ka kgopolo ya go tlhatlhamololwa ga bokao jwa mafoko, ga a dumalane le kgopolo ya gore boikaelelo jwa mokwadi bo laola bokao jwa se a se kwadileng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: sikolo semcabango sefilosofi lesicitsa umcondvo lovame kwamukela kutsi emagama kumibhalo enta inchazelo lebumbene / Errida, babe wemFrenshi wekudzilita, uyawucitsa lomcondvo wekutsi inhloso yembhali incuma inchazelo yembhalo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshikolo tsha fiḽosofi tsha kuhumbulele tshine tsha hanedza kuvhonele kune kwa ṱanganedzwa kwa uri maipfi are kha tshibveledzwa a vhumbe ṱhalutshedzo I pfadzaho / Vho Derrida, khotsi a phaṱululo wa Fura, vha hana kuhumbulele kwa uri vhuḓiimiseli ha muṅwali vhu sumbedza ṱhalutshedzo ya tshibveledzwa.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: vonelo ro amukela angarhela leswaku marito eka matsalwa ku suka eka nhlamuselo ya vuxaka byo tiya / Derrida, tatana wa Mufurwa ka hunguto, u alana ni mhaka ya leswaku xikongomelo xa mutsari i ku kumisisa nhlamuselo ya tsalwa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: isikolo somcabango sefilosofi esirarha umbone okhona wokuthi amagama asemtlolweni abumba ihlathululo elandelanako / UDarrida, ongumFrentji, ubabakhe lokubhidliza, urarha umbono wokuthi ihloso yomtloli ngiyo ebangela ihlathululo yomtlolo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ingcinga yefilosofi ekhaba umbono owamkelwe jikelele wokuba amagama akumbhalo enze intsingiselo enamatheleneyo / UDerrida, utata wamaFrentshi wokuqonda ubudlelwane phakathi kombhalo nentsingiselo, uyawukhaba umbono wokuba injongo yombhali imisela intsingiselo yombhalo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: imiqondo ehlukahlukene yenkolelo enqabela umbono owamukelwa ngokuvamile wokuthi amagama asembhalweni akha incazelo ehambisanayo / UDerrida, ubaba wesiFulentshi wokuhlaziya, wenqaba umbono wokuthi injongo yombhali yiyo enquma incazelo yombhalo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: related to the theory of deconstruction / Derrida was considered one of the greatest deconstructive thinkers of his time. / related to the theory of deconstruction / greatest deconstructive thinkers of his time.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: wat verband hou met die teorie van dekonstruksie / Derrida is beskou as een van die grootste dekonstruktiewe denkers van sy tyd.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: e amanang le thiori ya qhaqhollo / Derrida o ile a tadingwa jwalo ka e mong wa dihahi tse qhaqhollang ka ho fetisisa ba nakong ya hae.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: e amana le teori ya tekolo / Derrida o be a tšwewa go ba yo mongwe wa banagantšhi bao ba lekolago wa nako ya gagwe.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: amanang le kgopolo ya go tlhatlhamololwa ga bokao jwa mafoko / Derrida o ne a tsewa e le mongwe wa batho ba ba kgonang go tlhatlhamolola bokao jwa mafoko ba nako ya gagwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: Hambisana nethiyori yekunciphisa / webacabangi labanciphisako betikhatsi takhe.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: thyeori ine ya elana ana u fhaṱulula / Vho Derrida vho dzhiiwa sa muhumbulo mufhaṱululi muhulwanesa wa misi yoṱhe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: mayelana ni thiyori ya hunguto / Derrida u tekiwa a ri un’wana wa tintlhari ta ku hunguta swinene hi nkarhi wa yena.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: kumayelana nethiyori yokubhidliza / UDerrida bekathathwa njengomunye umcabangi ombhidlizi omkhulu ngeenkhathi zakhe.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: okunxulumene nethiyori yokuqonda ubudlelwane phakathi kombhalo nentsingiselo / UDerrida wayethathwa njengenye yeengcali ezinkulu eziqonda ubudlelwane phakathi kombhalo nentsingiselo zexesha lakhe.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuhlobene nombono wokuhlaziya / UDerrida wayebhekwa njengomncabangi ohlaziya kakhulu ukubedlula bonke ngesikhathi sakhe.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: condition of becoming smaller, fewer of weaker / There is a clear decrease in his study time, considering the time he spends on his social life. / to continuously become fewer in number or less in value / The population of the area has decreased drastically. / to continuously become fewer in number or less in value / The value of the rand can be expected to decrease when the economy slows down.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: toestand van kleiner, minder of swakker word / Daar is ’n duidelike afname in sy studietyd, in ag genome die tyd wat hy aan sy sosiale lewe bestee.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho tswela pele ho ba nyenyane ka palo kapa tlase ka boleng / Ho ka lebellwa hore boleng ba ranta bo tla fokotseha ha moruo o theoha ka sekgahla sa ona.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go tšwela pele go fokotšega ka palo goba bonnyane ka boleng / Boleng bja ranta bo ka letelwa go fokotšega ge ekonomi e nanya.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: selo go nna se ya kwa tlase ka palo kgotsa ka boleng / Go ka lebelelwa gore boleng jwa ranta bo tla fokotsega fa ikonomi e ntse e ya kwa tlase.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuchubeka kwehle ngelinani noma ngekubaluleka. / Linani lebantfu balendzawo lehlile kakhulu.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: nyimele ya u ṱukufhala, zwi si gathi zwi si na nungo / Hu na u fhungudzea hu re khagala kha tshifhinga tshawe tsha u guda, musi ro sedza tshifhinga tshine a tshi fhedza kha vhutshilo hawe ha matshilisano.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku hunguteka loku yaka emahlweni hi nhlayo kumbe ku va leswitsongo hi nkoka. / Nhlayo ya vanhu va ndhawu leyi yi hungutekile swinene ngopfu.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuragela phambili nokwehlangokwamanani nanyana ngobungako. / Isitjhaba sakileyo ndawo sehle khulu komhlolo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuqhuba kusiba mbalwa ngenani okanye ngaphantsi ngexabiso / Ixabiso lerandi kunokulindela ukuba lehle xa lusehla uqoqosho.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuncipha okuqhubekayo kwenani noma kwesimo / Inani lerandi lingase lilindeleke ukuthi linciphe lapho ezomnotho zehla.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: an official order from a government or ruler that becomes the law / The decree guaranteed freedom of speech for the media.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: ’n amptelike bevel van ’n regering of heerser wat wet word / Die dekreet het vryheid van spraak vir die media gewaarborg.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: taelo ya molao ya mmuso kapa molaodi e fetohang molao. / Taelo e nnetefaditse bolokohi ba puo ya bophatlalatsi.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: taelo ya semmušo go tšwa go mmušo goba molaodi yo a bilego molao. / Taelo e tiišetša tokologo ya polelo ya media/dikuranta.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: taolo ya semmuso go tswa kwa pusong kgotsa go tswa mo go molaodi e e nnang molao. / Taolo e netefaditse gore go nna le kgololesego ya puo mo mmedieng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: umyalelo wahulumende noma wembusi loba ngumtsetfo. / Limyalelo ucinisekise kukhululeka kwekukhuluma kwebetindzaba.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u fhungudzea hu sa imi ha tshivhalo kana mutengo kana tshileme. / Phungudzeo ya vhathu vha afho fhethu yo vha i tshi vhonala.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xileriso xa ximfumo kusuka eka mfumo kumbe mulawuri leswi hetelalaka hi ku va nawu. / Nawu wu tiyisisile ntshuxeko wa mbulavulo wa swihangalasamahungu.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: umlayo osemthethweni obuya kurhulumende nanyana embusweni oba mthetho. / Isimemezelo siqinisekise ikululeko yokukhuluma neembikiindaba.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: umyalelo osesikweni ovela kurhulumente okanye umlawuli ojika ube ngumthetho. / Umthetho uqinisekisa inkululeko yokuthetha malunga nokusasaza iindaba.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: umyalelo osemthethweni ovela kuhulumeni noma kumphathi ogcina usuwumthetho. / Lo myalelo wawuqinisekisa inkululeko yokubika nokukhuluma ngokukhululeka kwabemithombo yezindaba.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: piece of music was written, made or composed for someone you love or respect / I would like to dedicate my first book to my mother. / to devote time and effort to something / He dedicated his life to justice for his fellow human beings. / to devote time and effort to something / beings. / to say that a book, movie or piece of music was written, made or composed for someone you love or respect / I would like to dedicate my first book to my mother.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: sê dat ’n boek, film of musiekstuk geskryf, gemaak of gekomponeer is vir iemand wat jy liefhet of respekteer / Ek wil my eerste boek aan my ma opdra.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho re buka, filimi, kapa sekotwana sa mmino se ngotswe, se etseditswe kapa se qapetswe ho bontsha lerato kapa tlhompho bakeng sa motho kapa batho ba itseng. / Ke rata ho nehelana ka buka ena ya ka ya pele ho mme.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go bolela gore puku, filimi, goba mmino o ngwadilwe, dirilwe, goba hlamilwe go laetša lerato goba tlhompho go motho yo a rilego goba batho. / Ke rata go abela puku ya mathomo go mme wa ka.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go bua go re buka, filimi, kgotsa karolo ya mmino e kwadilwe, e dirilwe, kgotsa e tlhametswe go bontsha lerato kgotsa tlotlo mo mothong yo o rileng kgotsa batho ba ba rileng. / Ke rata go abela mme wa me buka ya me ya ntlha.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kutsi incwadzi, lifilimu, noma umculo wabhalelwa, wentelwa, noma wacanjelwa kukhombisa lutsandvo lwemuntfu noma bantfu labatsite. / Ngitsandza kwetfula incwadzi yami yekucala kumake wami.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u amba uri bugu, fiḽimu, kana muzika zwo ṅwalelwa, u itwa kana u sikiwa hu u itela u sumbedza lufuno kana ṱhonifho kha muthu mugede kana vhathu vhagede. / Ndi tama u hu,lisa mme anga nga bugu yanga ya u tou thoma.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku vula leswaku buku, filimi kumbe xiphemu xa vuyimbeleri xi tsariwile, xi endliwile kumbe xi qambhiwile ku kombisa rirhandzu kumbe nxiximo wa munhu wo karhi kumbe vanhu vo karhi. / Ndzi ta tsakela ku kongomisa buku ya mina yo sungula eka manana wa mina.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: somvumo satlolwa, senziwa, nanyana sabunjwa ukobana sitjengise ithando nanyana ihlonipho mayelana nomuntu othileko nanyana abantu. / Ngithanda ukwethula incwadami yokuthoma kumma wami.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: unikela ixesha nomzamo kwinto. / Unikele ubomi bakhe kubulungisa ukwenzela abanye abantu.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: noma umculo wabhalelwa, wenziwa waqenjelwa ukubonisa ukuhloniph umuntu othile noma abantu abathile. / Ngithanda ukunikela incwadi yami yokuqala kumama wami ongizalayo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to form an opinion based on the information or evidence available / Students often deduce a meaning from a poem that was not intended and cannot be motivated.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: ’n mening vorm gebaseer op die bewyse wat beskikbaar is / Studente lei uit ’n gedig dikwels ’n betekenis af wat nie bedoel is of gemotiveer kan word nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho theha maikutlo hodima dintlha kapa bopaki bo fumanehang. / Baithuti hangata ba theha moelelo wa bona ka dithothokiso.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go hlama kgopolo yeo e theilwego mo go tshedimošo goba bohlatse bjo bo lego gona. / Baithuti ka nako ye nngwe ba ikgopolela ditlhalošo tša bona ka ditheto.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go tlelwa ke mogopolo o o ikaegileng ka tshedimosetso kgotsa bosupi jo bo leng teng. / Ka dinako tse dingwe baithuti ba swetsa bokao jwa bone ka maboko.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kwenta umcondvo lomiselwe kulwatiso noma bufakazi lobukhona. / Titjudeni ngalesinye sikhatsi tititfolela yato inchazelo etinkondlweni.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u shumisa tshifhinga na nungo kha u ita tshithu. / O ṋekedzela vhutshilo hawe kha u lamulelwa ha muthu.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku vumba vonelo leri simekiweke ehenhla ka vuxokoxoko kumbe vumbhoni lebyi nga kona. / Mikarhi yin'wana machudeni ya tikumela nhlamuselo ya vona vinyi hi ku tirhisa switlhokovetselo.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubumba umbono ngelwazi nanyana ubufakazi obukhona. / Abafundi kwesinye isikhathi bazenzela iinhlathululo zabo ngokwekondlo.H176
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwakha uluvo ngokusekelwe kulwazi okanye ubungqina obufumanekayo. / Ngamanye amaxesha abafundi bafikelela ezabo iintsingiselo ngemihobe.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza umbono osuselwe kulwazi oluthile noma kubufakazi obukhona. / Abafundi ngezinye izikhathi bazisusela ezabo izincazelo ngezinkondlo.

xho: ukufikelela kwisigqibo esithile ngokusebenzisa imithetho eqhelekileyo
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: an opinion that has been based on the available information or evidence / From her icy attitude he made the deduction that she is angry with him. / an opinion that has been based on the available information or evidence / Taking into account his poor class attendance and bad marks, the deduction can be made that he is not interested in study or may be struggling with personal problems. / reasoning from the general to the specific / If 80% of teens participate in sports and Alan is a teenager, one can conclude by deduction that Alan is very likely to participate in sports.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: ’n mening gebaseer op die beskikbare inligting of bewyse / Uit haar ysige houding het hy die afleiding gemaak dat sy vir hom kwaad is.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho nahana ho tswa kakaretsong ho isa boemong bo qollehileng / Haeba 80% ya batjha ba nkakarolo dipapading mme Alan ke motjha, motho a ka fihlella sephetho sa hore ho na le monyetla o moholo wa hore Alan a nke karolo dipapading.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: Go fahlela go tšwa go kakaretšo go ya go thwii / mahlalagading ba kgatha tema dipapading gomme Alan o mahlalagading, motho a ka phetha ka gore Alan a ka kgatha tema dipapading.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go akanyetsa dilo ka go leba tse dikgolo gore o bone gore fa di ya kwa tlase di tla felela jang / Fa e le gore 80% ya basha ba tsaya karolo mo metshamekong mme Alan e le mosha, motho a ka fitlhelela tshwetso ya gore go raya gore go ka direga thata gore Alan a tseye karolo mo metshamekong.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kucabanga kusuka kulokuvamile kuya kulokucondzile / Uma 80% welusha ungenelela kumidlalo kantsi Alan ulusha, munye angaphetsa ngekucabanga kutsi Alan kungenteka angenelele kumidlalo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuhumbulele kwa u bva kha u angaredza u ya kha u vha khagala / Arali 80% ya thangana ya murole I tshi dzhenelela kha mutambo na Alan a tshi wela kha thangana ya murole, muthu a nga khunyeledzo ya uri Alan nae ne a nga kha ḓi dzhenelela kha mitambo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: vonelo leri ri kongomisaka eka ku kumeka ka vuxokoxoko kumbe vumbhoni / Ku tekela enhlokweni manghenelo ya yena etlilasini yo ka yangari kahle na timhaka to ka tingari kahle, hunguto wu nga ha endliwa leswaku a nga vi ni ku tsakela eka dyondzo kumbe a nga va a tikeriwa hi swiphiqo swa mahanyelo.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono oqaliswe elwazini elikhona nofana ebufakazini / Ukusukela emmoyeni omakhaza kwasala umkhumbulo wokuthi umsilingile.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukucinga jikelele ukuya koko kungqalileyo / Ukuba ama-80% olutsha athatha inxaxheba kwezemidlalo kwaye uAlan lulutsha, umntu anokugqiba ekubeni ngokufikelela kwisigqibo esithile ngokusebenzisa imithetho eqhelekileyo kunokwenzeka athathe inxaxheba kwezemidlalo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono osekelwe olwazini noma kubufakazi obutholakalayo / Kucatshangelwa ukungabi khona kwakhe kahle ekilasini kanye nemiphumela emibi, kungaphethwa ngokuthi akanaso isithakazelo esifundweni noma ubhekene nezinkinga zomuntu siqu.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: something that exists or happens if you do not change it intentionally / The default option on my computer is to save my work every five minutes. / through lack of opposition rather than conscious choice or action / My opponent may be good, but I will prove that I didn't ascend the championship throne by default.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho etsahala ntle le kganyetso empa ka maikutlo a kgetho kapa ketso / empa ke tla paka hore ha ke a hlwella setulong sena sa ho ba mmampodi ka boiketsahallo.

nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: umdwebo olula wemida, isiketjhe nanyana umtlamo ohlathulula nanyana otjengisa bona into efana (nomtjhini, namarherho, njll.) iqaleka injani nanyana isebenza njani. / Imidwebo encwadini yobunjiniyera wenze umsebenzi wazwisiseka lula.

zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: umdwebo nje olula, isikeshi noma uhlelo oluchaza nomaolubonisa ngezithombe ukuthi into ethile (okungaba umshini, uhlelo, njll.) kubukeka kanjani noma kusebenza kanjani. / Imidwebo esencwadini yezobunjiniyela yenza ukuthi umsebenzi ube lula ukuwuqonda.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: intellectual exchange of ideas, discussion and reasoning by dialogue / The book can be read as a long- running dialectic between individualism and communalism. / intellectual exchange of ideas, discussion and reasoning by dialogue / The book can be read as a long-running dialectic between individualism and communalism.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: intellektuele uitruil van idees, bespreking en beredenering deur middel van dialoog / Die boek kan gelees word as ’n uitgebreide dialektiek tussen individualisme en kommunalisme.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: phapanyetsano ya mehopolo, puisano le mabaka ka moqoqo / Buka e ka balwa jwalo ka dialektiki e nkang nako e telele pakeng tsa tsamaiso e tsepamisitsweng ho batho ka bomong le tsamaiso e tsepamisitsweng tshebedisanong e kopanetsweng ya batho.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: poledišano ya bokgoni ya dikgopolo, poledišano le go fa mabaka ka poledišano / Puku e ka balwa bjalo ka poledišano ye e tšeago nako ye telele gare ga bootee le leago.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go refosana ka dikakanyo, motlotlo le go akanyetsa kgang ka go buisana ka yone / Buka eno o kgona go e bala jaaka kgang e e leng motlotlo o moleele wa thefosano ya dikgopolo mo gare ga ba ba ratang go nna ba le bosi le ba ba ratang go nna ba na le batho.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuntjintjisana kwengcondvo ngemibono, tinkhulumo kanye nekubonisana ngenkhulumo / Incwadzi ingafundvwa ingci nje kugijimisa lulwimisigodzi emkhatsini webunye nebuhlanga.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u sielana ha mihumbulo ya vhuṱali, nyambedzano na kuhumbulele nga kha mufhindulano / Bugu I nga vhalwa sa khanedzano ndapfu ine ya tshimbila vhukati ha vhunṋe na mihumbulo ya vhathu vhanzhi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: i ku cincana ka swidyondzeki miehleketo, mbulavurisano na ku ehleketa hi vukheta hi n’wangulano / Buku yi nga ha hlayiwa tanihi ririn’wana leri fambaka nkarhi wo leha exikarhi ka vuminamina na vunghana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ikghono lokutjhibtjelana ngemibono, ukucocisana nokubeka iinzathu ngokucocisana / Incwadi ingafundwa nangabe – kunekghono lokuthola nokuhlola iqiniso hlangan komuntu nomphakathi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukutshintshiselana okunengqiqo ngezimvo, ingxoxo kunye neengcinga ngengxoxo-mpikiswano / Incwadi inokufundwa njengobuchule bokuxoxa bexesha elide phakathi komthetho siseko wokuzimela kunye nomthetho- siseko wabantu bonke.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukushintshana ngokwengqondo kwemibono, izingxoxo nokubonisana ngokwenkulumo / Incwadi ingafundwa njengolimi lwesigodi oluqhubekayo phakathi kwabantu ngabanye nobumbano.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: making use of logical thinking and discussion / Writers of argumentative texts use a dialectical style when they contradict one another.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: wat logiese denke en bespreking gebruik / Skrywers van argumentatiewe tekste gebruik ’n dialektiese styl wanneer hulle mekaar weerspreek.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho sebedisa mohopolo o utlwahalang le puisano / Bangodi ba mengolo e phehisanang ba sebedisa setaele se dialektikhale ha ba hanyetsana.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go šomiša go nagana ga go kwagala le poledišana / Bangwadi ba dingwalwa tša go tlhohla ba šomiša setaele sa poledišano ge di thulana.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dirisa tsela e e utlwalang ya go akanya le go tlotla / Bakwadi ba ba kwalang ka batho ba le mo kganetsanong ba dirisa mokgwa wa go akanya ka go tlotla fa ba ganetsana.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kusebentisa kucabanga lokunengcondvo kanye nekukhuluma / Babhali bemibhalo lenemphikiswano basebentisa indlela yelulwimisigodzi uma baphikisana.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u shumisa kuhumbulele ku re na thevhekano na nyambedzano / khanedzano vha shumisa tshitaila tsha u hanedzana musi vha tshi ita khanedzano vhukati ha vhone vhaṋe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku tirhisiwa ka miehleketo ya vutlhari na mbulavurisano / Vatsari va matsalwa ya njhekanjhekisano va tirhisa endlelo ra ririn’wana loko va hambana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuzebenzisa indlela ehlelekileko yokucabanga nokucocisana / Abatloli bemitlolo yepikiswano basebenzisa isitayela sekghono lokuthola nokuhlola iqiniso nabaphikisana nomunye.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukusebenzisa ukucinga nengxoxo enengqiqo / Imibhalo eneengxoxo yababhali isebenzisa isimbo sobuchule bokuxoxa xa bephikisana omnye nomnye.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukusebenzisa ukucabanga ngokuhluzekile nengxoxo / Ababhali bemibhalo ephikisanayo basebenzisa isitayela solimi lwesigodi lapho bephikisana.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to divide into two incompatible groups / It is oversimplification to dichotomise the population of a country into opposing poo and rich classes. / to divide into two incompatible groups / It is oversimplification to dichotomise the population of a country into opposing poor and rich classes.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: in twee onversoenbare groepe verdeel / Dit is ’n oorvereenvoudiging om die bevolking van ’n land in ’n arm en ryk klas te verdeel.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho arola ka dihlopha tse pedi tse sa tshwaneng / Ke ho bebofatsa dintho haholo ho dikhotomaesa baahi ba nahana ka dihlopha tse fapaneng tsa mafutsana le barui.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go arola ka diripa tše pedi tša go thulana / Ke go akaretša go arola setšhaba sa naga ka magoro a go thulana a bahloki le bahumi.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go kgaoganya gore e nne ditlhopha tse pedi tse di sa tshwaneng / Ke go se akanyetse dilo kwa teng fa o re naga eno e kgaoganngwa fela ke ditlhopha tse pedi tsa batho, bahumi le bahumanegi.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: Hlukanisa kube ngemacembu lamabili langahambisani / Kukwenta kube malula kakhulu kwehlukanisa kabili bantfu belive babe ngemaklasi lahluphekile nalanjingile.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u khethekanya zwa vha zwigwada zwivhili zwi sa elani / Ndi u leludzesa u fhambanyisa tshitshavha tsha shango tsha vha khanedzano dza vhapfumi vha vhashai.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku ava hi mitlawa yimbirhi yo hambana ngopfu / I olovisowotlulampimo wo ntlawahata nhlayo ya tiko eka ku kaneta vusiwana na mitlawa ya swifumi.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlukanisa ngeengaba ezimbili zeenqhema ezingafaniko / Kubuyekeza ngokudluleleko ukuhlukanisa phakathi abantu benarha ngeengaba ezitjhayisanako zabadobha phasi nabadla kusale.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukohlula ngamaqela amabini angangqinelaniyo / Kukwenza lula ngokugqithisileyo kude kungabikho ntsingiselo ukohlula kubini abemi belizwe ngokweendidi ezichaseneyo zabahluphekayo nabazizityebi.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlukanisa kube amaqembu amabili angahambelani / ukuhlukanisa inani labantu bezwe babe izigaba zabaswelayo nabanothile.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: division into two mutually exclusive groups or classes / It is over-simplification to apply the dichotomy of, for example, white and black, right and wrong, concrete and abstract, male and female to all situations or people. / division into two mutually exclusive groups or classes / dichotomy of, for example, white and black, right and wrong, concrete and abstract, male and female to all situations or people.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: verdeling in twee groepe of klasse wat mekaar onderling uitsluit / Dit is oorvereenvoudiging om die digotomie van byvoorbeeld wit en swart, reg en verkeerd, konkreet en abstrak, manlik en vroulik op alle situasies of mense toe te pas.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho arola ka dihlopha tse pedi tse sa akaretseng ka ho tshwanang / Ke ho bebofatsa dintho haholo ho sebedisa dikhothomi, ka mohlala, mmala o moswe le o motsho, nepahetse le fosahetse, tshwarehang le e sa tshwareheng, e motona le e motshehadi maemong kaofela kapa bathong.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: karolo ka dihlopha goba magoro a mabedi ao a kgethilwego ka go lekana / Ke go akaretša go diriša karolo ya, mohlala, tšhweu le ntsho, thwii le kakaretšo, monna le mosadi go mabaka ka moka goba batho.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go kgaoganya gore e nne ditlhopha tse pedi tse di sa amaneng / Ke go se akanyetse dilo kwa teng go ipolelela fela gore mo maemong otlhe go na le ditlhopha di le pedi fela, ka sekai gore fela go na le basweu le bantsho, ba ba siameng le ba ba sa siamang, dilo tse di bonalang le tse di sa bonaleng, banna le basadi.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuhlukanisa kube ngemacembu noma emaklasi lamabili langafani / Kukwenta kube malula kakhulu kusebentisa kuhlukanisa kabili kwe, sibonelo, mhlophe namnyama, kulungile na akukalungi, kuyaphatseka nalokungacondzakali,lomdvuna nalomsikati kuto tonkhe timo noma bantfu.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: khethekanyo ya vha zwigwada kana vhuimo vhuvhili vhune ha katela / Ndi u leludzesa u shumisa phambano ya, sa tsumbo, ntswu na tshena, zwi fareaho na khumbulelwa, tshisadzi na tshiduna kha nyimele dzoṱhe kana vhathu.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: avanyiso swi va mitlawa kumbe titlilasi timbirhi ta ntolovelo hi ku tirhisana ntsena / I olovisowotlulampimo ku tirhisiwa ka ntlawahata, xikombiso, basa na ntima, lulama na hoxeka, khomeka na anakanyiwa, wanuna na wansati eka swiyimo kumbe vanhu hinkwavo.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlukanisa phakathi ngeenqhema nofana iingaba ezimbili ezilinganako / Kubuyekeza ngokudluleleko ukusebenzisa ukuhlukanisa phakathi, isibonelo, kokumhlophe nokunzima, kwesokudla nokwesincele, okunengi nokuncani, wesilisa nowesifazana kiboboke ubujamo nofana ebantwini.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukohlula ngokwamaqela okanye iindidi ezimbini ezingenakuba khona ngaxeshanye / Kukwenza lula ngokugqithisileyo kude kungabikho ntsingiselo ukusebenzisa ukohlula kubini, umzekelo, mhlophe namnyama, okulungileyo nokungalunganga, okuluqilima nokweengcinga, indoda nowasetyhini kuzo zonke iimeko okanye ebantwini.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlukaniswa kube amaqembu noma izigaba ezimbili ezihlobene / Kungukwenza kube lula ngokweqile ukusebenzisa ukuhlukaniswa, ngokwesibonelo kokumhlophe nokumnyama, okulungile nokungalungile, okunobufakazi nokungaqondakali, owesilisa nowesifazane kuzo zonke izimo noma abantu.

tsn: go dira dilo ditlhopha tse pedi fela
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: characterised by dichotomy / If you reason in terms of X versus Y, your reasoning is dichotomous.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: gekenmerk deur digotomie / As jy in terme van X teenoor Y redeneer, is jou redenasie digtomies.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: e hlwauwang ka dikhothomi / Haeba o nahana ho ya ka X papisong le Y, mohopolo wa hao ke wa dikhothomi
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: e hlalošwa karolo / Ge o fahlela go ya ka X kgahlanong le Y, phahlelo ya gago ke ye e arotšwego.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira dilo ditlhopha tse pedi / Fa o re fela sengwe le sengwe ke di-X le di-Y fela, o dira jaaka e kete ga go na sepe se sengwe fa e se fela ditlhopha tse pedi mo botshelong.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kubonakala ngekuphikisana / Uma ucabanga ngekwe- X lobukene na-Y, kucabanga kwakho kuyaphikisana.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwi ṱalulwaho nga phambano / Arali vha humbula nga X itshi vhambedzwa na Y, kuhumbulele kwavho ndi kwo fhambanaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku tihlawulekisa hi ntlawahato / Loko u anakanya hi mhaka ya X a khomana na Y, miehleketo ya wena i vuntlawahati.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: kubonakala ngomukghwa wokuhlukanisa phakathi / Nangabe unukela ngeenzathu ngokuya kuka-X nawumumadanisa no-Y, ukubeka kwakho iinzathu kuzokuba ngokuhlukako.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: okunokohlula kubini / Ukuba ucinga ngokuka- X ethelekiswa no-Y, ukucinga kwakho kohlulwe kubini.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuchazwa ngokuhlukanisa / Uma ubonisana ngokuthi u-X eqhathaniswa no-Y, ukubonisana kwakho kungokuhlukanisa.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to control how something happens / Her selection of research sites was dictated by availability. / to tell someone how they should behave and what they must do / The education department dictates many things to schools.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: beheer hoe iets gebeur / Haar keuse van navorsingsterreine is deur beskikbaarheid bepaal.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho bolella motho kamoo a lokelang ho itshwara ka teng le seo a lokelang ho se etsa. / Lefapha la thuto le laela dikolo ho etsa dintho tse ngata.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go laola ka moo se sengwe se diregago. / Kgetho ya gagwe ya nyakišišo e be e laolwa ke go hwetšagala.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go laola gore sengwe se tshwanetse go direga jang. / Go nna teng ga gagwe go ne go laola tlhopho ya gagwe ya mafelo a tlhotlhomiso.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kutjela bantfu kutsi bafanele kutsi batiphatse kanjani nekutsi bafanele benteni. / Litiko Letefundze liniketa umyelelo lophocako mayelana nekutsi tikolwa tifanele kutsi tenteni.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u vhudza muthu uri a tshile nga nḓila ifhio na uri a ite mini. / Muhasho wa pfunzo u tou laela/lumbedza zwithu zwikoloni.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku lawula hilaha xin'wana xi humelelaka hakona. / Mahlawulelo yakwe ya tindhawu ta ndzavisiso ya lawuriwile hi vukona bya kona.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukulawula indlela into eyenzeka ngayo. / Ikhetho lakhe lendawo yerhubhululo labe lilawulwa kutholakala kwayo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuxelela abantu indlela ekufuneka baziphathe ngayo okanye into ekufuneka bayenze. / Isebe lemfundo liyalela izinto ezininzi ezikolweni.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: Ukulawula ukuthi into ethile yenzeka kanjani. / Ukukhetha kwakhe amasayithi okucwaninga kwakuphoqwa ukuba khona kwawo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: which aims to teach and impart knowledge and wisdom / Our lecturer uses interesting didactic techniques to keep our attention.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: wat ten doel het om te onderrig en kennis en wysheid oor te dra / Ons dosent gebruik interessante didaktiese tegnieke om ons aandag te behou.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: sepheo ke ho ruta le ho fana ka tsebo le bohlale / Lektjhara e sebedisa mekgwa ya didaktiki ho boloka tsepamiso ya rona.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: yeo e ikemišeditšego go ruta le go tsebiša tsebo le bohlale / Mofahloši wa rena o šomiša dithekniki tšeo di rutago go swara šedi y arena.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira ka boikaelelo jwa go ruta le go naya motho yo mongwe kitso le botlhale / Motlhatlheledi wa rona o dirisa mekgwa e e kgatlhang ya go ruta go dira gore re nne re mo reeditse.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: lehlose kufundzisa kanye nekuniketa lwati kanye nenhlakanipho / Umfundzisi wetfu usebentisa emasu lafundzisako latfokotisako ekusigcina sinakile.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwi ṱoḓaho u funza na u ṋekedza nḓivho na vhuṱali / Mugudisi washu u shumisa tekiniki dza u gudisa uri ri dzule ro futelela.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: lexii kongomisaka eka ku dyondzisa na ku letela vutivi na vutlhari / Muleteri wa hina u tirhisa maendlelo yo tsakisa yo dyondzisa ku endla leswaku hi tshama hi yingisela.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ehlose ukufundisa nokudlulisa ilwazi nokuzwisisa / ilektjhera yethu isebenzisa iqhinga elikarisako ledayidekthiki ukuze silalele.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ejolise ekufundiseni kunye nokufaka ulwazi nobulumko / Umhlohli wethu usebenzisa iindlela zethiyori yokufundisa ezinika umdla ukugcina ukunika kwethu ingqalelo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okuhlosele ukufundisa nokunikeza ulwazi nokuhlakanipha / Umfundisi wethu usebenzisa izindlela zokufundisa ezikwenza ukuthi uhlale ugxilise ingqondo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: something that teaches or intends to teach / All teachers had to take both general didactics and subject didactics as a subject during their training.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: iets wat leer of op onderrig gemik is / Alle onderwysers moes tydens hul opleiding beide algemene didaktiek en vakdidaktiek as vak neem.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ntho e rutang kapa eo sepheo ya rona e leng ho ruta / Matitjhere kaofela a tlameha ho nka bobedi didaktiki ka kakaretso le dithuto tsa didaktiki jwalo ka thuto ya bona nakong ya thupello ya bona.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: se sengwe seo se rutago goba se ikemišeditše go ruta / Barutiši ka moka ba tšea bobedi dithuto tša kakaretšo le dithuto tša morero bjalo ka thutwana nakong ya tlhahlo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: sengwe se se rutang kgotsa se boikaelelo jwa sone e leng go ruta / Barutabana botlhe ba ne ba tshwanelwa ke go ithuta mefuta e mebedi ya mekgwa ya go ruta fa ba sa ntse ba le kwa sekolong, mofuta wa mokgwa wa go ruta ka kakaretso le mofuta wa mokgwa wa go ruta serutwa sengwe le sengwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: lokutsite lokufundzisako noma lokuhlose kukufundzisa / Bonkhe bothishela kwadzingeka kutsi batsatse totimbili totimbili tifundvo letivamile kanye nesifundvo semtemfundvo njengesifundvo ngesikhatsi sekuceceshwa kwabo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshithu tshine tsha funza kana u ṱoḓa u funza / Vhadededzi vhoṱhe vha tea u dzhia vhugudisi nyangaredzi na vhugudisi ha thero sa thero musi wa vhugudisi havho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xin’wana lexi dyondzisiwaka kumbe kunguhatiwaka ku dyondzisiwa / Vadyondzisi hinkwavo va fanele va teka tidyondzo to angarhela na tidyondzo ta timhaka tanihi dyondzonkulu hi nkarhi wa ku leteriwa ka vona.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: enye into efundisako nofana efuna ukufundisa / boke abotitjhere kufanele bathathe kokubili idayidekthiksi zombelele nedayidekthiksi esifundo ngesikhathi sokufunda kwabo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: into efundisayo okanye eneenjongo zokufundisa / yokufundisa jikelele kunye nethiyori yokufundisa isifundo ngexa loqeqesho lwabo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okuthile okufundisayo noma okuhlosele ukufundisa / Bonke othisha kwadingeka ukuthi bathathe izifundo zokufundisa okuvamile kanye nezesifundo esithile phakathi nokuqeqeshwa kwabo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: be different from something or somebody / The third data set differed significantly from the second. / to be different or have a different opinion / They differed so strongly in their view of the problem that they had to call in a facilitator to help them solve the problem.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: anders as iets of iemand wees / Die derde datastel het aansienlik van die tweede verskil.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho fapana kapa ho ba le maikutlo a fapaneng / Ba ne ba fapane haholo maikutlong a bona ka bothata hoo ho ileng ha hlokahala hore ba bitse motsamaisi ho ba thusa ho rarolla bothata.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go fapana go se sengwe goba yo mongwe. / Sete ya boraro ya data goba difiwa e fapana kudu go sete ya data goba difiwa ya bobedi.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go farologana le sengwe kgotsa mongwe. / Sete ya boraro ya deitha e ne e fapaana mo go utlwalang le sete ya bobedi ya deitha.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kwehluka noma kuba nembono lohlukile / wenkinga ngekutsi kwadzingeka babite lochuba leluhlelo abasite ekusombululeni lenkinga.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u fhambana kana u vha na muhumbulo wo fhambanaho / Vha a fhambana vhukuma nga kuvhonele kwavho kwa thaidzo ye vha vha vhe nayo lwe vha vhuya vha tou vhidza mutshimbidzi uri a vha thuse u tandulula thaidzo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku hambana eka xin'wana kumbe munhu un'wana. / Ntlawa wa vunharhu wa switiviwa wu vile lowu hambaneke swinene ni wa switiviwa swa vumbirhi.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhluka kunenye into nanyana nomunye umuntu. / Isede yesithathu yedatha beyihluka khulu kunaleyosede yesibili.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: a way of reading comprehension in which the reader, with the help of thematic keywords, link words and argument markers, follows the course of the theme through the text and better understands the coherence or connection between the thematic units / When one uses discourse reading, it is immediately evident if the author has used the necessary discourse markers to guide the reader through the text. / reading a broad outline of a text / The students do discourse reading to determine the theme of the text and determine how many broad thematic units it consists of. / reading a broad outline of a text / determine the theme of the text and determine how many broad thematic units it consists of. / the reader, with the help of thematic keywords, link words and argument markers, follows the course of the theme through the text and better understands the coherence or connection between the thematic units / When one uses discourse reading, it is immediately evident if the author has used the necessary discourse markers to guide the reader through the text.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho bala taba ka kakaretso e tabeng e ngotsweng / Baithuti ba bala ka kutlwisiso ho fumana sehlooho sa taba e ngotsweng le ho fumana ho na le dikarolo tse akaretsang tse kae tsa sehlooho.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go bala karolo e kgolo ya se se kwadilweng / Baithuti ba bala puo gore ba kgone go bona setlhogo sa se ba se balang le gore ba kgone go bona gore e dirisitse dikarolo dife tsa setlhogo.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: indlela yekufundza sivisiso lapho umfundzi, ngekusitwa ngemagama labalulekile engcikitsi, emagama lachumanisako netimphawu tenkhulumo, kulandzela inkhambiso yengcikitsi ngembhalo kanye nekuvisisa kancono kuhambisana noma kuchumana emkhatsini wemayunithi engcikitsi / Uma lomunye asebentisa kufundza tinkhulumo, kubonakala ngaleso sikhatsi uma umbhali asebentise timphawu tenkhulumo letidzingekile kubonisa umfundzi kumbhalo wonkhe.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: nḓila ya u vhala tholokanyonḓivho ine khayo muvhali, nga thuso ya maipfi a thero, maipfi maṱumani na zwisumbedza khanedzano, a tevhela khoso ya thero nga kha tshibveledzwa na u pfesesa zwavhuḓi vhuthihi kana vhuṱumani vhukati ha yunithi dza thero / Musi muthu a tshi shumisa kuvhalele kwa maṅwalwa, zwi a vhonala na zwenezwo arali muṅwali o shumisa tsumbamaṅwalwa dzo teaho u endedza muvhali nga kha tshibveledzwa.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ndlela yo hlaya xikambelantwisiso leyi eka yona muhlayi, hi ku pfuniwa hi marito ya nkoka ya dyondzonkulu yo karhi, marito yo hlanganisa na valulamisi va njhekanjhekisano, va landzelela khoso ya xikongomelo hi ku tirhisa xitsariwa na ku twisisa ku antswa nxaxamelo kumbe nhlanganiso exikarhi ka swiyenge swa dyondzonkulu yo karhi. / Loko un’wana a tirhisa mahlayelo yo tshamiseka, i vumbhoni loko mutsari a tirhisile hi mfanelo vatshamisekisi ku letela muhlayi hi ku tirhisa xitsariwa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokusizwa magama aqakathekileko adosela emmongweni, aziinhlanganisi namagama akhombisa ukuphikisa, ulandela ummongo ngomtlolo bese uzwisisa ngcono ukulandelana nofana ukuhlangana okuhlona hlangana kweengcezu ezakha ummongo / Nawusebenzisa indlela yokufunda ikulumiswano, bufakazi bamsinyana nangabe umtloli usebenzise ukufunda ikulumiswano okobana arhole umfundi ekufundweni komtlolo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: indlela yokufunda umbhalo ngengqiqo apho umfundi, ngoncedo lwamagama angundoqo anxulumene nomxholo, adibanisa amagama kunye namagama anengxoxo, alandela ukuhamba komxholo kumbhalo ze aqonde ngcoino ukunamathelana okanye ukudibana phakathi kweeyunithi ezinxulumene nomxholo / Xa umntu esebenzisa ukufnda ngoncedo lwamagama angundoqo, kucace ngoko nangoko ukuba umbhali usebenzise amagama adlala indima yokulawula unxibelelwano olubhaliweyo okanye lokuthetha ukukhokela umfundi kumbhalo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: indlela yokufunda indaba lapho umfundi, ngosizo lwamagama ayinhloko wesihloko esithile, exhumanisa amagama nomaka benkulumo, elandela isihloko kuwo wonke umbhalo futhi eqonda kangcono ukuhambisana noma uxhumano phakathi kwamaqoqo wesihloko / Lapho umuntu esebenzisa ukufunda kwesihloko esithile, kubonakala ngokushesha uma umbhalo usebenzise omaka benkulumo abadingekile ukuqondisa umfundi phakathi nawo wonke umbhalo.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go nna se se farologaneng le tse dingwe / Ga ba a farologana go le kalo le dithaka tsa bone ka se ba se dirang. Selo seno sa gore ga go na sepe se se ba tlhaolang mo go ba bangwe se dira gore ba se ka ba kgona go itshupa gore ba ka kgona go atlega.

xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: uphawu lokwahluko / Abohlukanga kakhulu koogxa babo kwinto abayenzayo. Ukungabikho kokwahluka kutshabalalisa ithuba labo, njengabaqalayo, ukuzibonakalisa ngempumelelo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: imfanelo yokuba okwehlukile / Abehlukanga kakhulu kontanga babo kulokho abakwenzayo. Ukwentula ukwehluka konakalisa ithuba labo, njengabasaqala, ukuze baziwe.

ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: isethi yetinkholelo noma ithiyori leyamukelwe njengeliciniso / Dennett uveta kutsi kutsatse ngetulu kwemnyakakhulu kutsi imfundziso ya-Copernicus`1543 kutsi Umhlaba bewungekho emkhatsini wemhlaba kutsi wamukelwe.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: nḓila ya u khethekanya zwithu zwo fhambanaho. / U ya nga Marx, khethekanyo vhukani ha vhapfumi na vhashai ndi yone i no langa zwiṅwe zwithu zwoṱhe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi ku xopaxopa hlamusela vukhongeri byo amukeleka hi ku tshemba ko sungula ko tiya, loku ku landzelaka hi valandzeri va vukhongeri byo karhi kumbe muxaka wa vukhongeri / Eka Kereke ya Roman Catholic, swikholwakholwana swa ku Tika swo tenga ku tlula mpimo swa Mary swi komba leswaku ku hlula hi xitalo i endlelo ro karhi hi tintswalo ta Xikwembu.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukukholwa okuhlathululwa njengeqinileko ngilokho okunzinze ekolweni khulu ngokulandela imithetho yekolo nofana ilawulo lekolo leyo / ESontweni lamaRoma, ikolelo yomBono kaMary wokuHlanzeka ikhombisa ukwehla komrhawu kaZimu.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: iseti yeenkolelo okanye ithiyori yamkelwe njengenyani / UDennett ukhankanya ukuba kwathatha ngaphezulu kwenkulungwane yeminyaka ukuba imfundiso kaCopernicus' 1543 yokuba uMhlaba ayingombindi wehlabathi ukuba yamkelwe.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isethi yezinkolelo noma yemigomo, ikakhulukazi leyo eyenza ingxenye enkulu yomcabango othile, yenkolo, njll. / Inhloso yami kulesi sahluko kuzobe kungesikhona ukucela umfundi ukuthi abe nezimfundiso zepolitiki.

ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwine vhathu vha tenda khazwo, nga maanḓa zwi no yela kha fiḽosofi, vhurereli, nzw. / Ndivho yanga kha ndima iyi ndi u ṱuṱuwedza muvhali ane a vha na lutendo lwa polotiki ifhio na ifhio.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku tumbuluxa rhekhodo ya. / Xihumelelo xi nghenisiwile eka matsalwa hi valavisisi vo hambanahambana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubumba irekhodi yento. / Isehlakalo sitlolwe barhubhululi abahlukahlukeneko.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubhala irekhodi yento. / Isenzeko sibhaliwe kumaxwebhu ngabaphandi beentlobo ngeentlobo.
