eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: concept, theory or view accepted as truth / Jean Jacques Rousseau’s dogma of equality, freedom and fraternity still has a very strong influence today.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: opvatting, teorie of beskouing wat as waarheid aanvaar word / Jean Jacques Rousseau se dogma van gelykheid, vryheid en broederskap het vandag nog ’n baie sterk invloed.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: mohopolo, thiori kapa maikutlo a amohelwang jwalo ka nnete / Dokma ya Jean Jacques Rousseau ya tekatekano, tokoloho le mokgatlo wa batho e ntse e na le tshusumetso e matla haholo kajeno.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kgopolo, teori goba kgopolo yeo e amogelwago go ba nnete / Tumelo ya Jean Jacques Rousseau ya tekatekano, tokologo le setšhaba e na le khuetšo ye kgolo lehono.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: kakanyo, kgopolo kgotsa pono e e amogelwang gore e boammaaruri / Thuto ya ga Jean Jacques Rousseau ya go nna tekatekano, kgololesego le go nna mmogo jaaka setšhaba e sa ntse e na le tlhotlheletso e kgolo thata gompieno.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: umcondvo, ithiyori noma umbono lowamukelwe njengeliciniso / Imfundziso ye-Jean Jacques Rosseau yekulingana, inkhululeko kanye nemkhakha isenawo emandla nanamuhla.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: muṱalukanyo, thyeori kana kusedzele ku sedzwaho sa ngoho / Pfunzothendwa ya Vho Jean Jacques Rousseau ya ndinganyiso, mbofholowo na tshitshavha ḽi kha ḓi vha na ṱhuṱhuwedzo khulwane ṋamusi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: nongoti, thiyori kumbe vonelo leri amukeriwaka tanihi ntiyiso / Swikholwakholwana swa Jean Jacques Rousseau swa nkoka, ntshuxeko na vuxaka swa ha ri ni nkucetelo lowukulu swinene namuntlha.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: umqondo, ithiyori nofana umbono owamukeleka njengeqiniso / Indlela yokukholelwa ekulinganeni, etjhaphulukweni nekolelo efanako kaJean Jacques Rousseau inomthelela oqinileko namhlanjesi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: umba, ithiyori okanye umbono owamkelwe njengenyani / Ixhanti lenkolo likaJean Jacques Rousseau lolingano, inkululeko nobuzalwana liseneempembelelo ezingamandla kakhulu nanamhlanje.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono, inkolelo noma okucatshangwayo okwamukelwa njengokuyiqiniso / Imfundiso engenakuphikiswa kaJean Jacues Rousseau yekhwalithi, inkululeko noma ubuzalwane isenethonya elikhulu kakhulu namuhla.

ven: zwa pfunzothendwa {u farelela kha milayo (pfunzothendwa sa ine ya nga sa ngoho ine ya sa hanedzee / Tshitatamende tsha zwa pfunzothendwa tsha mukomana wanga nga ha rokho, kuḽele na muzika ku a shavhisa vhathu sa izwi a sa ṱanganedzi mihumbulo ya vhaṅwe.}
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: according to a dogma / Jean Jacques Rousseau’s principle of equality, freedom and fraternity is still dogmatically followed in some countries today. / according to dogma / The dogmatic pursuit of any ideology is dangerous and restrictive. / adhering to priciples (dogma) as undeniable truth / My brother’s dogmatic statements about dress, eating habits and music scare people off because he doesn't tolerate opinions other than his own. / completely certain that your beliefs are right / Traditional Christians dogmatically follow the doctrine of Christ’s virgin birth.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: aanhang van beginsels (dogma) asof dit ’n absolute waarheid is / My broer se dogmatiese uitsprake oor kleredrag, eetgewoontes en musiek skrik mense af omdat hy nie ander opinies as sy eie duld nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho ikamahanya le melao (dokma) jwalo ka nnete e keng ya latolwa / Dipolelo tse dokmatiki tsa moreso mabapi le mekgwa ya ho apara, ho ja le mmino ke tse tshosang batho ka hobane ha a mamelle maikutlo a batho ba bang ntle ho a hae.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go obamela maitshwaro (tumelo) bjalo ka nnete ya go se ngangišwe / Ditatamente tša buti wa ka tša tumelo ya mekgwa ya go apara, go ja le mmino di tšhoša batho ka gore ga a kgotlelele dikgopolo tša ba bangwe ntle le tša gagwe.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go tshwarelela mo melaometheong (mo thutong) ka la gore ke boammaaruri jo o ka se kang wa bo ganetsa / Dipolelo tsa ga kgaitsadiake tse a dumelang mo go tsone a gagametse ka moaparo, mekgwa ya go ja le mmino di tshola batho ka gonne ga a amogele dipono tse dingwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kunamatsela kutinchubomgomo (imfundziso)njengeliciniso longeke uliphike / Titatimende temfundziso yemnaketfu mayelana nekugcoka, imikhuba yekudla kanye nemculo kusabisa bantfu ngoba akayibeketeleli imibono yalabanye ngaphandle kweyakhe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi ku ya hi swikholwakholwana / Ku ya lava ntirho hi ku tshemba swikholwakholwana swa miehleketo yin’wana na yin’wana swi na khombo na ku pimeriwa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokuya ngekolelo / Umgomo wokulingana, wetjhaphuluko nekolelo efanako kuseseyikolelo esalandelwa ngezinye iinarha namhlanjesi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokwexhanti lenkolo / Ukulandela ngokungenakuthandatyuzwa kwayo nayiphi ingcinga kuyingozi kwaye kuyanyina.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuthobela izimiso njengeqiniso elingenakuphikiswa / Izinkolelo zikabhuthi wami zenkolelo engenakuphikiswa ezimayelana nendlela yokugqoka, imikhuba yokudla nomculo zibalekisa abantu futhi naye akavumelani neminye imibono ngaphandle kweyakhe.

tsn: go gatelela gore se o se dumelang se boammaaruri
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: the proclamation of something as absolute truth without the necessary evidence / His offensive dogmatisations annoy everyone, because he firmly believes in the truth of his own unproven statements and does not heed anyone else’s opinions. / the proclamation of something as absolute truth without the necessary evidence / everyone, because he firmly believes in the truth of his own unproven statements and does not heed anyone else’s opinions.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: die verkondiging van iets as absolute waarheid sonder die nodige bewyse / Sy aanstootlike dogmatiserings irriteer almal, want hy glo vas in die waarheid van sy eie onbewese uitsprake en slaan nie ag op enigiemand anders se opinies nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho bolela hore ntho e itseng ke nnete e feletseng ntle le ho fana ka bopaki bo hlokahalang / Didokmatiseishene tsa hae tse kgopisang di tena e mong le e mong, ka hobane o dumela ka matla nnete ya hae e se nang dipolelo tsa bopaki mme o hlokomoloha maikutlo a batho ba bang.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tsebišo ya se sengwe bjalo ka nnete ya go felelela ntle le bohlatse bjo bo hlokegago / Ditumelo tša gagwe tša go befediša di selekiša batho ka moka, ka gore o dumela kudu go nnete ya ditatamente tša gagwe tšeo di se a kgonthišwago gomme ga nyake dikgopolo tša batho ba bangwe.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go bolela gore sengwe se boammaaruri ntle le go nna le bosupi jo bo tlhokegang / Go bua ga gagwe dilo a di gatelela gore di boammaaruri go sera batho botlhe, ka gonne o dumela mo a sa batleng go ganediwa gore dipolelo tsa gagwe tse di sa tlhomamisiwang di boammaaruri mme ga a batle go utlwa dipono tsa ba bangwe botlhe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kumenyetelwa kwalokutsite njengeliciniso lelingaphikiswa ngaphandle kwebufakazi lobudzingekile / Inkhulumo yakhe yekuhlasela inyanyise wonkhe umuntfu, ngoba ukholelwa kakhulu ecinisweni letitatimende takhe letingacinisekiswa kantsi akawuyihloniphi imibono yalabanye bantfu.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u bula uri tshithu ndi ngoho vhukuma hu si na vhuṱanzi ho teaho / U ita pfunzothendwa hawe hu shonisaho hu dina vhathu vhoṱhe, ngauri u tenda tshoṱhe kha ngoho ya zwitatamennde zwawe zwi songo khwaṱhisedzwa nahone ha dzhieli nṱha muhumbulo wa muthu na muthihi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xitiviso xa swin’wana tanihi ntiyiso wa xiviri handle ka vumbhoni byo fanela / Vukholwakholwana bya yena byo khunguvanyisa bya nyenyetsa, hikuva u tshemba hi ku nga tsekatseki eka ntiyiso wa yena n’wini wa switatimente leswi nga tiyisisiwangiki na ku ka a nga landzeleli switsundzuxo swa mavonelo ya munhu un’wana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukumenyezelwa kwento njengeqiniso ngaphandle kobufakazi obufaneleko / ngombana ukholelwa khulu eqinisweni leentatimende zakhe ezinganabufakazi begodu akathathi imibono yabanye abantu.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubhengeza into njengenyani egqibeleleyo ungenabo ubungqina obuyimfuneko / Ukungathandabuzi kwakhe okunohlaselo kucaphukisa wonke umntu, kuba ukholwa ngamandla kwinyaniso yakhe yeengxelo zakhe ezingaqinisekiswanga kwaye akamameli zimvo zakhe nabani na ongomnye.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukumenyezelwa kokuthi njengeqiniso elingenakuphikiswa ngaphandle kobufakazi / Inkolelo yakhe engenakuphikiswa idina bonke abantu, ngoba ukholelwa ezitatimendeni zakhe ezinganabo ubufakazi futhi akalaleli imibono yabanye abantu.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to accept something as the truth without evidence / Centuries ago, Jean Jacques Rousseau dogmatised that the principle of equality, freedom and fraternity is the only valid truth. / to define or proclaim doctrines / The less we dogmatise about religion, the less we will be influenced by second-rate commentaries.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: iets as waarheid aanvaar sonder bewyse / Jean Jacques Rousseau het eeue gelede gedogmatiseer dat die beginsel van gelykheid, vryheid en broederskap die enigste geldige waarheid is.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho amohela ntho e itseng jwalo ka nnete ntle le bopaki / Makgolo a dilemo a fetileng, Jean Jacques Rousseau o ile a dokmathaesa hore molao wa tekatekano, tokoloho le mokgatlo wa batho ke ona feela nnete e sebetsang.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go amogele se sengwe bjalo ka nnete ntle le bohlatse / o dumetše gore boitshwaro bja tekatekano , tokologo le setšhaba ke tšona fela nnete ye e kgonthišitšwego.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go amogela gore sengwe se boammaaruri o ntse o se na bosupi / Makgolo a dingwaga a a fetileng, Jean Jacques Rousseau o ne a dumela ntle le bosupi gore molaomotheo wa tekatekano, kgololesego le go nna mmogo jaaka setšhaba ke jone fela boammaaruri jo bo tshwanetseng go amogelwa.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuchaza noma kumemetela timfundziso / Nasingakhuluma kancane ngenkholo, kungehla nekufakwa ngumoya kuphawula kwelizinga lesibili.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ṱalutshedza kana u ita mbilo ya pfunzothendwa / Arali ra nga paṱekanya zwiṱuku na pfunzothendwa nga ha vhurereli, ri ḓo ṱuṱuwedzwa zwiṱuku nga vhadzia u bula mihumbulo vha phimo ya vhuvhili.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku hlamusela kumbe tivisa ximfumo madyondziselo / Ku va hi tshemba katsongo mayelana ni vukhongeri, hi ta va ni nkucetelo wutsongo hi tinhlamuselo ta vonelo ra mpimo wa vambirhi.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlathulula nofana ukumemezela iimfundiso / Ukuphungula kwethu ukukholwa ngaphandle kobufakazi, kuphungula ukuba bothathekile.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuchaza okanye ukubhengeza iimfundiso / Okukhona singathandabuzi ngenkolo, kokukhona singaphenjelelwa kakhulu ziincwadi zenkcazo zezinga lesibini.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuchaza noma ukumemezela izimfundiso / Lapho simemezela kambalwa ngenkolelo, yilapho sizothonywa kancane khona izincazelo ezimbi.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: area of knowledge or activity / Based on his research, the domain of epidemic diseases of plants was opened up to investigation.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: gebied van kennis of ’n aktiwiteit / Op grond van sy navorsing is die domein van epidemiese siektes van plante vir ondersoek oopgestel.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: karolo ya tsebo kapa mosebetsi. / Ho ya ka diphuputso tsa hae, karolo e kgolo ya sewa sa malwetse a dimela e ile ya sibollwa bakeng sa dipatlisiso.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: lefelo la tsebo goba ditiro. / E theilwe mo go nyakišišo ya gagwe, legoro la malwetši a leuba la dibjalo le ile la bulelwa go nyakišišwa.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: karolo ya kitso kgotsa ya tiro nngwe. / Go ya ka tlhotlhomiso ya gagwe, lephata la kitso la malwetse a leroborobo a dijalo le buletswe gore le sekasekiwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngumkhakha welwati noma umsebenti. / Ngekuya kwelucwaningo lwakhe, umkhakha wekubhedvuka kwetifo tetihlahla sewuvule luphenyo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u sika rekhodo ya. / Kuitele uku kwo ṅwalwa nga vhaṱoḓisisi (vharisetshi) vho fhambanaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xivandla xa vutivi kumbe nghingiriko. / Leswi simekiweke ehenhla ka ndzavisiso wakwe, xitiko xa ntungu wa mavabyi ya swimila xi funungurile ndzavisiso.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: indawo yelwazi nanyana umsebenzi. / Ngokuyama erhubhululweni lakhe, iziko lelwazi ngamalwele arhatjhekako weentjalo lavulwa ukobana kuphenywe.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ummandla wolwazi okanye womsebenzi. / Ngokusekelwe kuphando lwakhe, ummandla wendyikityha yezifo zezityalo uvulelwe uphando.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: indawo yolwazi noma yomsebenzi. / Kwathi uma sekususelwa ocwaningweni lwakhe, kwase kuvulwa umunxa wezifo eziningi zezilwane ukuze kuphenywe ngazo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: influence over something or someone / It was important to France to dominate the valleys of the Alps and the Rhine. / to be the most important person or thing in a situation / AIDS issues dominate debates on primary health care in South Africa. / to control or have a strong influence over something or someone / It was important to France to dominate the valleys of the Alps and the Rhine.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: die belangrikste persoon of ding in ’n situasie wees / Kwessies oor vigs oorheers debatte oor primêre gesondheidsorg in Suid-Afrika.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: matla hodima ntho e itseng kapa motho ya itseng. / Ho ne ho le molemo hore France e laole dikgohlo tsa Alps le Rhine.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ba motho yo bohlokwa kudu goba dilo mo lebakeng. / Taba ya AIDS e rena mo go dipoledišano mo go tlhokomelo ya motheo ya tša maphelo mo afrika Borwa.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go nna motho wa botlhokwa thata kgotsa selo sa botlhokwa thata mo maemong a a rileng. / Dintlha ka ga AIDS di fenya dipuisano ka ga tlhokomelo ya pholo ya motheo mo Afrikaborwa.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kulawulanoma kuba nemtselela lonemandla entfweni noma emntfwenini lotsite. / Bekubalulekile kutsi Ifulansi ibuse tihosha te-Alps neRhine.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u laula kana u vha na lulango lwo kalulaho kha tshiṅwe tshithu kana muthu. / Zwo vha zwi na ndeme kha Fura uri ḽi lange magovha a thavha dza Alps khathihi na mulambo wa Rhine.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku lawula kumbe ku va ni nkucetelo lowukulu ehenhla ka xin'wana kumbe un'wana. / A swi ri swa nkoka ku va Furhwa ri fuma mikova ya Alps na Rhine.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuba nelawulo nanyana ukuba nomthelela onamandla kwenye into nanyana komunye umuntu. / Kwabe kuqakathekile kuFrance ukulawula ngamandla imirhoba ye-Alps kanye ne-Rhine.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukulawula okanye ukuba nefuthe elingamandla phezu kwento okanye umntu. / Kwakubalulekile kwiFransi ukulawula iintlambo ze-Alps ne- Rhine.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuba ngumuntu obaluleke kakhulu noma into ebaluleke kakhulu esimweni esithile. / Izindaba ezithinta ingculazi yizona ezihamba phambili kwizindaba zezempilo lapha eNingizimu Afrika.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: word pair with almost the same form and meaning, e.g. CRITICAL and CRITICISM, PAIR and COUPLE / Doublets are word pairs with almost the same form and meaning, for instance skirt and shirt, pair and couple.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: woordpaar waarvan die vorm en betekenis byna dieselfde is, bv. BROS en BROOS, AMBAG en AMP, KRITIES en KRITIEK / Doeblette is woordpare met byna dieselfde vorm en betekenis, soos bros en broos, ambag en amp.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: para ya mantswe a batlang a tshwana ka sebopeho le ka moelelo, ka mohlala,CRITICAL le CRITICISM, PAIR le COUPLE / Di-doublete ke para ya mantswe a batlang a tshswana ka sebopeho le ka moelelo, ka mohlala, skirt le shirt, pair le couple.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: phere ya lentšu ya go nyaka go swana ka sebopego letlhalošo, mohlala, BOHLOKWA LE TSHEKATSHEKO, PHERE LE BALEKANE / Dipedifatšo ke diphere tša mantšutša sebopego le tlhalošo ya go nyaka go swana, go swana le sekhethe le gempe, phere le balekane.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: mafoko a a batlang a tshwana ka sebopego le bokao, ka sekai, LALA le ROBALA, LWALA le BOBOLA / Mafoko-tshwani ke mafoko a a tsamayang bobedi le bobedi a a batlang a na le sebopego kgotsa bokao jo bo tshwanang, ka sekai, go robala le go lala.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ligama lihambisana ngakubili cishe neluhlobo lolufanako kanye nenchazelo, sib. SOLA na GCEKA, NGABABILI na TITSANDZANI / Kuphindzeka ngemagama lahamba ngamabili cishe lakhiwe nalachaza lokufanako, sibonelo siketi nelishodo, babili netitsandzani.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: phere dza maipfi dzi re na zwivhumbeo na ṱhalutshedzo, sa tsumbo BUVHI na BUFHO, TSHIGWADA na THIMU / Maipfi a elanaho ndi phere dza maipfi dzine dza vha na tshivhumbeo na Ṱhalutshedzo dzine dza elana, sa tsumbo tshikete na tshikwekwethe, tshigwada na thimu.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: marito mambirhi ya lavile ku fana hi xivumbeko na nhlamuselo, xk VUXOKOXOKO na VUXOPAXOPI, PHERE na KHAPULU / Swimbirhi i marito mambirhi lama ya laveke ku fana hi xivumbeko na nhlamuselo, ku fana na sala na sala, bangi na bangi.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: igama elikhambisana nelinye igama pheze lifane ngokwakheka nangehlathululo, isib. MEDA noMADANISA, KHOLWA no IKOLELO / Amagamambili magama anjengegama elikhambisana nelinye pheze elakheke okufanako godu nangehlathululo, isibonelo GUBUZELA neNGUBO, UMNINIKHAYA noSOMNINI.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: isibini samagama aphantse abe nohlobo kunye nentsingiselo efanayo, umzkl. KHETHA noKHETHO, SEZA noSELISA / Amagama avela kwingcambu enye zizibini zamagama aphantse abe nohlobo kunye nentsingiselo efanayo, umzekelo vuka novuma, iisenti neengqekembe.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: igama eliphindwe kanye nenhlobo noma incazelo efanayo, isb. AMANZI NAMAZINYO, INDLELA NENDLEKO / Impinda amagama ayiqoqo acishe abe uhlobo noma incazelo efanayo, ngokwesibonelo ikati isiketi, indlela nendleko.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: a degree of distrust / Some doubt has been cast upon the authenticity of the painting. / to be sceptical about / There is sufficient evidence to doubt her claims.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: skepties oor iets wees / Daar is voldoende bewyse om haar bewerings te betwyfel.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho hwayahwaya ka pelaelo ka ho hong. / Ho na le bopaki bo lekaneng ba ho belaela dipuo tsa hae.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kgonono, kelo ya go se tshephagale. / Go bile le pelaelo ka ga bonnete bja seswantšho.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go sa tshepe sengwe/mongwe. / Go na le bosupi jo bo lekaneng go ka belaela dintlha tsa gagwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kungetsembi. / Kunekubata ngalopende kutsi unguwona wona.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u sa kholwa. / Hu na vhuṱanzi vhunzhi hu no ita uri vha timatime mushumo wawe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku kanakana mayelana ni. / Ku ni vumbhoni byo enela bya ku kanakana swikoxo swakwe.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuzaza ngento ethileko. / Kunobufakazi obaneleko ukobana sizaze lokho akutjhoko.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuthandabuza malunga nento. / Kukho ubungqina obaneleyo bokuthandabuza amabango akhe.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukungavumi kalula into ethile. / Kunobufakazi obanele ukuthi siyingabaze le nto ayishoyo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: any version of a document before the final version / I have completed the first draft of my assignment. / any version of a document before the final version / You must submit your first draft to your tutor. / first (preliminary) plan or design / The government tabled the proposal as a draft for a first round of discussions. / to compile a first or preliminary version / She drafted a preliminary version of the report. / to compile a first or preliminary version / report. / version / I have completed the first draft of my assignment. / version / report.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: eerste (voorlopige) plan of ontwerp / Die regering het die voorstel as konsep vir ’n eerste besprekingsronde ter tafel gelê.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: kgatiso efe kapa efe ya tokomane pele ho kgatiso ya ho qetela / Ke qetile moralo wa pele wa kabelo ya ka ya mosebetsi.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kgatišo ye nngwe le ye nngwe ya tokumente pele ga kgatišo ya mafelelo / Ke feditše kakanywa ya mathomo ya mošomo wa ka.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: mofuta ope wa tokomane o o tlang pele ga mofuta wa bofelo. / O tshwanetse go romela kakangwa ya gago ya ntlha kwa go mofatlhosi wa gago.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuhlanganisa sihumusho sekucala. / Wente luhlaka lwekucala lwembiko.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: pulane ya u thoma (thangeli) kana nyolo / Muvhuso wo ṋekedza makumedzwa sa mvetomveto ya nyambedzano dza luṱa lwa u thoma.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kumbe wa le masunguleni. / U mpfapfarhutile xivumbeko xa masungulo ya xiviko.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: buthelela ihlangothi lokuthoma nanyana elithomako. / Utlame ihlangothi elithomako lombiko.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuyila inguqulo yokuqala. / Uyile inguqulo yokuqala yengxelo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: noma iyiphi inguqulo yedokhumenti ngaphambi kwenguqulo yokugcina / Ngiqede okusalungiswa okokuqala kwesabelo sami.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: view about or state of duality / Anthropological dualism teaches, for instance, that man is composed of soul and body, while physical dualism teaches that reality is composed of spirit and matter.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: standpunt oor of toestand van tweeledigheid / Antropologiese dualisme leer byvoorbeeld dat die mens uit siel en liggaam bestaan, terwyl fisiese dualisme leer dat die werklikheid uit gees en materie bestaan.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: maikutlo kapa boemo ba bobedi / Dualisimi ya anthropoloji e ruta hore, ka mohlala, motho o na le moya le mmele, ha dualisimi ya mmele e ruta hore ntho ya sebele ke etswa ke moya le metha.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kgopolo ka ga goba maemo a kganetšo / Kganetšo ya anthropolotšhikhale e ruta, go swana le, gore motho o bopilwe ka moya le mmele, mola kganetšo ya sebopego e ruta gore nnete e bopilwe ka moya le selo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go leba kgotsa boemo jwa go bona dilo di tsamaya ka bobedi le bobedi / Thuto ya motho le kgopolo ya gore dilo di tsamaya ka bobedi le bobedi e ruta gore ka sekai, motho o na le moya le mmele, mme thuto ya dilo tsa tlholego le kgopolo ya go tsamaya ga dilo ka bobedi le bobedi e ruta gore dilo mo botshelong di gabedi, selo sa moya le sa nama.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: umcondvo ngesimo sebubili / Bubili be-anthropoloji bufundzisa, sibonelo, kwekutsi indvodza yahiwe ngemphefumulo nemtimba, kantsi bubili bemtimba bufundzisa kutsi liciniso lakhiwe ngumphefumulo kanye nendzaba.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuvhonele nga ha kana ndinganahuvhili ya tshiimo / Ndinganahuvhili ya anthrophoḽodzhi i funza, sa tsumbo, uri munna u na muya na muvhili, ngeno ndinganahuvhili ya ṋama I tshi funza uri ngoho I na muya na zwithu.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: vonelo mayelana ni kumbe xiyimo xa ximbirhi / Mutivamidhavuko wa xiyimo xa ximbirhi u dyondzisa, xikombiso, leswaku munhu u vumbiwa hi moya ni miri, loko xiyimo xa ximbirhi xi dyondzisa leswaku xiviri xi vumbiwa hi moya na nchumu.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono nofana ubujamo obungabubili / Ifundo ngevelaphi, ipilo namasiko wabantu ifundisa ngegamambili, isibonelo, indoda ibunjwe mmoya nomzimba, ngakelinye ihlangothi igamambili lomzimba lifundisa bonyana iqiniso lakheke ngommoya nenyama.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono okanye imeko yokuba nokubini / umzekelo, ukuba umntu wenziwe ngomoya nomzimba, ngexa ukuba nokubini komzimba kufundisa ukuba inyani yenziwe ngomoya nento buqu.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono noma isimo sobumbili / Ngokwesibonelo isayensi yokuhlalisana kwabantu yesimiso esikabili ifundisa ukuthi umuntu ungumphefumulo nomzimba, kuyilapho ubumbili bangempela bufundisa ukuthi ukuphila kwenziwe ngomoya nangodaba.

nso: ganetšago {yeo e nago le thoto ye e ganetšago / gore monagano wa motho o bobedi ye e ganetšago le ye e feletšego, ka gore maatla a oa ganetšago Yin (mosadi, leswiswi, go se be le mafolofolo le Yang di a hlahlolana.}
tsn: kgopolo ya dilo go tsamaya ka bobedi le bobedi
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: which possesses the property of duality / The Chinese and especially the Taoists believe that the human psyche is both dualistic and holistic, because the opposing forces Yin (female, dark, passive) and Yang (male, light and active) complement each other.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: wat die eienskap van tweeledigheid besit / Die Chinese en veral die Taoïste meen dat die psige van die mens beide dualisties en holisties is, omdat die opponerende magte Yin (vroulik, donker, passief) en Yang (manlik, lig en aktief) mekaar aanvul.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: e nang le sebopeho sa dualithi / Matjhaena mme ka ho kgethehileng BaTaoiste ba dumela hore kelello ya motho ke bobedi dualistiki le holistiki, ka hobane ke matla a hanyetsanang Yin (e motshehadi, botsho, ya sa sebetseng) le Yang (e motona, kganya le ya mafolofolo) ba a tlatsana.
nso_pos_or_descriptor: monna, lesedi le go ba le mafolofolo / adjective
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: dilo tse di tsamayang bobedi ka bobedi / Matšhaena, mme bogolo jang Ma-Tao ba dumela gore mogopolo wa motho o dikarolo tse di tsamayang ka bobedi ka bobedi mme gape o feletse, ka gonne matlhakore a mabedi a a ganetsanang Yin (mosadi, lefifi, nna fela) le Yang (monna, lesedi le go tlhagafala) a a tlatsana.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: lokucuketse bubili bemphahla / EmaChina kanye ikakhulukati emaTaoist akholelwa kutsi ingcondvo yemuntfu ibubili kantsi iphelele, ngoba emandla laphikisako Yin (lomsikati, mnyama, longasebenti) na Yanga (mdvuna, uyakhanya na uyasebenta) kuyasebentisana.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshine tsha vha na mbonalo dza ndinganahuvhili / maanḓa vha Taoists vha tenda uri muya wa muthu u na ndinganahuvhili na u vha mukhethwa, ngauri nungo dzi hanedzana Yin (mufumakadzi, swiswi, dzika) na Yang (munna, tshedza na zwi imaimaho) zwi a tikedzana.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: lexi nga ni xivumbeko xa ximbirhi / Muchayina naswona ngopfungopfu Taoists u tshemba leswaku moya wa munhu i xivumbeko xa ximbirhi na vunkwabyo, hikuva mavuthu yo kaneta ya Yin (waxisati, ntima, nonoka) na Yang (waxinuna, rivoni na gingirika) ya tirhisana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: emumethe indawo yokubili / AmaTjhayina godu khulukhulu ama-Taoists akholelwa ekutheni ukucabanga komuntu kukokubili godu kuphelelele ngokukodwa, ngombana iingcenye eziphikisako ezinjenge-Yin (isifazana, -nzima, -buthaka) ne-Yang (isilisa, - khanya, msinya) kuyakhambisana.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: enophawu lokuba nokubini / AmaTshayina kwaye ingakumbi iiTaoists bakholelwa ekubeni umoya womntu unokubini kunye nokupheleleyo kuba amandla achasayo iYin (owasetyhini, ubumnyama, angasebenziyo) kunye neYang (indoda, ukukhanya nokusebenzayo) asebenza kunye.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okubonisa ukuba nesimo esikabili / AmaShayina ikakhulukazi amaTaoist akholelwa ukuthi umuntu unesimiso esikabili nesiphelele, ngoba amandla aphikisanayo u-Yini (owesifazane, onobumnyama futhi othulile), no- Yang (owesilisa, okhanyayo nonamandla) bayahambisana.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: condition, property or fact that something consists of two members or constituents / Man is widely seen as a duality of mind and body.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: toestand, eienskap of feit dat iets uit twee lede of bestanddele bestaan / Die mens word algemeen gesien as ’n tweeledigheid van verstand en liggaam.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: boemo, sebopeho kapa ntlha ya hore ntho e itseng e na le ditho tse pedi kapa dikarolo / Motho o bonwa haholo jwalo ka dualithi ya monahano le mmele.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: boemo, thoto goba ntlha ya gore se sengwe se na le maloko a mabedi goba bakgethi / Motho ka bophara o bonwa bjalo ka kganetšo ya monagano le mmele.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: boemo kgotsa kgang ya gore sengwe se na le malokololo a mabedi / Motho o itsiwe gotlhe gore o na le dikarolo tse pedi e leng mogopolo le mmele.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: simo, imphahla noma liciniso lekutsi lokutsite kunemalunga lamabili noma tigodzilukhetfo / Indvodza ibonwa kabanti njengebubili bemcondvo kanye nemtimba.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: nyimele, mbonalo kana mbuno ya uri tshihu tshi na miraḓo mivhili kana zwipiḓa / Muthu kanzhi u vhonala e vhuvhili ha muhumbulo na muvhili.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xiyimo, xivumbeko kumbe mhaka ya xin’wana yi vumbiwa hi swirho swimbirhi kumbe valandzeleri / Munhu u vonaka hi ku hetiseka tanihi vumbirhi bya miehleketo na miri.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ubujamo, ipahla nofana amaqiniso wokuthi into inamalunga amabili nofana iingcezu ezimbili / Indoda ibonwa ngabanengi njengomuntu obunjwe ngakubili okuyingqondo nomzimba.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: imeko, ipropati okanye inyani yokuba into inamalungu okanye amaqela amabini / Umntu ubonwa kakhulu njengonokubini kwengqondo nomzimba.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isimo, isakhiwo noma inkolelo yokuthi okuthile kunamalungu noma izakhi ezimbili / Umuntu ubekwa njengesimiso esikabili sengqondo nomzimba.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: the period of time during which something continues / For the duration of the lecture, students are not allowed to leave the lecture hall.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: die tydperk waartydens iets voortduur / Vir die duur van die lesing mag studente nie die lesingsaal verlaat nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: nako eo ntho e itseng e ntseng e etsahala ka yona. / Ka nako ya thupello, baithuti ha ba dumellwe ho tswaka hara holo ya thupello.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: lebaka la nako yeo se sengwe se tšwelago pele. / Go nako ya thutišo, baithuti ba be sa dumelelwa go tšwa ka holong ya boithutelo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: paka e sengwe se tswelelang mo go yone. / Ka paka ya tlhatlhelelo, baithuti ba ne ba sa letlelelwe go tswa mo ntlolehalahaleng e ba rutelwang mo go yone.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: sikhatsi lesitsatfwa yintfo letsite. / Sonkhe sikhatsi sekufundza, titjudeni betingakavumeleki kuphuma eholeni lekufundza.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: lwa tshithu lwa u ranga hu sa athu ḓa tsha vhukuma (tshonetshone). / Ni tea u rumela mugudisi waṋu mvetamveto ya u thoma.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: nguva ya nkarhi laha xin'wana xi yaka emahlweni. / Hi nkarhi wa vuleteri machudeni a ya nga pfumeleriwi ku huma eholweni yo letelela kona.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: isikhathi esibekiweko sokuragela phambili kwento. / Ngokwesikhathi sesifundwesi, abafundi bebangakavunyelwa ukobana baphume eholweni yokufundela.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: isithuba sexesha xa into ethile iqhubeka. / Ngexesha lomgama wesifundo, abafundi bebengavuyelwa ukushiya iholo lokufunda.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isikhathi esithile okwenzeka ngaso into ethile noma isikhathi into ethile eqhubeka ngaso. / Ngokuqhubeka kwesikhathi sonke sesifundo, abafundi babengavunyelwe ukuthi bashiye kwihholo okufundelwa kulo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: active, energetic and continuously moving or changing / Educational reform has to be a dynamic process to keep up with students’ changing needs. / active, energetic and continuously moving or changing / process to keep up with students’ changing needs. / full of energy, new and exciting ideas, and ambitious / He was a dynamic doctor who revitalised the whole clinic. / react and change one another, usually plural. / His book was the first successful attempt to deal with the dynamics of a system. / something that causes change or action / Capitalism is a dynamic of economic change. / the way in which things or people behave, react and change one another, usually plural. / His book was the first successful attempt to deal with the dynamics of a system.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: aktief, energiek en voortdurend aan die beweeg of verander / Onderwyshervorming moet ’n dinamiese proses wees om met die veranderende behoeftes van studente tred te hou.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: mokwa oo dintho kapa batho ba ishwarang ka ona, ba etsang le ho fetohelana, hangata ka bongata. / Buka ya hae e ne e le boiteko ba pele ba ho sebetsana le dimakatso tsa tshebetso.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: mafolofolo, maatla le go tšwelapele go sepela goba go fetoga. / Mpshafatšo ya thuto e swanetše go tshepetšo ya go fetogafetoga go swara diphetogo tša dinyakwa tša baithuti.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: -matlhagatlhaga, tletseng maikatlapelo le go tswelela go suta kgotsa go fetoga. / Tokafatso ya thuto e tshwanetse go nna tirego e e mafolofolo go lepalepana le ditlhokego tse di fetogang tsa baithuti.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: intfo leyenta kutsi kube netingucuko noma kutsi kwenteke lokutsite. / Inchubo yekuba nemali lenyenti yekuchuba emabhizinisi inemandla ekuntjintjeni umnotfo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: nḓila ine zwithu kana vhathu ha ḓifara ngayo kana vha tshilisana ngayo. / Bugu yavho yo vha yone ya u thoma u kona u edzisa u amba nga mukhwa wa dzisisiṱeme.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ndlela leyi xin'wana kumbe vanhu va tikhomaka hayona, va angulaka no hundzukelana hayona, ngopfungopfu hi vunyingi. / Buku yakwe yi vile matshalatshala yo sungula ku tirhana ni ku cinca ka sisiteme.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuba namandla, amatjha kanye nemibono begodu nokuzimisela. / Bekangudorhodera ohlakaniphileko owavuselela itlinigi yoke.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuba namandla apheleleyo, izimvo ezidala ihlombe nezivuselela umnqweno. / Wayengugqirha onamandla okuvuselela yonke ikliniki.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: into ebangela uguquko noma isenzo esithile. / Ukuba ugombela kwesabo yiyona nto eyimbangela yoguquko kwezomnotho.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: the ways in which things or people behave, react and affect one another / His book was the first successful attempt to analyse the dynamics of the system.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: die maniere waarop dinge of mense optree, reageer en mekaar beïnvloed / Sy boek was die eerste suksesvolle poging om die dinamika van die stelsel te belig.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ditsela tseo dintho kapa batho ba itshwarang ka yona, ba arabelang le ho amana / Buka ya hae e bile boiteko ba pele ba ileng ba atleha ba ho hlopholla didaenamiki tsa sistimi.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ditsela tšeo dilo goba batho ba itshwarago, ba arabago le go amana / Puku ya gagwe e bile maitekelo a mathomo a katlego go sekaseka ditaenamiki tša lenaneo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: ditsela tse dilo kgotsa batho ba itshwarang ka tsone, ba tsibogang ka tsone e bile ba dirisanang ka tsone / Buka ya gagwe e ne e le yone ya ntlha e a neng a leka mo go yone go tlhalosa tsela e thulaganyo e dirang ka yone mme a atlega.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: tindlela tintfo noma bantfu batiphatsa ngayo, baphendvula nalabatsintsa ngayo labanye / Incwadzi yakhe yaba ngumzamo wekucala loyimphumelelo ekuhlatiyeni emandla enchubo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: nḓila dzine vhathu kana zwithu zwa ḓifara ngaho, u nyanyuwa na u kwama zwiṅwe / Bugu iyi yo vha ndingedzo dza u fhedzisela dza u saukanya phambano dza sisiṱeme.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tindlela leti eka tona swilo kumbe vanhu va tikhomaka hakona, angulaka na ku khumba munhu un’wana. / Buku ya yena ku ringetiwile ku yi humesiwa ro sungula ku xiyaxiya hanyelo ra miri.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: iindlela abantu nofana izinto ziziphatha ngazo, zenza ngakho nokuthi zithinta njani abanye abantu nofana izinto / Incwadakhe bekukulinga kwakhe kokuthoma kokutsenga amatjhuguluko wehlelo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: iindlela leyo izinto okanye abantu baziphatha ngazo, benza izinto kwaye bachaphazelana ngazo / Incwadi yakhe yaba ngumzamo wokuqala onempumelelo ukuhlalutya amandla enkqubo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: izindlela izinto noma abantu abaziphatha, abasabela nabathonya ngayo abanye abantu / Incwadi yakhe yayiwumzamo wokuqala owaphumelela wokuhlaziya ukusebenza kohlelo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: related to ecology or living organisms / People who leave cigarette butts in the field are ecologically insensitive and a danger to the well-being of the earth.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: wat met ekologie of lewende organismes verband hou / Mense wat sigaretstompies in die veld agterlaat, is ekologies ongevoelig en ’n gevaar vir die welstand van die aarde.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: e amana le ekholoji kapa dintho tse phelang / Batho ba tlohelang disetompi tsa sakarete fatshe sebakeng ho hang ha ba nahane ka ekholoji le kotsi bophelong ba lefatshe.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: e amana le ekholotši go diphedi / Batho bao ba tlogelago ditompi tša disekerete nageng ga ba na taba le tlhokomelo ya ekholotši gape ba kotsi go go phela gabotse ga lefase.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go amana le ikholoji kgotsa ditshedi / Batho ba ba tsamayang ba latlhela ditompi tsa disekerete mo nageng ga ba kgathalele ikholoji e bile ba kotsi mo polaneteng ya lefatshe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: Hlobene nemvelo noma lokuphilako / Bantfu labalahla tincamu teligwayi emhlabatsini abanalo luvelo lwemvelo kantsi bayingoti emphilweni yemhlaba.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwi elanaho na zwi tshilaho kana mutshatshame wa zwi tshilaho / Vhathu vhane vha sia zwiṱommbi zwa sigareṱe ḓakani a vha dzhieli nṱha zwi tshilaho nahone vha khombo kha vhuvha ha ḽifhasi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: swi yelana na ntivovuxaka bya swihefemuri na tindhawu leti swi hanyaka kona kumbe swo hanya / Vanhu lava va tshika swidombi swa sikireti eka enisin’wini va tekela enhlokweni timhaka to hetisela ta hi ntumbuluko na khombo eka ntshamiseko wa misava.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: okuphathelene ne-ikholoji nofana ibhoduluko lokuphilako / Abantu abatjhiya iintompi zesigerede emmangweni abanatjhejo lebhoduluko begodu bayingozi ebantwini bephasi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: okunxulumene nezinto eziphilayo kunye nendawo eziphila kuyo okanye izinto eziphilayo / Abantu abashiya izitompi zemidiza emathafeni abakukhathalelanga okwezinto eziphilayo nendawo eziphila kuyo kwaye bayingozi kwimpilo-ntle yehlabathi.

ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u bviswa ha zwi re ngomu zwi songo tea, mupeleṱo u si wone, zwi sa sedzei na mafurase a xedzaho na tshivhumbeo tsha mafhungo tshi sa pfadzi / U editha thesisi zwi tea u siiwa kha mudzudzanyi wa tshibveledzwa wa phurofeshinaḽa.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: having a rational, modern, well- informed outlook / Enlightened thinkers such as the brilliant physicist Isaac Newton and the mathematician Rene Descartes are also considered enlightened scientists. / having a rational, modern, well-informed outlook / Enlightened thinkers such as the brilliant physicist Isaac Newton and the mathematician Rene Descartes are also considered enlightened scientists.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: met ’n rasionele, moderne, goed ingeligte uitkyk / Verligte denkers soos die briljante fisikus Isaac Newton en die wiskundige Rene Descartes word ook as verligte wetenskaplikes beskou.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho ba le pono e bontshang kelello e nahanang hantle, ya mehleng ena, ya nang le tsebo e ntle / Batho ba nahanang ba nang le tsebo ba kang setsebi se bohlale ya fisiksi Isaac Newton le setsebi sa mmetse Rene Descartes ba boetse ba tadingwa jwalo ka borasaense ba neng ba kgantsheditswe tsebo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ba le tebelego ya go kwagala, ya sebjalebjale, ya tshedimošo ya tsebo / Banagani bao ba tsebago go swana le mofisika wa bokgoni Isaac Newton le rammetše Rene Descartes le bona ba tšewa go ba borasaense bao ba tsebago.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go nna le pono e e lekalekaneng, ya se gompieno, ya motho yo o nang le kitso / Batlhalefi ba ba tshwanang le moitsifisiki Isaac Newton le moitse wa dipalo Rene Descartes gape ba bidiwa baitsesaense ba ba botlhale.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono lonelwati lolungilo, lonengcondvo, wesimanje, / Bacabangi labakhanyiselwe labafana nesati semvelo lesihlakaniphile Isaac Newton kanye nesati setibalo Rene Descartes batsatfwa njengabososayensi labakhaniselwe.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u vha na mbonalo i pfadzaho, ya musalauno, yo vhumbiwaho zwavhuḓi / fhaṱuwaho sa rasaintsi wa vhuṱali Vho Newton Isaac na muḓivhi wa metse Vho Rene Descartes na vhone ndi vhorasaintsi vho fhaṱuswaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku va ni vonelo ro twisiseka, ra manguvalawa, ra vutlhari / Vanhu va ndhuma hi swa miehleketo yo hlamusela swo fana na tanihi ntlhari ya mutivasayense Isaac Newton na mutivatinhlayo Rene Descartes nakambe va tekela enhlokweni ku nyika vutlhari bya vativasyense.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuqaleka unerherho, isimanjemanje, ukuba nelwazi / Ukuhlathulula abacabangi abahlakaniphileko njengefizisisti u-Isac Newton nosozibalo uRene Descartes nabo babososayensi abahlathululwako.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuba nembonakalo enengqondo, yala maxesha, nesekelwe elwazini / Ingqondi ezikhanyiselweyo ezifana nengcali yefiziki ekrelekrele uIsaac Newton nengcsli yemathematika uRene Descartes nabo bakwathathwa njengoosonzululwazi abakhanyiselweyo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuba nombono oqondile, ofanele nonolwazi / Abacabangi abakhanyiselwe njengososayensi ohlakaniphile u- Isaac Newton nosolwazi wezibalo uRene Descartes nabo babhekwa njengososayensi abakhanyiselwe.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: intellectual European tendency of the late 18th century in response to the excessive influence of tradition and religion on human thought and freedom – a continuation of liberation that began with the Renaissance / During the Enlightenment people began to free themselves from the power of the Church and the State.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: intellektuele Europese stroming van die laat 18de eeu in reaksie op die oormatige invloed van tradisie en godsdiens op menslike denke en vryheid – ’n voortsetting van die bevryding wat met die Renaissance begin het / Tydens die Verligting het mense hulleself van die mag van die Kerk en die Staat begin bevry.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshekamelo ya Yuropa ya tsebo ya nakong ya morao ya lekgolong la bo18 la dilemo jwalo ka karabelo tshusumetsong e kgolo ya ditlwaelo le bodumedi monahanong wa batho le – tswelopele ya tokoloho le qalo ya Tsosoloso / Nakong ya Kgantshetso ya tsebo batho ba ile ba qala ho itokolla matleng a Kereke le Mmuso.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: mokgwa qa tsebo wa Yuropa wa paka ya 18 ya morago go arabela khuetšo ye kgolo ya setšo le tumelo go kgopolo ya motho le tokologo - go tšwela pele ga tokollo moo go thomilwego ke Renaesense / Nakong ya Tsebo batho ba thoma go ke tokolla go tšwa maatleng a Kereke le Mmušo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshekamelo ya mogopolo ya Mayuropa ya lekgolo la bo 18 la dingwaga ka ntlha ya tlhotlheletso e e feteletseng ya setso le bodumedi mo kgopolong ya batho le kgololesego – go tsweletswa pele ga kgololesego go go simologileng le Poelano / Ka motlha wa Kitso batho ba ne ba simolola go ikgolola mo maatleng a Kereke le Puso.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: Mulungu xa khale hi malembe ya dzanakhumenhungu eka ku angula eka nkucetelo wo tala wa ndhavuko na vukhongeri eka miehleketo ya vanhu na ntshuxeko – ku yisa emahlweni ntshuxeko lowu nga sungula hi Mpfuxeto / Hi nkarhi wa ku nyika vanhu vo nyika xiyimo xa swa miehleketo swi sungula ku titshunxa mahala ku suka eka matimba ya Kereke na Mfumo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: a controlled balance between opposing forces, influences or aspects of a situation / Exploitation of the Antarctic continent could have devastating repercussions as the stability of the continent is essential to the climatic and ecological equilibrium of the Southern Hemisphere. / a controlled balance between opposing forces, influences, aspects of a situation, etc. / His excellent physical and moral equilibrium gave him an evenness of temper .

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: botsitso bo laolwang pakeng tsa matla a ka mahlakoreng a bapileng, ditshusumetso kapa dikarolo tsa boemo / Tshebediso e mpe ya khontinente ya Antarctic e ka ba le ditlamorao tse mpe jwalo ka ha botsitso ba khontinente bo bohlokwa bakeng sa tlelaemete le tekano ya ekholoji ya Hemosefere e ka Borwa.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tekano ye e laolwago gare ga mahlakore ao a ganetšanago, dikhuetšo goba dikarolo tša maemo / Tšhomišobošaedi ya kontinente ya Anthakthiki e ka ba le ditlamorago tša go se kgahliše bjalo ka ge go se fetogefetoge ga kontinente go le bohlokwa go tekano ya klaemete le ekholotšikale ya Hemisfere ya Borwa.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: boemo jwa go lekalekana mo gare ga maatla, tlhotlheletso kgotsa dikarolo tse pedi tse di ganetsanang / Go jewa ntsoma ga khontinente ya Antarctic go ka nna kotsi ka gonne go botlhokwa gore khontinente eno e nne e tlhomame gore maemo a tlelaemete le a ikholoji a Karolo E e Mo Borwa jwa Lefatshe e nne e na le tekatekano.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ibhalansi lelawulwako emkhatsini wemandla laphikisanako, imimoya noma tintfo tesimo / Kuchashatwa kwelivekati i-Antarctic kungaba nemitselela lemibi kakhulu njengoba kusimama kwelivekati kusidzingo kusimo selitulu kanye ngekulingana kwemvelo yeNkhabave yaseNingizimu.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: the necessary items or skills to perform a certain function / Strategic reading and thinking techniques can be seen in the metaphorical sense as the thoughtful student’s study “equipment”.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: dintho tse hlokahalang kapa bokgoni le tsebo ho phetha mosebetsi o itseng / Mekgwa ya ho bala ka ho tsepamisa maikutlo ntlheng e itseng le ho nahana e ka bonwa ka mokgabo- puo jwalo ka “thepa” e molemo thutong ya moithuti.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: dilo tšeo di hlokegago goba mabokgoni a go dira mošomo wo o itšego / Dithekniki tša mokgwa wa go bala le go nagana o ka bonwa ka tsela ya tshwantšho bjalo ka go bala ga baithuti ga "matlafatšo"
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: dilo kgotsa bokgoni jo bo tlhokegang go dira ditiro dingwe / Bokgoni jwa go akanya le go bala bo ka lejwa ka tsela ya tshwantshetso e le “didiriswa” tsa moithuti tsa go ithuta.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: tintfo noma emakhono ladzingekile ekwenta umsebenti lotsite / lasebentako angabonakala kumcondvo wekungatsekisa njenge”lithulusi” lekufundza lemfundzi lelinengcondvo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwithu zwo teaho kana zwikili zwa u shuma muṅwe mushumo / U vhala ha tshiṱirathedzhi na tekiniki dza u humbula zwi nga vhonala nga nḓila ya methafore sa “zwishumiswa” zwa ngudo zwa mutshudeni a humbulaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: swilo swo fana kumbe swikili swa ku tirha ntirho wun’wana / Xitirateji xa mahlayelo na thekiniki ya maehleketelo swi kota ku vonaka eka ku gega mhaka tanihi miehleketo ya ’xtirho’ xa dyondza xa muchudeni.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: amakghonofundwa afaneleko ukuze akghone ukwenza umsebenzi othileko / ukufunda nokucabanga ngamaqhinga ahlelekileko kungabonakala ngokungathekisa ngokucabanga “ngesitlabagelo” sokufunda komfundi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: izinto okanye izakhono eziyimfuneko zokwenza umsebenzi othile / Iindlela zokufunda nokucinga uthatha intsingiselo kumbhalo zinokubonwa ngokwesikweko “ngesixhobo” sokufunda somfundi esinengqiqo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: izinto noma amakhono adingekile wokwenza umsebenzi othile / Ukufunda ngobuhlakani namasu wokucabanga kungase kubonakale ngokomqondo womfanekiso ‘njengesisetshenziswa’ sokutadisha somfundi ocabangelayo.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku va ni swilo kumbe swikili swo tirha ntirho wun’wana / Matiko yo fana na tanihi Amerika, Britain na Chayina ma hlomile hi switlhavatlhavani swa manguvalawa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuba nama-ayithemu nofana amakghonofundwa afaneleko ukuze akghone ukwenza umsebenzi othileko / Iinarha ezinjenge-Amerika, iBhritheyini neTjhayina zihlonyiswe ngeenkhali zesimanjemanje.

ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuhlanganisa ndzawonye imibono leyehlukene, emanani noma tintfo, ikakhulu kute kutsi wakhe intfo lenhle lehlangene noma lephelele. / Wahlanganisa tincenye letihamba embili tetinjulolwati totimbili kute ente inchubo lensha yenkhambo lelungile.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku hlanganisa mianakanyo, mikoka kumbe swilo swo hambana endhawu yin'we, ngopfungopfu leswaku u ta vumba mpfanganiso kumbe xilo hinkwaxo lexi tsakisaka. / U hlanganisile swivumbi swa xiyimo xa le henhla ku tlula hinkwaswo swa tifilosofi hatimbirhi ku tumbuluxa sisiteme leyintshwa ya matikhomelo.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlanganisa izinto ezimbili nanyana ezimbalwa, ngokomzimba nanyana ngokwamakhemikhali, ukuze zibe yinto eyodwa. / Uhlanganise iindrada ezimbili zegezi wazihlanganisa ukobana igezi ikhambe.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukudibanisa kunye izimvo, imigangatho okanye izinto, ngokukodwa ukuze udale umdibaniso okanye into epheleleyo ethandekayo. / Udibanise iziseko zeefilosifi zombini ukudala inkqubo entsha yeenqobo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlanganisa ndawonye imiqondo eyahlukene, amazingabunjalo noma izinto, ikakhulukazi ukuze zikwazi ukuba yinhlanganisela ethokozisayo noma zibe yinto ephelele. / Wadibanisa izinto ezihamba phambili kakhulu kwimiqondo yomibili ukwakha isimo somqondo owodwa esisebenzayo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: check measuring instruments or weights and then place an official stamp or mark on it / This scale has not been gauged and therefore you cannot be sure if you bought exactly one kilogram of meat.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho hlahloba disebediswa tse lekanyang kapa tsa boima e be o kenya setempe sa semmuso kapa letshwao ho tsona / Sekala sena ha se a lekanngwa mme kahoo o ke ke wa ba le bonnete ba hore na e be o rekile nama ya kilogramo e le nngwe.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go lekola sedirišwa sa tekanyo goba maima le go bea setempe sa semmušo goba go swaya go yona / Sekala se ga se sa go lekola ka goa o ka se kgone go ba le nnete ge o rekile thwii kilogramo ye tee ya nama.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go sekaseka didiriswa tsa go lekanya kgotsa tsa boima go tswa foo o bo o baya letshwao kgotsa setempe sa go tlhomamisa gore di a dira / Sekale seno ga se ise se tlhole mme ka gone ga o ka ke wa tlhomamisega gore a ruri o rekile kilogerama e le nngwe ya nama.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: Hlola emathulusi ekukala noma sisindvo bese ungcivita sitembu lesisemtsetfweni noma imaki kuwo. / Lesikali akikakwa ngako-ke angeke ube nesiciniseko sekutsi utsenge likhilo linye lemnyama ncamashi.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u sedza zwishumiswa zwa u kala kana zwileme wa kona u vhea tshiganḓo tsha tshiofisi kana luswayo khazwo / Tshikalo itshi a tsho ngo kalwa nahone vha nga si kone u vha na vhuṱanzi ha uri vho renga khiḽogiramu nthihi ya ṋama.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku kamba switirhisiwa swo pima kumbe mitiko kutani endzhaku ka sweswo u ba xitembe kumbe mfungho eka xona. / Xikalo lexi a xi pimiwangi kutani hikokwalaho a wu nga vi ni ntiyiso loko u xavile khilogireme yin’we ya nyama kwatsaa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: qala iinsetjenziswa zokulinganisa nofana zokukala bese ubetha isitembu nofana imaraga phezu kwazo / Isikalesi asikalinganiswa begodu ngalokho-ke angekhe waqinisekisa bonyana uthenge ikhilogramu linye lenyana ngokwamambala.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: khangela izixhobo somlinganiselo okanye ubunzima uze ubeke isitampu okanye uphawu olusemthethweni kuzo. / Isikeyile asilinganiswanga kwaye ke ngoko ngeke uqiniseke ukuba uthenge ngqo ikhilogram enye.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: swihlawulekisi leswi hambanisaka mikoka ya xinuna na xisati. / Vathori va nga ka va nga vi ni xihlawuhlawu xa ku lwisana ni vatirhi lexi simekiweke ehenhla ka rimbewu.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: izinto ezihlukanisa iindima zabantu bembaji neendima zabantu bengubo. / Abaqatjhi akukafaneli babandlulule iinsebenzi ngokobulili.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: iimpawu ezahlula iindima zamadoda nezabasetyhini. / Abaqeshi akufunekanga bacalule ngokuchasene nabasebenzi ngokusekelwe kwisini.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira sengwe kgotsa go dira gore se nne teng, jaaka dikakanyo, dipoelo le thata le maatla. / Motlhatlheledi yo montšhwa o ne a simolola puisano e e kgatlhisang ya mo phaposiborutelong.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kwakha noma kwenta kutsi kube khona, njengemibono, tintalo nemandla. / Umfundzi lomusha wente ingcoco lemnandzi eklasini.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kona tanihi mianakanyo, mipindzulo na matimba. / Muleteri lontshwa u sungurile mbhurisano wa le tlilasini lowu tsakisaka.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwakha nanyana ukwenza bona kube khona, okufana nemibono, inzuzo kanye anamandla. / Ilektjhara etja yethule ingcoco emnandi ngetlasini.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukudala okanye ukwenza kubekhona, izinto ezifana nezimvo, iinzuzo namandla. / Umhlohli omtsha uvelise ingxoxo evuselelayo yaseklasini.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: not specific / If one plans a language acquisition course for students from different disciplines, the text content will be generic, as creating subject- specific texts for each subject is practically impossible. / not specific / If one plans a language acquisition course for students from different disciplines, the text content will be generic, as creating subject-specific texts for each subject is practically impossible.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: nie spesifiek nie / Wanneer ’n mens ’n taalverwerwingskursus beplan vir studente uit verskillende vakgebiede, sal die teksinhoud generies wees, aangesien die skep van vakspesifieke tekste vir elke vak prakties onmoontlik is.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: e sa qollehang / Haeba motho a rera ho fumana thuso ya puo bakeng sa baithuti ba dithutong tse fapaneng, dikahare tsa taba e ngotsweng e tlameha hore e be tse tlwaelehileng, jwalo ka ho bopa mangolo o nang le thuto e itseng ka ho qollehileng bakeng sa thuto ka nngwe ke ntho e ke keng ya kgonahala.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: e sego ye e itšego / Ge motho a somiša polelo ya thutwana go baithuti go tšwa dikarolong tša go fapana, diteng tša sengwalwa e tla ba tša kakaretšo, ka ge gp hlola dingwalwa tša thutwana ye e itšego ga go kgonege.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: sa kobang ntlheng e le nngwe / Fa motho a rulaganya khoso ya go ithuta puo go ruta baithuti ba ba ithutelang dilo tse di farologaneng, se a se kwalang se tlile go akaretsa ditlhogo tsotlhe, ka gonne go batla go sa kgonege go kwala setlhogo sengwe le sengwe ka puo ya setlhogo seo.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: akukacaciswa / Uma munye ahlela sifundvo sekutfolakala kwelulwimi sebafundzi kusuka kutifundvo letahlukene, lokucuketfwe ngumbhalo kutawuba ngulokujwayelekile, njengoba kwakha imibhalo lecondzile yesifundvo lesitsite seSifundvo ngasinye kuyintfo lamatima kwenteka.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwi songo livha / Arali muthu a pulana khoso ya u guda luambo u itela matshudeni u bva kha masia o fhambanaho, zwi re ngomu kha tshibveledzwa zwi ḓo vha zwi angaredzwaho, sa izwi u sika zwibveledzwa zwo sedzaho thero kha thero iṅwe na iṅwe zwi sa kanzhi konadzei.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku nga kongomi / Loko un’wana a kunguhata khoso ya vuhlengeleti bya ririmi ya machudeni ku suka eka swiyenge swo hambana, vundzeni bya xitsariwa byi ta tumbuluxiwa, tanihi ku tumbuluxiwa ka switsariwa swa dyondzo yo karhi a swi koteki hi xiviri.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: akukhethisi / kubafundi ababuya emikhakheni ehlukileko, ingaphakathi lomtlolo lizokuba ngeliphathelene nomhlobo woke, ukwakha imitlolo yomkhakha okhethekileko ngokwesifundo ngasinye kuyakghonakala.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: okungangqalanga / Ukuba umntu uceba isifundo sokuzuza kulwimi kubafundi kwiinkalo ezohlukeneyo, isiqulatho sombhalo siya kuba sosohlobo oluthile, okokudala imibhalo engqalene ngqo nomxholo kwisifundo ngasinye kangangoko kunokwenzeka.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okujwayelekile / Uma umuntu ehlela isifundo solimi oluthile sabafundi kusuka ezifundweni ezahlukahlukene, okuqukethwe kombhalo kuzoba okujwayelekile, ngoba ukudala umbhalo wesifundo esithile wesifundo ngasinye akunakwenzeka.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: subdivision of any art, with a distinctive own approach, design and (or) subject – used mainly within the three major categories of literary art, namely prose, poetry and drama / He focused mainly on two genres: the literary essay and pastoral poetry.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: vertakking van enige kuns met ’n kenmerkende, eie benadering, ontwerp en (of) onderwerp – hoofsaaklik by die drie hoofkategorieë van literêre kuns, naamlik prosa, poësie en drama / Hy het veral op twee genres gefokus: die literêre opstel en landskapskildering.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ke karolo e tlasana ya bonono bofe kapa bofe, e na le katamelo ya ona e ikgethang, moralo le (kapa) thuto – e sebediswa haholoholo hara dihlopha tse tharo tse kgolo tsa bonono ba dibuka, e leng prose, dithothokiso le terama / O ile a tsepamisa maikutlo haholoholo ho digenere tse pedi: moqoqo dibukeng le dithothokiso tsa modisana.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: karolwana ya bokgabo bjo bongwe le bjo bongwe, ka mokgwa wa gagwe, moakayetšo le (goba) thutwana - e šomišwa go magoro a mararo a bokgabo bja tsebo, e lego sengwalwa, sereto] goba tiragatšo. / O nepiša dikarolo tše pedi: taodišo ya sengwalwa le theto ya bodumedi.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: karolo ya mofuta mongwe le mongwe wa botaki, o o nang le tsela, tlhamo le (kgotsa) setlhogo sa one se se o tlhaolang mo go e mengwe – o o dirisiwang thata mo go dikarolong tse tharo tse dikgolo tsa botaki, e leng tlhamo, poko le terama / O ne a tlhoma mogopolo thata mo mefuteng e le mebedi ya botaki: tlhamo e e kwalwang le poko ya kwa merakeng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kwehlukaniswa kwesigatjana sanoma ngubuphi buciko, ngendlela yakho lecacile, kuhlela kanye (noma) sifundvo – lesisetjentiswa kakhulu kutigaba letinkhulu letintsatfu tebuciko bembhalo, lokuyiphrozi, inkondlo nedrama / Ugcile kakhulu kutinhlobo letimbili:i- eseyi yembhalo kanye nenkondlo yemadlelo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: khethekanyo ya vhutsila, vhu re na kuitele kwaho kwo fhambanaho, nyolo na (kana) thero – lune lwa shumiswa kanzhi nga ngomu ha khethekanyo tharu dza ndeme, dzi re phurosa, vhurendi na ḓirama / O vha o sedzesa kha tshaka mbili: maṅwalwa a maanea na vhurendi ha vhufunzi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xiyenge xa vutshila byin’wana na byin’wana, hi ku vonaka ku tlula hinkwabyo hi endlelo ra yena n’wini, ku dizayina na (kumbe) dyondzo – leyi tirhisiwaka ngopfu hi tikhategori ta nkoka ta swa vutshila bya matsalwa, ku nga purosa, vutlhokovetseri na ntlangu / U kongomisa ngopfu eka tinxaka timbirhi ta matsalwa; matsalwa ya switsalwana na vutlhokovetseri bya swa vurisi.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: izikwana lobunye nobunye ubukghwari, ngendlela yabo ehlukileko, umtlamo godu (nofana) isifundo – lisetjenziswa khulu emikhakheni emithathu emikhulu yobukghwari bomtlolo, enjengephrozi, iinkondlo nemidlalo / Uqalise khulu emihlobeni emibili yemitlolo: i-eseyi yomtlolo neenkondlo zendabuko.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: icandelo elinganeno labo nabuphi ubugcisa, olunendlela, uyilo kunye(okanye) umxholo owahlukileyo – obusetyenziswa kakhulu kwiindidi ezintathu ezingundoqo zobugcisa boncwadi, ezizezi, isicatshulwa, umbongo nedrama / Ujolise kakhulu kwiintlobo ezimbini: isincoko soncwadi kunye nezibongo zamandulo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwehlukaniswa ngeziqephu kwanoma yibuphi ubuciko, okunendlela yakho ehlukile, umklamo futhi (noma) isihloko – okusetshenziswa phakathi kwezigaba ezinyinhloko ezintathu zobuciko bombhalo, ulimi olubhaliwe noma olukhulunywayo, inkondlo nedrama / Wagxila ngokuyinhloko ezinhlobeni ezimbili: indatshana eqondile nenkondlo yasemadlelweni.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: the beginning or early stage of something, like an idea, from which that thing can develop into a bigger or more important thing / The germ of his theory, developed much later, can already be seen in his first book.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: qalo kapa dikgato tsa pele tsa ntho e itseng, jwaloka mohopolo, oo ho tswa ho ona ntho eo e ka holang ya ba ntho ya bohlokwa. / Motheo wa boitsebelo ba hae, o tswetse pele hamorao, mme o ka hla wa bonwa bukeng ya hae ya pele.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: dikgato tša mathomo goba tša peleng tša se sengwe, tša go swana le kgopolo, yeo selo se ka hlangwago go ba selo se bohlokwa kudu. / Moko wa teori ya gagwe, e tšwetšepele ka morago ga nako, e šetše e bonagala mo go puku ya gagwe ya mathomo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshimologo kgotsa dikgato tsa pejana tsa sengwe, se se jaaka kakanyo, tse selo seo se ka diregang le go nna selo se se botlhokwa thata. / Tshimologo ya tiori ya gagwe, e e dirilweng moragonyana, e setse e ka kgona go bonwa mo bukeng ya gagwe ya ntlha.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: sicalo noma tigaba tekucala tentfo letsite, njengembono, lapho lentfo ingatfutfuka isuka khona ibe yintfo lebaluleke kakhulu. / Sicalo senjulolwati yakhe, sacala kudzala, iyabonakala manje encwadzini yakhe yekucala.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ita kana u medza tshithu u fana na mihumbulo, phurofiti na maanḓamavhusi. / Muḽekhitshara muswa vho thoma therisano ye nyanyula kiḽasini.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: masungulo kumbe switeji swa le masungulweni swa xin'wana tanihi muanakanyo, laha kusuka eka xona xilo xi nga hluvukaka ku va xi va xilo xa nkoka swinene. / Masungulo ya thiyori yakwe lama ha ku hluvukaka sweswinyana ya nga ha vonaka eka buku yo sungula.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ekuthomeni nanyana iingaba zokuthoma zento, efana nombono, umbono loyo nanyana lokho into leyo engathuthuka ibe yinto eqakatheke khulu. / Isigaba sokuthoma setiyorakhe, sithuthuke ekukhambeni kwesikhathi, lokho kungabonwa encwadinakhe yokuthoma.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: isiqalo okanye izigaba zasekuqaleni zento, ezifana noluvo, olo loo nto iya kuphuhla kulo ukuba yinto ebalulekileyo. / Isiqalo sale thiyori yakhe, siphuhle kamva kakhulu, sesingabonwa kwincwadi yakhe yokuqala.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isiqalo noma isigaba sokuqala sento ethile, efana nomqondo, nokuyilapho leyo nto ingabe isisuselwa khona ibe yinto ebaluleke kakhulu. / Umsuka wale thiyori yakhe, wasunguleka ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, kanti ivele le thiyori yakhe isiyabonakala kwincwadi yakhe yokuqala.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: broad approach to problem situations by finding solutions without knowing in advance how this is going to happen, often through a mixture of systematic questioning, logical reasoning, or a guess based on intuition, experience and even common sense / Thousands of years ago the famous philosopher Socrates used heuristics to ge his students to answer life-questions through systematic questioning. / broad approach to problem situations by finding solutions without knowing in advance how this is going to happen, often through a mixture of systematic questioning, logical reasoning, or a guess based on intuition, experience and even common sense / Thousands of years ago the famous philosopher Socrates used heuristics to get his students to answer life- questions through systematic questioning. / broad approach to problem situations by finding solutions without knowing in advance how this is going to happen, often through a mixture of systematic questioning, logical reasoning, or a guess based on intuition, experience and even common sense / Thousands of years ago the famous philosopher Socrates used heuristics to get his students to answer life-questions through systematic questioning.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: breë benadering tot probleemsituasies deur oplossings te vind sonder om vooraf te weet hoe dit gaan gebeur, dikwels deur ’n mengsel van stelselmatige bevraagtekening, logiese redenasie of ’n raaiskoot gebaseer op intuïsie, ervaring en selfs gesonde verstand / Duisende jare gelede het die beroemde wysgeer Sokrates heuristiek gebruik om sy studente self lewensvrae te laat beantwoord deur hulle stelselmatig te ondervra.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: katamelo e pharaletseng memong a thata ka ho fumana ditharollo ntle le ho tseba esale pele hore na ho tla etsahalang, hangata ka ho sebedisa motswako wa tatellano ya dipotso, ho beha mabaka ka ho utlwahalang, kapa ho hakanya monahano o sa kang wa rerwa, boiphihlelo le esita le monahano o tlwaelehileng / Dilemo tse dikete tse fetileng rafilosofi ya tummeng Socrates o ile a sebedisa heuristiki ho etsa hore baithuti ba hae ba arabe dipotso tsa bophelo ka dipotso tse latellanang.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: mokgwa wa go phara wa maemo a mathata k ago hwetša ditharollo ntle le go tseba pele ga nako gore se se tlo direga bjang, gantši ka kopanyo ya dipotšišo tša go beaknaywa, go fahlela gabotse, goba go akanya moo go theilwago go maikutlo, maitemogelo le go kwešiša / Mengwaga ye dikete ya go feta mofilosofi wa go tuma Socrates o šomišitše teko go gapeletša baithuti ba gagwe go araba dipotšišo tša bophelo ka dipotšišo tša go beakanywa.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: tsela ya go lebana le bothata ka go batla tharabololo ntle le go itse go sa le gale gore go tlile go direga jang, gantsi e le ka go dirisa mekgwa e e farologaneng ya go botsa dipotso, go akanyetsa dilo, kgotsa go lekeletsa, go dirisa maitemogelo le go ikakanyetsa dilo fela. / Diketekete tsa dingwaga tse di fetileng motlhalefi yo o itsegeng e bong Socrates o ne a dirisa mekgwa ya go itshenkela dikarabo go dira gore baithuti ba gagwe ba arabe dipotso tsa botshelo ka go nna le thulaganyo ya go botsa dipotso.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: inchubo lebanti kutimo tinkinga ngekutfola tisombulula ngaphandle kwekwati kusanesikhatsi kutsi loku kuyokwenteka njani, imvama nangenhlanganisela yemibuto lehlelekile, kucabanga lokunengcondvo, noma kucagela lokweyame ekufundzeni, lwati kanye nakumcondvo lovamile / Eminyakeni letinkhulungwane leyengca ifilosofa leyatiwako Socrates wasebentisa isethi yemitsetfo kutfola bafundzi bakhe baphendvule imibuto yemphilo ngekubuta lokuhlelekile.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: kusedzele kwo ṱanḓavhuwaho kha thaidzo nga u wana thasululo hu si na u ḓivha hu tshe na tshifhinga uri izwi zwi ḓo itea hani, kanzhi nga kha mbudziso dza sisṱemetheki dzo ṱanganelanaho, kuhumbulele ku re na thevhekano, kana u humbulela ho sedzwa kha luvhonela, tshenzhelo na zwine muṅwe na muṅwe a zwi ḓivha / Miṅwaha ya tshigidi yo fhiraho rafiḽosofi a ḓivheaho Vho Socrates vho vha vha tshi shumisa nyurisitikisi u itela uri matshudeni avho a fhindule mbudziso dza vhutshilo nga kha u vhudzisa ha sisiṱemiki.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: endlelo ro anama eka swiyimo swa swiphiqo hi ku kuma swintshuxo handle ko tiva hi nkarhi hilaha leswi swi nga ta humelela hakona, mikarhi yo tala hi ku hlanganisiwa ka endlelo ro konanisa, ehleketelo ra vutlhari, kumbe ku bvumba hi mayelana ni vutivi byo kala nseketelo, ntokoto na hambiloko swi twala / Magidi ya malembe lama nga hundza mutivavuhleketi wo tiveka Socrates u tirhisile mipfuneto ku endlela leswaku machudeni ya yena ya nhlamula swivutiso swa vutomi hi ku tirhisa endlelo ro vutisa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: indlela evulekileko yokuqalana nomraro enzinze ekutheni kutrholakale isisombululo ngaphandle kokwazi ngaphambi kwesikhathi bonyana kuyokwenzakalani, kanengi kuhlanganiswa iindlela zokubuza, ukulandelana kwendlela ekuphendulwa ngayo, nofana ngiyacabanga kungemizwa, ilwazi nangenjayelo / Eminyakeni eziingidi eyadlulako ufilosofa owazekako uSocrates wasebenzisa ihewuristiksi ukuze abafundi baphendule imibuzo mayelana nepilo yabo ngendlela yehlelo elithileko lokubuza.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: indlela gabalala kwiimeko eziyingxaki ngokufumana izisombululo ungazi kwangaphambili ukuba kuza kwenzeka njani oku, kaninzi ngomxube wokuzibuza okuninzi, ukucinga ngengqiqo, okanye ingqikelelo esekelwe kokuthi qatha engqondweni, amava nangokucinga nje / Kumawaka eminyaka eyadlulayo ifilosofa yodumo uSocrates wasebenzisa ukuzifundela ngokwakhe into ukwenza ukuba abafundi bakhe baphendule imibuzo yobomi oko bekwenza ngobuchule bokubuza.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukusingatha kabanzi izimo eziyinkinga ngokuthola izixazululo ngaphandle kokwazi kusengaphambilini ukuthi kuzokwenzeka kanjani, ngokuvamile kusetshenziswa inhlanganisela yezindlela zokubuza imibuzo ngokuhlakanipha, ukubonisana okunengqondo, noma ukuqagela kuya ngomuzwa, okuhlangenwe nakho ngisho nokusebenzisa ingqondo / Eminyakeni eyizinkulungwane edlule umfilosofi odumile uSocrates wasebenzisa izindlela zokuzifundela ukusiza abafundi bakhe baphendule imibuzo emayelana nokuphila esebenzisa indlela yokusebenzisa imibuzo ngokuhlakanipha.

ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: isethi yemibono lemihle leyakha sisekelo senchubo yepolitiki, yemnotfo noma yenkholo nalevame kuholela ekucageleni nakutento leticinile / Imfundziso yebukhomanisi yehlile ngekwatiwa kusukela kwawa Ludvonga laseBerlin.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: sethe ya mihumbulo yo humbulwaho ine ya ita mutheo wa sisiṱeme ya poḽitiki, ikonomi kana vhurereli nahone kanzhi zwa livhisa kha u humbulela nyito dzi sa vhuedzi / Kuhumbulele kwa vhukomunisi kwo fhungudzea kha u ḓivhea u bva tshe ha wa Luvhondo lwa Berlin.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: sisiteme ya mianakanyo leyi nga ni vuxaka, ngopfungopfu ya swa tipolotiki kumbe sisiteme ya swa ikhonomi. / Xikholwakholwa xa milorhwana xi simekiwile ehenhla ka maehleketelelo ya ku teka vavanuna va ri va nkoka ku tlula va xisati laha wanuna a nga musirheleri na mutirhisi wa wansati.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: irherho lemibono ekhambisanako, esikhathini esinengi kuba mibono yepolotiki nanyana yerherho lomnotho. / Ikolelo yezothando idzimelele kumibono yokobana indoda iyihloko yekhaya lapha indoda imvikeli begodu isebenzela umma.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: inkqubo enxulumene neengcinga, ngamaxa amaninzi ezenkqubo yopolitiko okanye yoqoqosho. / Intsomi yobugorha isekelwe kwingcinga yosolukhaya apho indoda ingumkhuseli nomlandeli womntu wasetyhini.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: njengefanele elakha isisekelo sohlelo lwezombusazwe, lwezomntho noma lwezenkolo futhi ngokuvamile luhilelea ekusikiseleni nasezenzweni ezingashintshi / Umbono wobuKhomanisi uye waya ngokuncipha kusuka ekuweni Kodonga lwaseBerlin.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: specific characteristics, temperament, way of thinking or state of mind peculiar to an individual / My roommate’s idiosyncrasies really get the better of me.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: spesifieke eienskappe, temperament, denkwyse of gemoedstoestand eie aan ’n individu / My kamermaat se eienaardighede kry my regtig onder.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: botho bo qollehileng, boikutlo, tsela ya ho nahana kapa boemo ba kelello ba motho ya itseng ka ho kgetheha / Diaediosinkrasi tsa motho eo ke kopanelang kamore le yena di a ntena.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: dimelo tše di itšego, tlhago, tsela ya go nagana goba maemo a wa go se tlwaelege go mothoo. / Sebopego sa motho yo ke dulago le yena o hwetša tše dibotse go nna.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: karolo e e rileng, boitshwaro, tsela ya go akanya kgotsa boemo jwa mogopolo jo motho a tlhaolwang ka jone / Mekgwa ya motho yo ke nnang le ene mo ntlong ruri e a ntlapela.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: yekucabanga noma simo sengcondvo lesingakavami emuntfwini / Kwehluka kwemngani lengihlala naye kungihlala emphinjeni.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwiṱaluli zwo imaho ngauri, mvumbo, nḓila ya kuhumbulele kana tshiimo tsha muhumbulo tshi sa elani na muthu / Muthu ane nda dzula nae lufherani u a ita zwithu nga nḓila yawe/idiosinkhiraisa zwa vhukuma u wana zwivhuya kha nṋe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: swihlawulekisi swo karhi, swa ximbilwambilwana, swa maehleketelelo kumbe xiyimo xa miehleketo yo hlamarisa eka munhu / Maehleketelelo ya loyi ndzi tshamaka na yena ekamareni hakunene ya ndzi khoma kahle.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: imikghwa, ukuziphatha, indlela yokucabanga nofana ubujamo bokucabanga obukhethekileko bomuntu / Idiyoseyinkhresi yomnganami engihlala naye egumbini sengiyibona ingcono kwamambala.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: iimpawu ezikhethekileyo, isimo, indlela yokucinga okanye isimo sengqondo esisodwa somntu / Isimbo salowo ndihlala naye egumbini sindifumene kakuhle.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: izici ezithile, ubuntu, indlela yokucabanga noma isimo sengqondo esehlukile komunye umuntu / Izici eziyingqayizivele zalowo engihlala naye ngempela ziyangixaka.

nso: sebopego {(semelo sa sa motho goba selo. / yena sa go rata ditamati ka 3 ms, letšhogo la gagwe go makatša la go tšhaba dieta tša go bulega le lerato la gagwe la digoko ta maboya tšeo a di kgoboketšago ka fase ga tšeke ya gagwe ya galase yeo e dirilego go tšea sephetho sa go nyaka madulo a mangwe.}
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: (peculiar) characteristic of someone or something / My roommate’s idiosyncratic preference for tomatoes at 3 am, her inexplicable fear of sandals and her loving dedication to hairy spiders she collects under her bed in a glass jar made me decide to look for other accommodation.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: (eienaardige) kenmerk van iemand of iets / My kamermaat se idiosinkratiese voorkeur vir tamaties om 03:00, haar onverklaarbare vrees vir sandale en haar liefdevolle toewyding aan harige spinnekoppe wat sy onder haar bed in ’n glaspot versamel, het my laat besluit om ander huisvesting te soek.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: botho (bo kgethehileng) ba motho e mong kapa ntho e nngwe / Dikgetho tse aediosinkratiki tsa motho eo ke kopanelang kamore le yena bakeng sa ditamati hoseng ka 3, tshabo e se nang tlhaloso ya meqathatso le lerato la hae bakeng sa dikgo tse boya tseo a di bokeletseng tlasa bethe ya hae hara jeke ya kgale ho entse hore ke fihlelle qeto ya ho batla sebaka se seng sa bodulo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: tsela (e e rileng) ya go dira dilo ya motho mongwe kgotsa sengwe / Mekgwanyana ya motho yo ke nnang le ene mo ntlong ya go rata ditamadi ka 3 am, go tshaba ga gagwe diramphatšhane go ke sa kgoneng go go tlhaloganya le tsela e a ratang ka yone digokgo tse di seriri tse a di phuthelang mo sejaneng sa galase kafa tlase ga bolao jwa gagwe e dirile gore ke tswe ke ye go batlana le bodulo gongwe go sele.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: (lesingakavami)luphawu lwemuntfu noma lokutsite / Umuntfu lengihlala naye lonelutsandvo loluhlukile lwematamatisi nga-3 ekuseni, kwesaba kwakhe emasandasi kanye nekutinikela lokunelutsandvo kululwembu lolunetiboya lalutsatsa ngaphansi kwembhede wakhe ejekeni lengilazi wangenta ngakhetsa kuyobuka lenye indzawo yekuhlala.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: (ṱalulaho) zwi ṱaluli zwa muthu kana tshithu / lufherani lwa idiosinkhirathiki u itela maṱamaṱisi nga 3 am, nyofho dzawe dzi sa ṱalutshedzei dza sendele na vhuḓikumedzeli hawe ha lufuno kha mabuvhi a re na mamvele ane a a kuvhanganya nga fhasi ha mmbete wawe nga ngomu ha dzhege ya ngilasi zwo ita uri ndi dzhie tsheo ya u sedzana na vhuṅwe vhudzulo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: (hlamarisa) xihlawulekisi xa un’wana kumbe xilo / Maehleketelelo ya loyi ndzi tshamaka na yena ekamareni ya ni ntsakelo wa matamatisi hi awara ya 3 nimixo, ku chava ka yena a swi hlamuseleki ka manyala ya yena na ku rhandza ka yena vutiyimiseri bya misisi ya mapume a nga yi hlengeleta ehansi ka mubedo wa yena endzeni ka jara ya nghilazi swi endlile ndzi teka xiboho xo lava vutshamo byin’wana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: (ngokungakajayeleki) umukghwa ongakajayeleki womuntu nofana into / Idiyosynkhresi kamnganami engihlala naye egumbini yokukhetha iitamati ngo-3 ekuseni, ukusaba kwakhe amapatlagana ngendlela engazwakaliko nokuthanda kwakha iinswebu ezinamaboya azibuthelele ngejegeni ayibeke ngaphasi kombhede kwenze bonyana ngifune enye indawo yokuhlala.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: (esisodwa) uphawu lomntu okanye into / Ukhetho lwesimbo somntu endihlala naye egumbini sokukhetha iitumato ngeyesi-3 kusasa, uloyiko lwakhe olungachazekiyo lweembadada kunye nokuzinikela kwakhe okunothando lwezigcawu ezinoboya aziqokelelayo phantsi kwebhedi yakhe kwisiqulatho seglasi kundenza ndenze isgqibo sokufuna enye indawo yokuhlala.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: izici ezixakile zothile noma zokuthile / Isici esixakile salawo engihlala naye sokuncamela otamatisi ngo-3 ekuseni, ukwesaba kwakhe okungenakuchazwa kwezicathulo ezivulekile kanye nokuthanda kwakhe izicabucabu ezinoboya akaziqoqela ejekeni wengilasi bese ewubeka ngaphansi kombhede wakhe kwangenza ukuthi ngifune enye indawo yokuhlala.

ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: Hlobene nemifanekiso, tinchazelo nekucaciswa / Umfundzi lophumelelako uhlala asebenta ngetitatimende letikhombisako khona umfundzisi umfundzisi wakhe atovisisa inchazelo yemicondvo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: impossibility to compare two theories, opinions or views of life because there is no common framework or frame of reference that can serve as a basis for the comparison / Feyerabend believed that deciding between different scientific views was complicated by the incommensurability of scientific theories.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: onmoontlikheid om twee teorieë, opinies of lewensienings met mekaar te vergelyk omdat daar geen gemeenskaplike raamwerk of verwysingskader is wat as basis vir die vergelyking kan dien nie / Feyerabend was van mening dat die keuse tussen verskillende wetenskaplike sienings deur die onvergelykbaarheid van wetenskaplike teorieë bemoeilik word.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go se kgonagale go bapetša diteori tše pedi, dikgopolo goba maikutlo a bophelo ka gore ga go na tlhako ya go swana ya mollwane wa maemo woo o ka šomago bjalo ka motheo wa papetšo / Feyerbend o dummela gore go tšea sephetho gare ga dikgopolo tša saense tša go fapana e be e raragantše ke ke go e ahlolege ga diteori tša saense.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go sa kgonege go bapisa bapisa dikgopolo tse pedi, dipono ka botshelo ka gonne go se na sepe se o ka se bapisang le tsone / Feyerabend o ne a dumela gore go dira tshwetso mo gare ga dipono tse pedi tse di sa tshwaneng tsa saense go ne go raraangwa ke gore go bo go sa kgonege go lekanya dikgopolo tsa saense.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: akukhoneki kucatsanisa emathiyori lamabili, imibono noma imicondvo yemphilo ngoba alukho luhlakamsebenti loluvamile noma luhlaka lwereferensi lolungasebenta njengesisekelo sekucatsanisa / Feyerabend bekakholelwa kutsi kuncuma emkhatsini wemibono yebusayensi lehlukile bekuphitsene ngemathiyori ebusayensi langenandlela yekukalwa levamile.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: lexi nga fikeleriwiki ku yelanisa tithiyori timbirhi, miehleketo kumbe mavonelo ya vutomi hikuva a ku na rimba ra ntolovelo kumbe rimba ra nkongomiso leri nga ta pfuna tanihi masungulo ka ndzinganiso / Feyerabend u tshemba leswaku ku hunguteka exikarhi ka mavonelo ya sayense yo hambana a swi nonohisa hi ku ka ku nga fikeleriwi eka tithiyori ta sayense.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukungenzeki ukuthelekisa iithiyori, izimvo okanye iimbono ezimbini zobomi kuba akukho nkqubo- sikhokelo ifanayo okanye isakhelo songqinisiso esinokusebenza njengesiseko sothelekiso / UFeyerabend wayekholelwa ukuba ukwenza isigqibo phakathi kweembono ezahlukeneyo zenzululwazi kwakusenziwa nzima kukungathelekiseki kweethiyori zenzululwazi.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukungakwazi ukuqhathanisa imicabango emibili, imibono noma izindlela zokubheka ukuphila ngoba alukho uhlaka olufanayo noma uhlaka olunenkombo olungaba isisekelo salokhu kuqhathaniswa / UFeyerabend wayekholelwa ukuthi ukunquma phakathi kwemibono yesayensi engafani kwakwenziwa kube indida ukungabi khona kwesilinganiso kwemibono yezesayensi.
