ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshipiḓa tsha ndeme kana tsho ḓiimisaho tsha tshithu / Iṅwe na iṅwe ya ndima ṱhanu ndi tshipiḓa tsha ndeme tsha bugu nahone I nga si vhaliwe I thungo kha iṅwe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku va kona tanihi xiphemu xa nkoka kumbe xivumbeko xa xin’wana / Hi 1029 ehenhla ka swifundza ehenhla ka ndzelekano eku heteleleni ku hlanganisiwa na Bohemia, kutani hikokwalaho swi hundzuka xiphemu xa xiphemunkoka xa ntlawa wa matiko lama fumiwaka hi hosi yinwe ya Jarimani.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: okukhona njengengcenye nanyana itshwayo eliqakathekileko. / Ngomnyaka ka-1029 inarha le yabe ihlanganiswe neBohemia, ngalokho yaba yingcenye eqakathekileko yombuso we-German.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubakhona njengenxenye efunekayo okanye ephawulekayo. / Ngowe-1029 lo mhlaba wasemdeni wagqibela ufakelelwa kwi- Bohemia, yaye ngako oko wayinxenye efunekayo yobukumkani baseJamani.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuba khona kwento njengesici noma ingxenye ebalulekile. / Ngonyaka ka 1029 leli lizwe lagcina seliwele ezandleni zeBohemia, lase liqala liba yingxenye ebalulekile yamazwe angaphansi kweJalimane.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: make into a whole / Integrating the views of different writers into one coherent text is a major academic challenge. / to make into a whole or make part of a whole / Community engagement at the University is completely integrated with research on the one hand, and teaching and learning on the other. / to make into a whole or make part of a whole / Community engagement at the university is completely integrated with research on the one hand, and teaching and learning on the other.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: tot ’n geheel maak / Om die sienings van verskillende skrywers in een samehangende teks te integreer, is ’n groot akademiese uitdaging.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho hokela ho karolo e kgolo kapa ho etsa karolo ya boholo. / Seabo sa setjhaba Yunivesithing se hoketswe ka botlalo le diphuputso ka ho le leng, le thuto ka ho le leng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go e dira yohle / Go kopanya dikgopolo tša bangwadi ba go fapana go sengwalwa se tee sa go kwagala.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: dira gore e nne selo se se feletseng / Go kopanya dipono tsa bakwadi ba ba farologaneng go di dira selo se le sengwe se se kopaneng ke kgwetlho e kgolo mo thutong e e kwa godimo.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kwenta intfo iphelele / Kuhlanganisa imibono yebabhali labahlukene kube ngumbhalo munye lenkhulu inselelo yemfundvo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: ndi tshipiḓa kana mvumbo i re na mushumo muhulwane. / Nga 1029 masakha aya u fhedza o vha tshipiḓa tsha Bohemia, zwa ita uri a vhe tshipiḓandeme tsha muvhuso (emphaya) wa Dzheremane.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku endla ku va leswi heleleke kumbe ku endla xiphemu xa nchumu hinkwawo. / Vutihlanganisi ni vaaki eyunivhesiti hi leswi swi pfanganisiweke hi ku hetiseka eka ndzavisiso hi tlhelo rin'wana, kutani ku dyondzisa na ku dyondza swi va kona hi tlhelo lerin'wana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza kube ngokupheleleko nanyana ukwenza ingcenye yokupheleleko. / Ukuzibandakanya nomphakathi eyunivesithi kuhlanganiswa koke nerhubhululo ngakwelinye ihlangothi, bese ngakwelinye ihlangothi kuhlanganiswe nokufunda nokufundisa.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukudibanisa ukwenza into epheleleyo okanye ukwenza inxenye yento epheleleyo. / Isibophelelo soluntu eYunivesithi ngumdibaniso opheleleyo nophando kwelinye icala, kwakunye nokufundisa nokufunda kwelinye icala.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza kube into ephelele / Ukuhlanganisa imibono yababhali abahlukahlukene ibe umbono owodwa ohambisanayo kuyinselele enkulu kakhulu yezemfundo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: coordinated or linked / A lecturer who reads a student’s assignment must ascertain whether the views of different writers really form an integrated whole within the student’s thematic line of thought.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: gekoördineer of met mekaar verbind / ’n Dosent wat die opdrag van ’n student lees, moet vasstel of die sienings van verskillende skrywers werklik ’n geïntegreerde geheel vorm binne die tematiese gedagtegang van die student.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: e hokahantsweng / mosaebetsi wa moithuti e tlameha ho etsa bonnete ba hore maikutlo a bangodi ba fapaneng a bopa taba e feletseng e kopaneng hara mohopolo wa sehlooho sa moithuti.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kgokagantšwego goba kopantšwego / Mofahloši yoo a balago mošomo wa moithuti o swanetše go utolla ge e le gore dikgopolo tša bangwadi ba go fapana di dira kopano ya ka moka gare ga mothaladi wa sererwa sa dikgopolo sa moithuti.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: gokagantswe kgotsa golagantswe mmogo / Motlhatlheledi yo o balang tlhamo ya moithuti o tshwanetse go tlhomamisa gore a ruri dipono tsa bakwadi ba ba farologaneng di bopa selo se se kopaneng mo thulaganyong ya go akanya ya moithuti.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuhlanganiswa noma kuchunyiwe / Umfundzisi lofundza sabelo semfundzi kumele acinisekise kutsi mibono yebabhali labahlukene ngempela yakha konke lokuhlanganisiwe ngekhatsi komugca wekucabanga wemfundzi.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: pfanaywa kana ṱumanywa / ya mutshudeni u tea u khwaṱhisedza uri kusedzele kwa vhaṅwali vho fhambanaho nangoho ku ita tshithu tsho fhelelaho nga ngomu kha nḓila ya kuhumbulele kwa mutshudeni.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kondleteriwile kumbe hlanganisiwile / Muleteri loyi a hlayaka asayimente ya muchudeni u fanele ku tiyisisa loko miehleketo ya vatsari vo hambana hi xiviri va vumba xo hlanganisiwa hinkwaxo eka mhaka ya ku xaxameta ku ya hi nhlokomhaka ya miehleketo.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: okubutheleleko nofana okuhlanganisiweko / Ulektjhara ofunda umsebenzi onikele umfundi kufaneleko abone bonyana imibono yabatloli abahlukileko yakheka ngokuhlanganisiweko nomtlolo woke ngokukhambisana nommongo womcabango womfundi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: edityanisiweyo okanye eqhagamshelweyo / Umhlohli ofunda imisebenzi emiselweyo yabafundi kufuneka aqinisekise ukuba ingaba iimbono zababhali abohlukeneyo zakha okupheleleyo okuhlanganisiweyo na kwindlela acinga ngayo umfundi.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: hleliwe noma xhunyanisiwe / Umfundisi ofunda isabelo somfundi kufanele aqinisekise ukuthi imibono yababhali abahlukile ihlanganisiwe yini yaba umqondo wesihloko womfundi.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: process by which parts are put together into a whole / The integration of different writers’ views into one coherent text in which everything forms a new whole is a major challenge for first-year students.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: proses waardeur dele tot ’n geheel saamgevoeg word / Die integrering van verskillende skrywers se sienings in een samehangende teks waarin alles ’n nuwe geheel vorm, is ’n groot uitdaging vir eerstejaarstudente.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshebetso eo dikarolo di kopangwang hammoho ho ba ntho e le nngwe / Kopanyo ya maikutlo a bangodi ba fapaneng hore e be taba e le nngwe e ngtsweng e momahaneng moo ntho e nngwe le e nngwe e bopang ntho e le nngwe e feletseng ke phephetso e kgolo ho baithuti ba selemo sa pele.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshepetšo yeo dikarolo di bewago mmogo ka moka / Kopanyo ya dikgopolo tša bangwadi ba go fapana go sengwalwa e tee sa go kwagala moo se sengwe le se sengwe se dirago karolo ka moka ye mpsha ke tlhohlo ye kgolo go baithuti ba ngwaga wa mathomo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: thulaganyo e ka yone dikarolo tse di farologaneng di kopanngwang go dira selo se le sengwe se se feletseng / Go kopanngwa ga dipono tsa bakwadi ba ba farologaneng go dira buka e le nngwe e e utlwanang eo sengwe le sengwe sa yone se bopang selo se sesha se se feletseng ke kgwetlho e kgolo mo baithuting ba ngwaga wa ntlha.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: inchubo lapho tincenye tihlanganiswa ngalokuphelele / Kuhlanganiswa kwemibono lehlukile yebabhali kube ngumbhalo munye lapho yonkhe lemibono yenta lokusha ngulenkhulu inselelo kubafundzi labenta umnyaka wabo wekucala.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: maitele ane nga khao zwipiḓa zwa vhekanywa fhethu huthihi zwa vha tsho fhelelaho / Ṱhanganyo ya kuvhonele kwa vhaṅwali vho fhambanaho u vha tshibveledzwa tshithihi tsho fhelelaho tshine khatsho tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tsha vhumba tshithu tshiswa tsho fhelelaho ndi khaedu khulwane kha matshudeni a ṅwaha wa u thoma.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: endlelo leri ha rona swiphemu swi vekiwaka kun’we eka hinkwaxo / eka xitsariwa xin’we xa vuxaka byo tiya laha eka xona hinkwayo yi vumbaka hinkwayo leyintshwa i ntlhontlho lowukulu swinene eka machudeni ya lembe ro sungula.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ihlelo lokuhlanganisa iingcezu / Umhlanganiso wabatloli abahlukileko ubunjwa ngokuhlelekileko lapho yoke into eyenza okupheleleko kuba sitjhijilo ebfundini bomnyaka wokuthoma.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: inkqubo leyo amalungu ahlanganiswa kunye abe yinto epheleleyo / Uhlanganiso lwezimvo zababhali abohlukeneyo zibe ngumbhalo omnye onamatheleneyo apho yonke into yenza okutsha okupheleleyo ngumngeni ongundoqo kubafundi bonyaka wokuqala.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: inqubo yokuhlanganisa izinto zibe into ephelele / Ukuhlanganiswa kwemibono yababhali abahlukahlukene ibe umbhalo ohambisanayo lapho yonke into yakha into entsha ephelele kuyinselele kakhulu kubafundi bonyaka wokuqala.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: the quality of being honest and possessing strong moral principles / What we need is a leader with high moral and professional integrity. / the state of being whole and not divided / Without the dramatic music, the play loses its integrity. / the state of being whole and not divided / its integrity.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: die eienskap van eerlik te wees en sterk morele beginsels te hê / Wat ons nodig het is ’n leier met hoë morele en professionele integriteit.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: boemo ba ho phethahala le ho se arolwe. / Ka ntle ho mmino wa ditshwantsho, tshwantshiso e lahlehelwa ke boleng ba yona.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: boleng bja go ba le bonnete le go ba le melao ye e tiilego ya maitshwaro. / Seo re se nyakago ke go ba le moetapele wa go ba le maitshwaro a godimo le potego ya boprofešenale.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: seemo sa go felela ka gotlhe mme go sa kgaogana. / Kwa ntle ga mmino wa terama, terama ya serala e latlhegelwa ke botlalo jwa yone.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kubumbana hhayi kwehlukana. / Ngaphandle kwemculo wemdlalo, umdlalo ulahlekelw akubumbana.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u dzhenisa tshithu kha tsho fhelelaho kana u ita uri tshi vhe tshipiḓa tshatsho. / U shuma na zwitshavha afho yunivesithi zwi ita uri hu vhe na u baḓekana ha risetshe kha ḽiṅwe sia na u guda kha ḽiṅwe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: nkoka wa ku va loyi a tshembekeke no va ni misinya ya matimba ya matikhomelo. / Leswi hi swi dingaka i murhangeri loyi a nga ni matikhomelo ya xiyimo xa le henhla no va ni vutshembeki bya xiphurofexinala.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ikhwalithi yokuba neqiniso nokuba namarherho wemikghwa anamandla. / Esikufunako mdosiphambili onemikghwa yokuziphatha emihle nemikghwa emihle emsebenzini.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: imo yokuphelela okungahlukani. / Ngaphandle komculo oshukumayo, umdlalo uphelelwa bubulungisa bawo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isimo sokupheleliswa futhi kungehlukaniswa. / Uma kungathiwa kukhishwa lo mculo omnandi kangaka kulo mdlalo, lo mdlalo usungalahlekelwa ubumqoka bawo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: abilities / I am amazed at my uncle’s intellect. / entirety of man’s mental and spiritual abilities / I am amazed at my uncle’s intellect. / the power and capacity of the mind to reason and think logically / The intellect is not the most important aspect of a person’s personality.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: die krag en vermoë van die verstand om logies te redeneer en te dink / Die intellek is nie die belangrikste aspek van ’n persoon se persoonlikheid nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: bokgoni bo feletseng ba kelello ya motho le ba moya / Ke tsota bohlale ba malome.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: palomoka ya bokgoni bja monagano le moya wa motho / Ke makatšwa ke bokgoni bja malome.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: bokgoni jwa motho jwa mogopolo le jwa semoya bo feletse / Ke gakgamadiwa ke botlhale jwa ga malome.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: nemoya wemuntfu / yamalume.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u fhelela ha vhukoni ha kuhumbulele na ha muya / Ndo mangadzwa nga u vha ramaṱali ha malume anga.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xiheri xa miehleketo ya munhu na vuswikoti hi swa vukhongeri / Ndzi hlamarisiwile hi vutivi bya malume.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: amandla nanyana ikghono lomkhumbulo lokucabangisisa nanyana lokucabanga kuhle. / Ingqondo akusiyo ingcenye eqakathekileko yesimilo somuntu.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: amandla okanye isakhono sengqondo sokunika isizathu okanye ukucinga ngokufanelekileyo. / Ingqondo asiyiyo eyona mbonakalo ibalulekileyo yesidima somntu.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubeka izizathu noma ukucabanga ngokuqondile. / Ubuhlakani akusiyona into eyakha kakhulu umuntu ngokwakhe.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: relating to a highly developed intellect / My uncle is very intellectual and can have intellectual conversations on various topics. / relating to a highly developed intellect / intellectual conversations on various topics.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: wat met ’n hoogs ontwikkelde intellek verband hou / My oom is baie intellektueel en kan oor verskillende onderwerpe intellektuele gesprekke voer.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: e amanang le matla a kelello a ntsheditsweng pele ka mokgwa o hlwahlwa / Malome o bohlale haholo mme o kgona ho tshwara dipuisano tse bohlale ditabeng tse fapaneng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: e amana le bokgoni bjo bo kaonafaditšwego kudu / ba le dipoledišano tša bokgoni go direrwa tša go fapana.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: mo go amanang le botlhale jo bo kwa godimo / Malome o botlhale tota e bile o kgona go tshwara metlotlo e e botlhale ka ditlhogo tse di farologaneng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: lokuphatselene nentfutfuko yebuhlakani lobusezingeni lelisetulu / Malume wami unebuhlakani kakhulu futsi uyakhona kukhulumisana ngebuhlakani kuletinyenti tihloko.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwi elanaho na vhuṱali ho bveledziswaho vhukuma / Malume anga vha na vhuṱali vhukuma nahone vha a kona u vha na nyambedzano dza vhuṱali kha ṱhoho dzo fhambanaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: swi yelana ni vuswikoti lebyi ndlandlamuxiweke swinene / Malume u ni vutlhari naswona u kota ku va ni mivulavurisano ya vutlhari eka tinhlokomhaka to hambanahambana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuhlobene nengqondo ebukhali / Umalume wami uhlakaniphe khulu begodu sikhe sicoce ngezinto ezihlakaniphileko ngaphasi kweehloko ezihlukileko.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: okunxulumene nengqondo obuphuhle ngokuphezulu / Umalume wam unengqondo kakhulu kwaye unokuba neengxoxo zengqondo kwizihloko ezahlukeneyo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okuhlobene nokuhlakanipha kakhulu / Umalume wami uhlakaniphe kakhulu futhi angakwazi ukuba nezingxoxo ezihlakaniphile ngezihloko ezahlukahlukene.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to make something intellectual / It’s amazing how some teachers can intellectualise a child’s bad behaviour without thinking for a moment about its psychological causes.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: iets intellektueel maak / Dis verstommend hoe sommige onderwysers ’n kind se swak gedrag kan intellektualiseer sonder om ’n oomblik aan die sielkundige oorsake daarvan te dink.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho etsa hore ntho e itseng e be bohlale / Ke ho makatsang ho bona hore na ke jwang matitjhere a ka hlalefisang boitshwaro ba ngwana bo bobe ntle le ho nahana le ka motsotswana mabapi le disosa tsa kelello.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira se sengwe go kgonega / Go a makatša ka moo barutiši ba bangwe ba ka kgonagatšago maitshwaro a mabe a morutwana ntle le go nagana motsotswana ka ga mabaka a monagano wa gagwe.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go bona lebaka la go direga ga sengwe / Go a gakgamatsa gore barutabana bangwe ba kgona go bona seipato sa boitshwaro jo bo sa siamang jwa ngwana ba ntse ba sa akanye le go akanya ka dilo tse di amanang le tlhaloganyo tse di bo bakang.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kwenta intfo ibe nebuhlakani / Kuyamangalisa indlela labanye bothishela bangakhuluma ngayo ngekutiphatsa lokubi kwemntfwana ngaphandle kwekucabanga kancane ngetimbangela tengcondvo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ita uri tshithu tshi vhe tsha maṱali / Zwi a mangadza uri vhaṅwe vhadededzi vha a kona hani u ita uri vhuḓifari vhu si havhuḓi ha vhana vhavho vhu nge u vhuṱali hu sina u elekanya na kathihi nga ha zwivhangi zwa saikhoḽodzhikhala zwa izwi zwithu.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku endla xin’wana xa vutlhari / Swa hlamarisa hilaha vadyondzisi van’wana va kotaka ku pfuneta ku herisa mahanyelo yo biha ya n’wana handle ko ehleketa hi nkarhi hi mayelana ni swivangelo swa miehleketo.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza into enokuhlakanipha / Kutarara bonyana abanye abotitjhere bangahlakaniphisa umntwana onokuziphatha kumbi ngaphandle kokucabanga kancani ngembangela yobusayikholoji.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza into ibe nengqondo / Iyamangalisa indlela ootitshala abathile abanokwenza kube nengqondo ngako ukuziphatha okubi komntwana bengakhange bacinge nakancinci noonobangela bengqondo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza into ethile ihlakaniphe / Kuyamangaza ngempela indlela abanye othisha abakwazi ngayo ukwenza ukuziphatha okubi kwengane kube okuhlakaniphile ngaphandle kokucabangisisa nje ngembangela yakho engokwengqondo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: view that overestimates the function of the intellect by elevating it above all other human capacities as the only criterion for understanding reality / Intellectualism denies the value of integration between intellect, emotion, sensuality and intuition for a more integrated perception of reality.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: siening wat die funksie van die intellek oorskat deur dit bo alle ander menslike vermoëns uit te lig as die enigste maatstaf vir die verstaan van die werklikheid / Intellektualisme ontken die waarde van integrasie tussen intellek, emosie, sensualiteit en intuïsie vir ’n meer geïntegreerde persepsie van die werklikheid.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: maikutlo a feteletsang tshebetso ya bohlale ka ho bo phahamisa ho feta ditsebo tsohle tse ding tsa batho jwalo ka ha e ka ke bona mokgwatlhahlobo bakeng sa ho utlwisisa dintho tsa sebele / Intelektjhualisimi e latola boleng ba kopanyo ya bohlale, maikutlo le monahano bakeng sa mohopolo o kopaneng wa boemo ba sebele.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kgopolo ya gore go šišinya go feta tekano mošomo wa bokgoni ka go e godišetša ka godimo ga mabokgoni ka moka a motho bjalo ka mokgwa o le tee wa go kwešiša nnete. / Kgonagatšo e ganetša mohola wa kopanyo gare ga bokgoni,maikutlo, boipshino le boikutlo go temogo ye ntši ye e kopantšwego ya nnete.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: pono e e feteletsang go dira ga motho yo o botlhale ka go dira gore go bonale go le kwa godimo ga bokgoni botlhe jo bongwe jwa go tlhaloganya dilo tsa mmatota / Botlhale bogolo ga bo amogele gore go ka nna le go dirisana magareng ga botlhale, maikutlo, dirwe tsa kutlo le temogo go lemoga dilo tsa mmatota botokanyana.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono lolinganisa kakhulu kusebenta kwengcondvo ngekuwenyusa ngetulu kwawo onkhe lamanye emandla emunttfu njengayinye indlelakuhlola yekuvisisa liciniso / Buhlakani buphika kubaluleka kwekuhlanganisa emkhatsini webuhlakani, imiva, kucabanga nemuva ngemcondvo lohlanganisiwe weliciniso.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: lwo kalulaho mushumo wa ramaṱali nga u gonyisa zwa fhira vhukoni ha muthu vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe saizwi I nḓila I yoṱhe ya u pfesesa ngoho / Vhuramaṱali vhu hanedza ndeme ya ṱhanganyelo vhukati ha vhuṱali, vhuḓipfi, zwipfi na kuvhonele kwo ṱanganelaho kwa ngoho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: vonelo leri pimanyetaka ku tlula mpimo ntirho wa vutlhari hi ku byi tlakusela ehenhla eka hinkwabyo vuswikoti bya vanhu tanihi swipimelo ntsena swa matwisiselo ya xiviri. / Vutlhari byi alana na nkoka wa nhlanganiso exikarhi ka vutlhari, matitwelo, nyanyuko wa xirho xa rimbewu na vutivi byo kala nseketelo ka mavonelo yo hlanganyisiwa ku tlula mpimo hi xiviri.

afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: die verstaan van ’n situasie sonder om doelbewus daaraan te dink / Haar intuïsie het haar laat besef dat die situasie gevaarlik was.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho utlwisisa ka kotloloho taba e itseng ntle le kenello ya mohopolo kapa dikutlo / Haeba hanghang o utlwisisa ntho e itseng ntle le ho fumana tlhahisoleseding ya sebele ka yona, e ka nna ya ba ke kutlwisiso ya hao e iketsahallang e sebetsang nakong eo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go lebiša kwešišo ya taba ntle le tsenogare ya monagano goba dikwi / Ge o hwetša pono ka se sengwe moo o se nago tshedimošo ya go tlala, ke pono ya gago ya gore o mošomong.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go tlhaloganya selo ka tlhamalalo kwa ntle ga go thusiwa ke mogopolo le dirwe tsa kutlo / Fa ka tshoganyetso fela go simolola go tlhaloganya sengwe se tota o senang tshedimosetso e utlwalang ka sone, go ka direga gore seo ke kutlwisiso.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuvisisa kuyintfo loyiva ngenhlitiyo ngaphandle kwemcabango lowunakile. / Kuva ngenhlitiyo kwakhe bekumtjela kutsi lesimo siyingoti.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: kupfesesele thwii kwa mafhungo hu sina u dzhenelela ha muhumbulo kana zwipfi. / Arali vha sokou vha na luvhonela kha tshithu tshine vha sa vhe na mafhungo a mbuno khatsho, hu nga vha hu khou shuma luvhonela lwavho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku twisisa xiyimo handle ka ku titwa ka le miehleketweni. / Mapfalo yakwe a ya ri karhi ya n'wi byela leswaku xiyimo lexi a ri eka xona a xi ri xa khombo.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuzwisisa ubujamo ngaphandle komkhumbulo wokuzibonela ngehliziyo. / Ihliziywakhe beyimtjela bona bujamo obuyingozi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuqonda imeko ngaphandle kokucinga ngayo. / Ithuku lakhe lendalo limxelele ukuthi yimeko enobungozi.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuqonda isimo esithile ngaphandle kokuthi uze ube nomcabango othile ngaso. / Ukushiywa yigazi kwakhe kwakumtshela khona ukuthi kwakuyisimo esiyingozi lesi.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: reacting to intuition / Modern man has lost his intuitive way of experiencing the world largely due to the overemphasis on analytical thinking.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho arabela kutlwisisong e iketsahallang / Motho wa mehleng ena o lahlehetswe ke tsela ya kutlwisiso e iketsahalang ya ho ba le boiphihlelo ka lefatshe haholoholo ka lebaka la kgatiso e feteletseng monahanong o hlophollang taba.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: arabela pono / Monna wa sebjalebjale o lahlegetšwe ke tsela ya gagwe ya ponego ya go itemogela lefase ka bophara ka lebaka la go gatelela kudu go nagana ka go sekaseka.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira dilo ka ntlha ya kutlwisiso / Motho wa gompieno o latlhegetswe ke kutlwisiso ya gagwe ka lefatshe thatathata e le ka ntlha ya gore a gatelela thata go akanyetsa dilo kwa teng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuhlobene nekuphenya / Bantfu besimanje sebalahlekelwe yindlela lenembako yekwati kabanti umhlaba ngenca yekugcizelela kakhulu ekucabangeni kwekuhlatiya.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u nyanyuwa kha luvhonela / Munna wa musalauno ha tshe na ndila ya luvhonleaya u tshenzhela lifhasi nga nwambo u khwathisedzesa kuhumbulele kwa musaukanyo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku angula eka vutivinkaseketelo / Vavanuna va manguvalawa va lahlekeriwile hi mhaka ya vutivinkaseketelo ya ku tiva misava, ngopfungopfu hikokwalaho ka ku tiyisisa ku tlula mpimo eka miehleketo yo xopaxopa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuziphendulela ngokuzibonela / Indoda yesimanjemanje ilahlekele yindlela yokuzibonela iphasi khulukhulu ngonobangela wokucabanga ngokuhlaziyo nangokugandelela ngokudlulileko.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: okunxulumene nokuziva / Umntu wala maxesha uphulukene nendlela yakhe yokuziva yokuphonononga umhlaba kakhulu ngenxa yogxininiso olugqithisileyo lokucinga uhlalutya.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho batlisisa kapa ho hlahloba ntho e itseng e le ho fumana nnete ya yona. / batlisisitse tshwaetso ya motjheso le mohatsela nakong ya ntho e kopaneng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go utulla le go hlahloba se sengwe gore go hwetšwe nnete ka ga se. / Sehlopha sa banyakišiši ba nyakišitše khuetšo ya themphereitšhara mo go nako ya pholo ya go ikema.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: relating to an investigation / The investigative nature of your work requires that you pay careful attention.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: something / support his argument. / to use a rule or law as a reason for doing something / The politician invoked historical events to support his argument. / to use or provide as a reason to support something that you are saying or doing / The politician invoked historical events to support her argument.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho sebedisa kapa ho fana ka lebaka ho tshehetsa ntho e itseng eo o e buang kapa ho e etsa / Madipolotiki o ile a qotsa diketsahalo tsa histori ho tshehetsa taba ya hae.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku tirhisa nawu tanihi xivangelo xa ku endla swin'wana. / N'watipolotiki u tirhisile swihumelelo swa matimu ku seketela cincano wa miehleketo yakwe.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: characterised by irony / It is ironic to praise economic growth while it does not mean anything to the man in the street. / characterised by irony / while it does not mean anything to the man in the street.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: e nang le moelelo o fapaneng o tshehisang / Ke ho bua taba e tshehisang ka ho thoholetsa kgolo ya ekhonomi mothating oo sena se sa boleleng letho ho motho feela ya tlwaelehileng.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho soma ka ho sebedisa mantswe a nang le moelelo o fapaneng o tshehisang / Ha a tswa phapusing ya tlhahlobo, o ile a bua mantswe a nang le moelelo o fapaneng o tshehisang ka pampiri e thata ka mantswe ana: Na e ne se mantlwana jwale!

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: sotla ka go dirisa se se tshegisang / sotla ka tsela e tlhatlhobo eno e neng e le boima ka teng a re: A itse seno e ne e le mantlwana a bana fela!
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: uhlekisa ngekubhuca / Nakaphuma egunjini leluhlolo, ubhuca ngeliphepha lelilukhuni ngemagama: bekungasiso sikhatsi semagama ebantfwana nyalo?

nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlekisa ngokusebenzisa itshimo / Nakaphumako ngegumbini yokuhlola, utshime ubudisi bephepha ngalamagama: Bekungasimdlalo womntwana!
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: hleka ngokusebenzisa impoxo / Njengoko ephuma kwigumbi leemviwo, uphoxa iphepha elinzima ngamagama: Ibingengomdlalo wabantwana ngoku!
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: sebenzisa ukubhuqa / Njengoba ephuma egumbini lesivivinyo, ubhuqa iphepha elinzima ngamagama alandelayo: Yeka ukuthi beliwumdlalo wezingane kanjani!

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho sebedisa mantswe kapa mokgabo-puo e bolelang taba e fapaneng le e bolelwang, kapa phapang pakeng tsa se lebeletsweng le se etsahalang ka sebele / Taba ya moelo o fapaneng o tshehisang ke hore senatlahadi sa mampodi lebitso la sona ke Tiny.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tšhomišo ya mantšu goba ya seka sa polelo ba bolela tša go fapana ya seo e se bolelago,goba phapano gare ga seo seo se letetšwego le seo se diragetšego / Kgegeo ke gore nkgwete ye kgolo ya go pinyana leina la gagwe ke Tiny.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dirisa mafoko kgotsa mokgabisa puo o bua sengwe se se fapaaneng le se tota o se kayang, kgotsa pharologanyo magareng ga se se lebeletsweng le se tota se diregang / Se se tshegisang ke gore leina la mmampodi wa ntwa ya go mekamekana yo e leng seganka ke Ramokhutswe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: sebentisa emagama noma tinongo tenkhulumo usho lokuphikisana analoko lokukushoko, noma kuphikisana emkhatsini walekulindzelekile naloko lokwentekako / Kubhuca kwekutsi ligama lelichawe lelikhulu lewrestling nguTiny.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u shumisa maipfi kana figara ya muambo ine ya amba zwo fhambanaho na zwine zwa ambiwa, kana u dzulela u vhambedza vhukati ha zwo lavhelelwaho na zwine zwa itea zwa vhukuma / Ḽishandafhungo ndi ḽa uri dzina ḽa ngweṋa khulu ya tsinde ndi Tiny.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku tirhisa marito kumbe xigaririmi hi ku vula swo landzula swa leswi swi vulaka swona, kumbe ku hambana exikarhi ka leswi swi languteriwaka na leswi swi vulaka swona hi xiviri / Xikhovolelo hi leswaku vito ra xihontlovila xa nghwazi ya ntlangu wa mpfinyano.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukusetjenziswa kwamagama nofana kweengcezu zekulumo ngokutjho okuphikisana nalokho okutjhiweko, nofana ukutjhayisana hlangana kwalokho okulindeleko nalokho okwenzeke kwamambala / Iitshimo bonyana uTiny angahlula indlovu.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukusetyenziswa kwamagama okanye isafobe usitsho into echaseneyo nale ithethwayo, okanye inkcaso phakathi kwento elindelekileyo kunye nento eyenzeka nyani / Impoxo kukuba ingxilimbela kanomji igama layo nguTiny.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: standard or position on a scale / The international conference on new developments in quantum physics that I attended was at such a high level that many of us could not understand the papers.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: standaard of posisie op ’n skaal / Die internasionale konferensie oor nuwe ontwikkelings in die kwantumfisika wat ek bygewoon het, was op so ’n hoë vlak dat baie van ons nie die referate kon verstaan nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: pehelo kapa boemo sekaleng / Seboka sa matjhaba sa ntshetsopele mabapi le quantum fisiksi seo ke ileng ka ya ho sona e ne e le sa boemo bo phahameng hoo ba bangata ba rona re neng re sa kgone ho utlwisisa dithuto.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tlwaelo goba boemo / Khonferense ya Ditšhabatšhaba ka dikaonafatšo tše difsa ka fisika ye bohlokwa yeo ke e tsenetšego e be e le ya legato la godimo yeo bontši bja rena re bego re sa kwešiše dipampiri.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: boemo mo sekaleng / Khonferense ya boditšhabatšhaba e ke neng ke ile kwa go yone e ne e le ya maemo a a kwa godimo jaana mo e leng gore ba le bantsi ba rona re ne re sa tlhaloganye dipampiri.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: lizinga noma indzawo esikalini / ngentutfuko lensha kuquantum yefiziksi lengaya kuyo beyisezingeni lelisetulu kakhulu kwekutsi labanyenti betfu abakawavisisi lamaphepha.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshilinganyo kana vhuimo kha tshikalo / Khoniferentsi ya mashangoḓavha nga ha mveledziso ntswa kha fisikisi ya khwanthamu ye nda i dzhenela yo vha I ya ḽeveḽe ya nṱha lwe vhunzhi hashu a ro ngo pfesesa mabammbiri.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: mpimo kumbe xiyimo eka xikalo / Nhlengeletano ya matiko ya misava ya nhluvukiso lowuntshwa wa antswiso lowukulu wa sayense leyi ndzi nga yi nghenela a yi ri eka xiyimo xa le henhla laha vunyingi bya hina a hi nga koti ku twisisa maphepha.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: okujayelekileko nanyana isikhundla esikalini / Ingqungquthela yamazwe omhlaba ngezetuthuko entjha kwi-quantum physics engangikade ngiyo yayisezingeni eliphakeme kangangokuthi abanengi bethu babengawaqondi amaphepha.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: umgangatho okanye isikhundla kwisikali / Inkomfa yehlabathi ngokutsha kwifiziki yekhwantam ebendiye kuyo ibikwinqanaba eliphezulu kangangokuba uninzi lwethu khange luwaqonde amaphepha.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isimiso noma indawo esikalini / Ingqungquthela yamazwe wonke yokusungulwa okusha kwe-quantum physics engayihambela yayisezingeni eliphezulu kangangokuthi iningi lethu alizange liqonde umbhalo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to bring down to the same level or standard as something else / It is disappointing how standards in education and in various service delivery sectors in South Africa are leveled down.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: tot dieselfde vlak of standaard as iets anders verlaag word / Dit is teleurstellend hoe standaarde in onderwys en in verskillende diensleweringsektore in Suid-Afrika vervlak word.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho theolela boemong bo tshwanang kapa boemong bo bong ba itseng / Ho swabisa ho bona kamoo maemo a thuso le mafapha a fapaneng a phano ya ditshebeletso mona Afrika Borwa a theohetseng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go iša legato la go swana goba boemo go swana le se sengwe / Go a nyamiša ka moo maemo ka go thuto le ka go makala a kabo ya ditirelo a go fapana ka Afrika Borwa a išwago fase.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go isa kwa tlase kwa seemong se se lekanang le sa se sengwe / mo thutong le mo dikarolong tse di farologaneng tsa tlamelo ka ditirelo mo Aforika Borwa e ileng kwa tlase ka teng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kwehlisela ezingeni lelifanako noma lizinga njengalokunye lokutsite / Kuyadvumata kutsi emazinga kutemfundvo nakuleminye imikhakha lehlukahlukene yekuniketwa kwetinsita eNingizimu Afrika ehliswa njani.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u tsitsela fhasi kha ḽeveḽe nthihi kana tshilinganyo tshithihi na tshiṅwe / A zwi takadzi uri maga kha pfunzo na kha sekithara dza nḓisedzo ya tshumelo dzo fhambanaho Afrika Tshipembe a khou linganyiswa.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku yisa xiyimo ehansi eka xiyimo xo fana kumbe mpimo tanihi xilo xin’wana / Swa nyumisa hilaha mipimo eka dyondzo na swiyenge swin’wana swo nyika vukorhokeri eAfrika-Dzonga swi le ka xiyimo xa le hansi.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwehlisa izinga nanyana indinganiso efanako njengokunye okuthileko / Kuyawuphula ummoya bonyana amazinga aphansi kwezefundo nasemikhakheni ehlukahlukene yokulethwa kwezidingo eSewula Afrika ancishiswa njani.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwehlisa usisa kwinqanaba okanye umgangatho ofanayo njengenye into / Iyatyhafisa indlela imigangatho kwimfundo kunye kunye nakumacandelo onikezo lweenkonzo eMzantsi Afrika eyehliswe ngayo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwehlisela ezingeni noma esimisweni esifanayo njengokunye / Iyadumaza indlela izimiso zezemfundo nezeminye imikhakha yokuhlinzekwa kwezinsizakalo ezehliswe ngayo eNingizimu Afrika.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: action of bringing something to the same level or standard as something else in order to attain uniformity / More and more people are becoming concerned about the downward levelling of standards in South Africa’s education and municipal service delivery systems.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: handeling van iets op dieselfde vlak of peil as iets anders te bring deur skakerings en nuanses weg te werk om eenvormigheid te verkry / Al hoe meer mense raak bekommerd oor die afwaartse gelykmaking van standaarde in Suid-Afrika se onderwys- en munisipale diensleweringstelsels.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ketso ya ho etsa hore ntho e itseng e tliswe boemong bo tshwanang jwalo ka ntho e nngwe e fapaneng hore ho bolokwa ho tshwana / Batho ba bangata ka ho eketsehileng ba tshwenyehile ka ho theohela tlase ha maemo a thuto Afrika Borwa hammoho le ditshebeletso tsa phano ya ditshebeletso hara bomasepala.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tiro ya go tliša selo legatong la go swana goba boemo bja selo se sengwe go fihlelela tshwano / Batho ba bantši ba toma go tshwenyega ka ga go išwa fase ga maemo a thuto ka Afrika Borwa le mananeo a kabo ya ditirelo a mmasepala.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: kgato ya go dira gore senwe se tle mo seemong se se lekanang le sa se sengwe gore di tshwane / Batho ba le bantsi ba tshwenyega thata ka go ya kwa seemong se se kwa tlase ga melao mo thulaganyong ya thuto le tlamelo ka ditirelo tsa mo Aforika Borwa.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: sento sekuletsa lokutsite ezingeni noma ezingeni lelifana njengalokunye kuze kutfolakale kufanana / Bantfu labaningi bayakhatsateka ngekuncipha kwemazinga etemfundvo eNingizimu Afrika nasetinhlelweni tekuletfwa kwetinsitakalo tamasipala.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: nyito ya u ḓisa tshithu kha ḽeveḽe nthihi kana tshilinganyo sa tshiṅwe u itela uri hu vha na u fana. / Vhunzhi ha vhathu vha khou vhilaedzwa nga ha u linganyiselwa fhasi ha zwilinganyo zwa pfunzo ya Afrika Tshipembe na sisiṱeme dza nḓisedzo ya tshumelo ya masipala.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: goza ro tisa xin’wana eka xiyimo xo fana kumbe xiyimo tanihi xilo xin’wana ku endlela ku fikelela vufani. / Vanhu vo tala kumbe ku tlula mpimo va kumeka va vilela hi mayelana ni ku yisa xiyimo ehansi xiyimo xa dyondzo ya Afrika-Dyondzo na mafambiselo ya vukorhokeri bya masipala.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: isenzo sokuletha okuthileko ezingeni nanyana ezingeni elifanako njengokunye ukuze kutrholakale ukufana / Abantu abanengi bayatshwenyeka ngokwehla kwamazinga emazingeni efundo yaseSewula Afrika nasezinhleleni zokulethwa kwezinsizakalo zikamasipala.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: isenzo sokwenza into ibe kwinqanaba okanye umgangatho ofanayo nenye into ukuze kufunyanwe ukufana / Abantu abaninzi baya bexhalaba ngokulinganiswa kwemigangatho okuya ezantsi kwemfundo neenkqubo zonikezo lweenkonzo zikamasipala yoMzantsi Afrika.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: isenzo sokwenza okuthile kube ezingeni noma esimisweni esifanayo njengokunye ukuze kube khona ukufana / Abantu abaningi nakakhulu manje sebeyakhathazeka ngokwehla kwezimiso emfundweni nasezinhlelweni zokusebenza kukamasipala eNingizimi Afrika.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: the greatest or smallest amount that is allowed / He pushed his body to its physical limits during the marathon. / to set a restriction to the size or amount above or below something may not extend / Students must limit themselves to the core facts of each test question, otherwise they will not be able to finish the test. / to set a restriction to the size or amount above or below something may not extend / core facts of each test question, otherwise they will not be able to finish the test.

nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: kgaoletšo ya ka moo se sengwe se ka dirago goba ka moo di ka dirago ka gona. / Khamphani e beile magomo a nako yeo re nago le yona go ka phetha protšeke.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: miehleketo yo hlawulekisiwa hi ku hlongorisa hi leswi tekelaka ximanguvalawa enhlokweni – ku ehleketa ko ntshnxeka, maendlelo na tindlela / Vanhu vo tala va sola vumanguvalawa ka ku nyamalala ka vukati tanihi ku sungula swa ndhavuko hikuva vantshwa vo tala masiku lawa va tshama kun’we handle ko tekana.

xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ingcinga ephawulwa kukulandela into ethathwa njengokuba yeya maxesha – ukucinga ngokukhululekileyo, izimvo, izenzo nezimbo zala maxesha / Abantu abaninzi basola inkolo yezi mini ngokuphela komtshato njengento yemveli kuba uninzi lwabantu abatsha kule mihla bayahlalisana bengatshatanga.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: new word or phrase, or a recognised word used in a new meaning / The term LOAD SHEDDING is a neologism which came into existence because of Eskom’s inability to provide electricity.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: lentswe le letjha kapa polelwana, kapa lentswe le amohetsweng le sebediswang ka moelelo o motjha / Polelo HO IMOLLA PHEPELO YA MOTLAKASE ke polelwana ya neolojisimi e entsweng ka lebaka la ho hloleha ha Eskom ho fana ka motlakase
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: lentšu le lefsa goba sekafoko / Lereo le GO KGAOTŠWA GA MOHLAGASE ke neolotšisemo yeo e bilego gona ka lebka la go palelwa ke go aba mohlagase ga Eskom.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: lefoko kgotsa polelo e ntshwa, kgotsa lefoko le le itsiweng mme le neilwe bokao jo bosha / Lereo LOAD SHEDDING ke lefoko le le itlhametsweng morago ga gore Eskom e retelelwe ke go tlamela ka motlakase.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ligama lelisha noma libintana, noma ligama lelatiwako lelisetjentiswa kunchazelo lensha / Lithemu LOAD SHEDDING liyiniyolojizimu lebekhona ngenca yekwehluleka kwa-Eskom kuniketa gezi
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: ipfi liswa kana ḽifurase, kana ipfi ḽi dzhielwaho nṱha ḽi shumiswaho kha ṱhalutshedzo ntswa / Ipfi ḽa U SHUMISA MUḒAGASI NGA U SIELISANA ndi neoḽodzhizimu yo ḓaho nga u kundelwa ha Eskom u ṋekedza muḓagasi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: rito lerintshwa kumbe xivulavulelo, kumbe rito leri nga amukeriwa ku tirhisiwa eka nhlamuselo leyintshwa / Theme ra NTIRHISOGEZI HI KU SIYERISANA i niyologizimi leri nga va kona hikokwalaho ka ku tsandzeka ka Eskom ku nyika gezi.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: igama elitjha nanyana idlanzana, nanyana igama elaziwakoo elisetjenziswe ehlathululweni entjha / Igama elithi UKUWA KWEGEZI liyisazi semvelo esivela ngonobangela wokuhluleka kuka-Eskom ukunikela igesi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: igama okanye ibinza elitsha, okanye igama elaziwayo kwintsingiselo entsha / Igama elithi DANYA CIMI WOMBANE kukubumba igama elitsha elibe khona ngenxa yokungakwazi kukaEskom ukubonelela ngombane.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: igama noma umusho omusha, noma igama elaziwayo elisetshenziswa ngencazelo entsha / Igama elithi LOAD SHEDDING igama eliqanjiwe elaba khona ngenxa yokwehluleka kwe-Eskom ukuhlinzeka ngogesi.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: malebana le lefoko le lesha / Lereo le lesha la LOAD SHEDDING le ne la simolola ka nako ya fa Aforika Borwa e ne e na le mathata a motlakase ka 2018.

nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: mayelana negama elitjha / Igama le-neologistic elithi UKUWA KWEGEZI lathoma ngesikhathi semraro kagesi eSewula Afrika ngo-2018.

nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ekiša se sengwe goba se sengwe ka go ekiša goba mokgwa wa tshegišo, ka pheteletšo ya ka boomo ka poleo ya kgegeo / Kabo ya go ekišwa ya moswantšhi wa go tuma Mona Lisa se hlasetšwe ke ditsebi tša bokgabo.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go sotla mongwe kgotsa setaele sa motaki ka tsela e e sotlang e bile o feteletsa ka boomo / Go nyatsa le go sotla ka hisitori ke dilo tsa ditlhamane tsa metlheng ya morago ga segompieno.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku encenyeta un’wana kumbe xin’wana hi ndlela yo hlekula kumbe hi ndlela ya xihlekiso, hi ku thathela hi vomu hi ku endla xikhovolelo / Ku tekela ehansi na ku encenyeta i matimu ya swihlawulekisi swa nkantiyiso swa mutshila wa khale.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: motshehetsi ya matla ya kgothetseng wa motho, sehlopha kapa mosebetsi o itseng eo hangata a sa nahaneng ka tselae hlakileng mabapi le taba. / Batshehetsi ba itlamme ka diketane difateng ho baballa meru.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: e rileng mme e se ka metlha a akanyang ka ntlha eno / ka metlha ba kotsi bogolo jang fa ba tshameka mo pele ga balatedi ba bone.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: exceptionally good / Winston Churchill was a phenomenal British politician – indeed a phenomenon!

tsn: Ka tsela e e duleng diatla
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: according to the theory of phenomenology / Friedrich Hegel’s way of reasoning is phenomenological.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: volgens die teorie van fenomenologie / Friedrich Hegel se denkwyse is fenomenologies.

nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka teori ya go kgahliša / Mokgwa wa go fahlela wa Friedrich Hegel ke kgahlišo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka kgopolo ya selo se se duleng diatla / Tsela ya ga Friedrich Hegel ya go akanya e dule diatla.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngekwethiyori yalokumangalisako / Indlela kaFriedrich Hegel yekucabanga iyamangalisa.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi ku ya hi thiyori ya vuhleketi / Ndlela ya Friedrich Hegel ya ku anakanya i ya swa vuhleketi.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokutjho kombono we-phenomenology / Indlela kaFriedrich Hegel yokucabanga iyamangalisa.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokwethiyori yokumangalisa / Indlela yokucinga kaFriedrich Hegel yemangalisayo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okuvumelana nemfundiso yesayensi yokumangalisayo / Indlela yokubonisana kaFriedrich Hegel iyamangalisa kakhulu.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: trend in philosophy that thoroughly and accurately describes phenomena without hypotheses about their causes / Phenomenology is a trend in philosophy that maintains that every individual has a unique state of knowledge, based on previous experiences and inherited ideas.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: stroming in die filosofie wat verskynsels (fenomene) grondig en noukeurig beskryf sonder hipoteses oor die oorsake daarvan / Fenomenologie is ’n stroming in die filosofie wat aanvoer dat elke individu unieke kennis het, gebaseer op vorige ervarings en oorgeërfde idees.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshekamelo filosofing e hlalosang ka ho phethahetseng le ka ho nepisisa diketsahalo tse hlollang ntle le tekantshetso mabapi le disosa tsa tsona / Thuto ya diketsahalo tse hlollang ke tshekamelo ya filosofi e kgomaretseng hore motho e mong le e mong o na le boemo bo ikgethang ba tsebo, ho itshetlehile ka boiphihlelo ba nakong e fetileng le mehopolo e fuputsitsweng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: karolo ka go filosofi yeo e hlalovago gabotse gape ka tsenelelo kgahlišo ntle le haephothesaesa sehlolwa / Kgahlišo ke karolo ya kgahlišo yeo e hlokomelago gore motho yo mongwe le yo mongweo na le tsebo ya moswananoši, go lebeletšwe maitemogelo a go feta le dikgopolo tša tlhago.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshekamelo ya filosofi e e tlhalosang tiragalo nngwe ka botlalo le ka nepo / Fenomenoloji ke mokgwa wa filosofi o o dumelang gore batho botlhe ba na le kitso ya bone, go ya ka maitemogelo a bone le dikgopolo tse ba nang le tsone.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: umkhuba kufilosofi wekutsi kahle nangokunembile izenzeko ngaphandle kokucabanga ngezimbangela zazo / I-Phenomenology umkhuba wefilosofi logcina kutsi wonkhe umuntfu unesimo lesehlukile selwati, ngalokusekelwe ngulohlangene nako kwangaphambilini nemibono lezuziwe
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: maitele kha fiḽosofi ane a ṱalutshedza nga vhuronwane tshibveleli hu si na haiphothesisi na nga ha zwivhangi zwatsho / Zwa tshibveleli ndi maitele kha fiḽosofi ane a ima kha uri muthu muṅwe na muṅwe u na u na nḓivho i sa fani na ya muṅwe, ho sedzwa tshenzhelo dza kale na mihumbulo yo dzhielwaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: endlelo ra ntolovelo eka ntivovuhleketi lebyi hlamuselaka hi ku hetiseka na hi vurhon’wana ku tsakisa ngopfu handle ka nhlamuselo ya swilo leswi nga riki ni vumbhoni mayelana ni swivangelo swa vona / Vuhleketi bya endlelo ra ntolovelo eka ntivovuhleketi lebyi tiyisisaka leswaku munhu un’wana na un’wana u na xiyimo xo fana yexe ka vutivi, hi ku ya hi ntokoto lowu nga hundza na mavonelo lama nga tekeleriwa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuthambekela kwefilosofi okuhlathulula kuhle nangokunembile izenzeko ngaphandle kokucabanga ngezimbangela zazo / I-Phenomenology umukghwa wefilosofi ogcina bonyana woke umuntu unobujamo esihlukileko selwazi, ngokusekele kokuhlangenwe nakho kwangaphambilini nemibono ezuzwe njengefa.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: indlela kwifilosofi echaza ngokucokisekileyo nangokuchanekileyo isenzeko ngaphandle kwengcinga malunga noonobangela baso. / Uphononongo lwamava omntu yindlela kwifilosofi ebambelele ekubeni umntu ngamnye unemeko eyodwa yolwazi, ngokusekelwe kumava angaphambili kunye nezimvo ezifunyenweyo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: umkhuba wefilosofi ochaza ngokucophelela futhi ngokunembile izenzakalo zesimanje ngaphandle kwemibono yembangela yazo / Isayensi yezinto zesimanje ithrendi yefilosofi ebonisa ukuthi umuntu ngamunye unesimo solwazi esiyingqayizivele, ngokususelwe kokuhlangenwe nakho kwangaphambilini ngisho nemibono ewufuzo.

afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: enige toestand of proses wat deur die sintuie bekend is / Metereoloë stel belang in natuurlike verskynsels soos vloede en droogtes.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ke moholo o batlang tsebo le moelelo jwalo ka ho ba le maikutlo a bulehileng mme ka hoo motho o lokolohile tshusumetsong ya batho ya boemo / Thiori e sekasekang e fapoha ho positivisimi ka ho nahanela maemo a setso le setjhaba a susumetsang tlhaloso.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka melaometheo ya go bona dilo tse di molemo / Barutabana ba ba amogelang fela karabo e le nngwe mo maemong otlhe gore e siame ba dirisa mokgwa ono wa go leba dilo tse di molemo mo dilong tsotlhe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngekwetimiso talokuhle / Bothishela labamukela imphendvulo leyodvwa kuphela kuto tonkhe timo njengakulungile banelitsemba lelihle endleleni yabo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ya nga ha milayo ya phosethivizimu / Vhadededzi vha ṱanganedzaho fhedzi phindulo nthihi kha nyimele dzoṱhe sa ire ya ngoho ndi vha phosethivizimu kha kuitele kwavho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi ku ya hi milawu ya vuhleketi / Vadyondzisi lava va amukeleka nhlamulo yin’we ntsena tanihi leyi nga lulama a va kahle eka endlelo ra vona.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokwemigomo positivism / Abotitjhere abamukela impendulo eyodwa kuphela kuzo zoke izimo njengokulungile banetjhudu endleleni yabo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokwemithetho-siseko yefilosofi eyakhiwe phezu kwezinto ezibambekayo hayi iingcinga / Ootitshala abamkela impendulo enye kuphela kuzo zonke iimeko njengechanekileyo banefilosofi eyakhiwe phezu kwezinto ezibambekayo hayi iingcinga kwindlela abenza ngayo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokuvumelana nezimiso ze- positivism / Abafundisi abamukela impendulo eyodwa kuphela njengelungile kuzo zonke izimo babonisa isimo sobu- positivism.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: that can be done or achieved / I believe it is possible to have fun and be cool and also to be responsible, sensitive and tactful. / that can be done or achieved / It is now possible to digitise visual images, text, sound and even touch, and disseminate information encoded in these modes via computers. / that can be done or achieved / cool and also to be responsible, sensitive and tactful. / that can be done or achieved / images, text, sound and even touch, and disseminate information encoded in these modes via computers.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: wat gedoen of bereik kan word / Ek glo dit is moontlik om pret te hê en koel te wees, en terselfdertyd verantwoordelik, sensitief en taktvol.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: e ka etswang kapa ho fihlellwa / ithabisa le ho ba le boikarabelo, ho bontsha maikutlo le ho ba bohlale.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: seo se ka dirwago goba go fihlelwa / Ke kgolwa gore go a kgonagala go ithabiša gomme wa lokologa gape wa ba le maikarabelo, wa naganišiša, gape wa hlokomela.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: -ka kgonang go dirwa kgotsa go fitlhelelwa. / Jaanong ke selo se se kgonegang go dira gore ditshwantsho tsa pono, sekwalwa, modumo le kamo e nne tsa dijithale, le go phatlalatsa tshedimosetso e e tsentsweng jaaka khoute mo mekgwatirisong e ka dikhomphiutha.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: lokungentiwa noma lokungazuzwa. / Manje sekuyakhoneka kwenta tibonwa, imibhalo lebhaliwe, umsindvo ngisho nekutsitsa kube ngemagabelo noma ngendlela yebudijithali kanye nekwendlulisa lwatiso lolwentiwe ngaletindlela ngekusebentisa bongcondvomshini.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwi a kona u itea kana u swikelwa. / zwifanyiso, maṅwalwa na mibvumo kana u kwama hu rumelwe hu kha didzhithaḽa nga khomphyutha.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: lexi nga endliwa kumbe fikeleriwa / Ndzi tshemba swa koteka ku va ni misawu na ku va kahle naswona nakambe ku va ni vutihlamuleri, ku hatla ku khumbaka na hi ku tirhisa marhengu.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: okungenziwa nanyana okungazuzwa. / Njenganje sekuyakghoneka ukutjhugulula iinthombe ezibonwako, umtlolo, itjhada bewukuthinte begodu ukhambise ilwazi elitjhugulluliweko ngaleendlela lafakwa kukhomphyutha.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: enokwenziwa okanye ifikelelwe. / Ngoku kuyenzeka ukwenza imifanekiso, umbhalo, isandi nokuthinta, nokusasaza ulwazi olufakwe ikhowudi kwezi zimo ngekhompyutha.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okungenzeka noma kufinyelelwe / Ngikhokhelwa ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi uzijabulise futhi uthandeke kodwa futhi ube umuntu onesibopho, ozwelayo futhi onokuqonda.

tsn: thuto e e lebang ka kwa ga segompieno
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: school of thought in the arts, philosophy, religion, technology and a variety of other fields that arose after and deviated from various 20th century movements representing modernism, and which are characterised by nonfundamentalist, more accommodating views / To a great extent the literature on postmodernism has been dominated by philosophers and modern language theorists.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: denkrigting in die kunste, filosofie, godsdiens, tegnologie en ’n verskeidenheid ander gebiede wat ontstaan het ná en afwyk van verskillende 20ste eeuse bewegings wat die modernisme verteenwoordig, en wat gekenmerk word deur niefundamentalistiese, meer akkommoderende sienings / Die literatuur oor postmodernisme is tot ’n groot mate oorheers deur filosowe en moderne taalteoretici.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: mehopolo ya bonono, filosofi, bodumedi, theknoloji le makala a mang a fapaneng a bileng teng kamora ho le ho fapoha dihlopheng tse fapaneng tsa dilemong tsa lekgolo la bo20 e neng e emela modenisimi le e neng e na le maikutlo a sa dumellaneng ho ditlwaelo, e neng e na le maikutlo a amohelang maikutlo a eketsehileng / Ka tekanyo e kgolo dibuka tsa kamora modenisimi di ne di susumetswa haholo ke borafilisofi le batshehetsi ba dithiori tsa puo ya mehleng ena.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: sekolo sa dikgopolo ka bokgabo, folosofi, tumelo, theknolotši le phapano ya dikarolo tšeo di tšwelelago ka morago ga ge ke fetogetše dipaka tša mesepeloya go fapanaa bo20 yeo e emelago ba g se be ba motheo, dikgopolo tše dintši tšeo di akaretšwago / Go go golo dingwalwa tša ka morago ga sebjalebjale e akareditšwe ke bafilosofa le diteori tša polelo ya sebjalebjale.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: kgopolo mo go tsa botaki, filosofi, bodumedi, thekenoloji, le dikarolo tse dingwe tse di neng tsa tsoga morago le go fapoga mo mekgatlhong e e farologaneng ya lekgolo la bo 20 la dingwaga di bontsha, go tlhaga ka dikgopolo tsa segompieno, tse di nang le boganetsa bongangatlelatumelo, di amogelang dipono tse di farologaneng / Go ya selekanyong se segolwane dibuka tse di buang ka go leba ka kwa ga segompieno di ntse di laolwa ke baratafilosofi le baithuta puo ba gompieno.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: sikolo semcabango kutebuciko, ifilosofi, inkholo, buchwepheshe kanye naleminye imikhakha leyahlukahluk ene leyavela ngemuva futsi yaphambuka kutinhlangano letahlukahlukene temnyakalikhulu wema-20 simele sikhatsi sesimanjemanje, futsi lesibonakala nge-nonfundamentalist, imibono leminyenti levumako / Ngekwelizinga lelikhulu imibhalo lephatselene ne-postmodernism iye yabuswa tati tefilosofi netati tethiorists telulwimi lwanamuhla.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshikolo tsha kuhumbulele kha vhutsila, fiḽosofi, vhurereli, thekhinoḽodzhi na masia maṅwe o fhambanaho kune kwa bva kha na nga murahu ha mitsukunyeo yo fhambanaho ya ḓaṅwaha20 zwi imelelaho zwa musalauno, nahone zwine zwa ṱalulwa nga vha sa tendi kha zwa mutheo, kuvhonele kune kwa vha ku ṱanganedzaho vhukuma. / U swika huṅwe maṅwalwa kha nga murahu ha zwa musalauno zwo ḓalesa vhorafiḽosofi na vhorathyeori vha luambo vha musalauno.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: miehleketo eka swa vutshila, ntivovuhleketi, vukhongeri, thekinoloji na ku hambana ka swiyenge swin’wana leswi humelelaka endzhaku na ku va swi cinciwa ku suka eka mafambelo ya dzana ra malembe ya vu-20 yo hambana yi yimelaka manguvalawa, na leswi swi tihlawulekisaka hi mpfumaleko wa masungulo, ku amukela mavonelo yo tala swinene / Eka xiyimo xa le henhla swinene matsalwa endzhaku ka xivumbeko ma nyikeriwile hi vativavuhleketi na vutshuri va miehleketo yo karhi ya tindzimi ta manguvalawa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: isikolo somcabango kwezobukghwari, ifilosofi, ikolo, ithekhnoloji kanye neminye imikhakha eyahlukahlukene eyavela ngemuva godu yaphamqala ekunyakazeni okuhlukahlukene kwekhulu lama-20 elimele inkathi yesimanjemanje, godu ebonakala nge- nonfundamentalist, imibono evumayo / Ngokwezinga elikhulu imitlolo ephathelene ne- postmodernism iye yabuswa izazi zefilosofi nezazi zethiorists zelimi lanamahlanjesi.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ingcinga kubugcisa, ifilosofi, inkolo, ubuchwepheshe kunye neentlobo zezinye iinlo ezavela okanye zasuka kwiintsukumo ezahlukeneyo zenkulungwane yama-20 ezimele izinto zala maxesha, kwaye ezihamba nezimvo ezingabambeleli ntweni, ezamkela ngokungaphaya / Ukuya kuma ekubeni uncwadi kwinkolo yokusuka kwizinto zala maxesha luye lwagcwalisa ziifilosofa kunye nabeethiyori zolwimi lwala maxesha.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono wobuciko, ifilosofi, inkolo, ubuchwepheshe kanye neminye imikhakha ehlukahlukene eyavela ngokuhamba kwesikhathi futhi waphambuka nezinhlangano zemikhulu yeminyaka yama-20 ezazimelela izinto zesimanje, futhi ezichazwa ngemibono engeyona eyobufundementali, futhi esekelayo / Ngokwezinga elikhulu izincwadi ezimayelana nezinto zesimanje ziye zabuswa abafilosofi nezazi zemibono bolimi lwesimanje.

tsn: thuto ya go leba ka kwa ga segompieno
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: according to postmodern theory / If you think truth is relative because it is determined by social, historical and cultural contexts, you think in a postmodernist way.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: volgens die teorie van postmodernisme / As jy dink dat die waarheid relatief is omdat dit deur sosiale, historiese en kulturele kontekste bepaal word, dink jy op ’n postmodernistiese manier.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho ya ka thirori ya kamora modenisimi / Haeba o nahana hore nnete e na le meedi ka hobane e laolwa ka mehopolo ya setjhaba, histori le setso, o nahana ka tsela ya kamora modenisimi.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka teori ya ka morago ga sebjalebjale / ge o nagana gore nnete e amanya ka gore e laolwa ke tikolgo ya leago, histori le setšo, o nagana ka tsela ya ka morago ga sebjalebjale.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka dikgopolo tsa thuto ya go leba ka kwa ga segompieno / Fa o akanya gore boammaaruri bo ka kgona go tlhalosiwa ka ditsela tse di farologaneng ka gonne bo laolwa ke maemo a loago, hisitori le setso, go raya gore o akanya jaaka batho ba ba lebang ka kwa ga segompieno.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngekusho kwembono wesimanje / Uma ucabanga kutsi liciniso lihlobene ngoba kuncunywa timo temphakatsi, temlandvo nemasiko, ucabanga ngendlela ye- postmodernist.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ya nga ha thyeori ya nga murahu ha zwa musalauno / bva kha nyimele ngauri I vhonala nga kha nyimele ya matshilisano, ya ḓivhazwakale na ya mvelele, vha humbula uri nga nḓila ya nga murahu ha zwa musalauno.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi ku ya hi thiyori ya ndzhaku ka xivumbeko / Loko u ehleketa ntiyiso wu na nkoka wo karhi hikuva wu kuma hi vanhu, swa matimu na mhaka ya swa ndhavuko, u ehleketa hi ndlela ya mutivandzhaku ka xivumbeko.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokutjho kombono wesimanje / Nangabe ucabanga bonyana iqiniso lihlobene ngombana kunqunywa ngezimo zehlalakuhle, zomlando nezamasiko, ucabanga ngendlela ye- postmodernist.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokwethiyori echasene nokwala maxesha / Xa ucinga ukuba inyani iyathelekiseka kuba imisela yimixholo yezentlalo, yezembali kunye neyenkcubeko, ucinga ngendlela echase okwala maxesha.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokwemfundiso yemiphumela yezinto zesimanje / Uma ucabanga ukuthi iqiniso liyindaba yokuzinqumela ngoba lichazwa ngemongo yezenhlalakahle, yezomlando ngisho neyezesiko, ucabanga ngendlela yemiphumela yesimanje.

tsn: thuto e e lebang dilo morago ga kagego ya tsone
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: 1960’s and 1970’s as a criticism of the structural basis on which structuralism studies and explains human culture / To a great extent the literature on post- structuralism has been dominated by philosophers and modern language theorists. / Intellectual movement in France in the 1960’s and 1970’s as a criticism of the structural basis on which structuralism studies and explains human culture / To a great extent the literature on post- structuralism has been dominated by philosophers and modern language theorists. / Intellectual movement in France in the 1960’s and 1970’s as a criticism of the structural basis on which structuralism studies and explains human culture / To a great extent the literature on post-structuralism has been dominated by philosophers and modern language theorists.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: Intellektuele beweging in Frankryk in die 1960's en 1970's as kritiek op die strukturele basis waarop strukturalisme die menslike kultuur bestudeer en verklaar / Die literatuur oor post-strukturalisme is tot ’n groot mate oorheers deur filosowe en moderne taalteoretici.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: Filosofi ya bohlale For a dilemong tsa bo1960 le bo1970 jwalo ka tshekatsheko ya motheo wa dithuto tsa setraktjharalisimi le ho hlalosa setso sa batho / Ka tekanyo e kgolo dibuka tsa kamora setraktjharalisimi di ile tsa susumetswa ke ditsebi tsa filosofi le dithiori tsa puo tsa mehleng ena.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: Mesepelo ya bokgoni ka Fora ka bo 1960 le 1970 bjal ka tshekatsheko ya motheo wa sebopego moo dithuto tša diithuti tša setšo le go hlaloša setšo sa batho. / Go phatlalala dingwalwa tša diithuti tša ka morao ga setšo di be di tletše ka bafilosofa le barateori ba polelo ya sebjalebjale.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: Mokgatlho mongwe wa kwa Fora ka bo1960 le bo1970 o o neng o nyatsa motheo wa go agega ga selo o o ithutang le go tlhalosa popego ya motho / thuto e e lebang dilo morago ga kagelo ya tsone di tletse ka dithuto tsa batlhalefi le baithuta dipuo ba gompieno.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: inhlangano yetebuhlakani eFrance ngabo-1960 kanye nabo-1970 njengekugcekwa kwesisekelo sesakhiwo lapho sakhiwo sifundza sibuye sichaze lisiko lemuntfu / Ngekwelizinga lelikhulu imibhalo lephatselene nekwakhiwa ngemuva kokuhleleka iphetfwe tati tefilosofi kanye nabosothiyoloji belulwimi besimanje.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: Mutsukunyeo wa ngelekanyo wa ngei Fura nga vho 1960 na vho 1970 sa tsatsaladzo ya mutheo wa tshivhumbeo une khawo ngudo dza stirakitsharaḽizumu dza ṱalutshedza mvelele ya muthu / U swika huṅwe fhethu maṅwalwa a nga murahu ha stirakitsharaḽizumu o vha o ḓala vhorafiḽosofi na vhorathyeori vha luambo lwa musalauno.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: Mafambiselo ya miehleketo yo hluteka eFurwa hi va 1960 na va 1970 tanihi mhaka eka vusandzi bya tidyondzo ta mavumbekelo na tinhlamuselo ta ndhavuko wa vanhu / Eka xiyimo xa le henhla swinene matsalwa endzhaku ka mavumbekelo ya nyikeriwile hi vativavuhleketi na hi mutshuri wa miehleketo yo karhi ya tindzimi ta manguvalawa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: Ukunyakaza kobuhlakani eFrance ngeminyaka yama-1960 kanye nawo-1970 njengokugxekwa kwesisekelo sokwakheka okufundwa kuso godu kuchazwe amasiko esintu / Ngokwezinga elikhulu imitlolo ephathelene nokwakhiwa ngemuva kokuhleleka ibuswa yizazi zefilosofi kanye nezazi zethiyo zolimi zesimanje.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: Umbutho weengqondi eFrance ngoo-1960 noo-1970 njengokugxeka isiseko solwakheko eso izifundo zengcinga yokuba kukho ulwakheko olo umhlaba ujikeleza kuso kwaye lucacisa inkcubeko yomntu / Ukuya kuma ekubeni uncwadi kwinkolo yokuba inyani ibonwa njengombhalo luye lwagcwalisa ziifilosofa kunye nabeethiyori zolwimi lwala maxesha.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: Inhlangano yezazi yaseFrance yangawo-1960 nawo-1970 eyayigxeka isisekelo sokwakheka kobuntu ngocwaningo lwe- structuralism futhi nokuchaza isiko lomuntu / Ngokwezinga elikhulu izincwadi ze- post-structuralisim ziye zabuswa abafilosofi ngisho nezazi zezimfundiso zolimi lwesimanje.

nso: diithuti tša ka morago ga setšo
tsn: go leba dilo morago ga kagego ya tsone
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: according to the theory of post- structuralism / The post-structuralist views of writers such as Derrida, Foucault and Deleuze have strongly antagonised the more traditional scholars and caused repercussions especially in the world of literary criticism. / according to the theory of post-structuralism / The post-structuralist views of writers such as Derrida, Foucault and Deleuze have strongly antagonised the more traditional scholars and caused repercussions especially in the world of literary criticism.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: volgens die teorie van die post-strukturalisme / Die post-strukturalistiese sienings van skrywers soos Derrida, Foucault en Deleuze het die meer tradisionele geleerdes sterk gegrief en veral in die wêreld van literêre kritiek reperkussies veroorsaak.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho ya ka thiori ya kamora setraktjharalisimi / Maikutlo a bangodi a kamora setraktjharalisimi a kang a Derrida, Foucault le Deleuze a entse hore bafuputsi ba sekametseng haholo dithutong tsa tlwaelo ba hanyetse maikutlo ana mme sena se bile le ditlamorao lefatsheng la tshekatsheko ya dibuka.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka teori ya ka morago ga diithuti tša setšo / Dikgopolo tša ka morago ga diithuti tša setšo go swana le Derrida, Foucault and Deleuze ba lwantšhane kudu dirutegi tša go lebela setšo kudu gomme tša hlola khuetšo kudu lefaseng la tshekatsheko ya kanegelo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka thuto e e lebang dilo morago ga kagego ya tsone / Dipono tsa go leba dilo morago ga kagego ya tsone tsa bakwadi ba ba tshwanang le Derrida, Foucault le Deleuze di ile tsa tlhasela bakanoki ba dilo tsa setso tsa ba tsa baka mathata bogolo jang mo dilo tse di go nyatsa dibuka.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngekusho kwembono we-post- structuralism / Imibono yebabhali labanjengaDerrida, Foucault naDeleuze iphikise kakhulu tifundziswa tendzabuko futsi yabangela imiphumela ikakhulukati emhlabeni wekugcekwa kwemibhalo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ya nga ha thyeori ya nga murahu ha stirakitsharaḽizumu / Kuvhonele kwa nga murahu ha stirakitsharaḽizumu kwa vhaṅwali ku nga ho kwa Vho Derrida, Foucault na Deleuze kwo vhaisa vhunzhi ha vhorapfunzho vha sialala na u vhanga masiandaitwa nga maanḓa kha tsatsaladzo ya maṅwalwa.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi ku ya hi thiyori ya ndzhaku ka xivumbeko / Miehleketo ya mutivandzhaku ka xivumbeko ya vatsari vo fana na tanihi Derrida, Foucault na Delueze va na ku hlundzukisiwa hi matimba ku va swidyondzeki swa ntolovelo na ku vanga switandzhaku ngopfungopfu eka misava ya vusandzi bya matsalwa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokutjho kombono we-post-structuralism / Imibono yabatloli abanjengoDerrida, Foucault noDeleuze iphikise khulu izifundiswa zendabuko godu yabangela imiphumela khulukhulu emhlabeni wokugxekwa kwemitlolo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokwethiyori yenkolo yokuba inyani ibonwa njengeyombhalo / Imbono zenkolo yokuba inyani ibonwa njengeyombhalo zababhali abafana noDerrida, Foucault noDeleuze babange ngamandla ukuba iingqondi zemveli ezingaphaya zibe nobutshaba kwaze ke kwaba khona iziphumo ezithile ingakumbi kwihlabathi lokugxekwa koncwadi.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokuvumelana nemfundiso ye- post-structuralisim / Imibono ye-post-structuralist yababhali abafana noDerrida, uFoucault noDeleuze iye yaphikisa ngokunamandla izazi eziningi zezemfundo futhi yabangela imiphumela engemihle ikakhulukazi emhlabeni ogxeka indlela yokubhalwa.

tsn: dumela mo go nneng teng ga selo
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: proposition suggesting the existence or truth of something as the basis for reasoning / Offe challenges the postulate of an organised capitalism. / to make a statement / MacMillan (2019: 445) postulates that violence often occurs in well-to-do households. / to suggest that something is true so that it can be used as the basis for an argument / Researchers postulate that a big comet killed the dinosaurs.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: stelling wat die bestaan of waarheid van iets as die basis vir redenasie voorstel / Offe daag die postulaat van ’n georganiseerde kapitalisme uit.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho etsa polelo / MacMillan (2019: 445) posetjhuleita hore dintwa di etsahala hangata malapeng a matle.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira setatamente / MacMillan (2019: 445) o akanya gore dikgaruru gantši di direga magaeng a goke kgona.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira polelo / MacMillan (2019: 445) o dumela gore thubakanyo gantsi e nna teng mo malapeng a a itsholetseng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuvakalisa umbono wekutsi intfo letsite iliciniso kute kutsi isetjentiswe njengesisekelo noma sisusa senkhulumomphikiswano. / Bacwaningi babeka njengalokuliciniso kutsi inkhanyenti lenkhulu lenemsila yathulisa ledinosaurs.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: madzinginywa ane a dzinginya u vhuhone kana ngoho ya tshithu sa mutheo wa kuhumbulele / Vho Offe vha ṋekedza khaedu khumbulelo dza khephithalisimu yo dzudzanyeaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku endla xitatimente / Macmillan (2019:445) u anakanya leswaku madzolonga mikarhi hinkwayo ya humelela eka mindyangu leyi tikotaka.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to ask questions, often in official or academic context / Einstein seriously questioned Niels Bohr’s quantum theory early in the 20th century, because he did not believe in its validity.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: om vrae te stel, dikwels in amptelike of akademiese verband / Einstein het Niels Bohr se kwantumteorie vroeg in die 20ste eeu ernstig bevraagteken, omdat hy nie in die geldigheid daarvan geglo het nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho botsa dipotso, hangata ka tsela ya semmuso kapa ya akhademiki / Einstein o ile a botsa ka ho tebileng thiori ya quantum ya Niels Bohr ya dilemong tse qalang tsa lekgolo la 20, ka hobane o ne a sa dumele bonnete ba yona.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go botšiša dipotšišo, gantši ka mabaka a semmušo goba a thuto / Einstein o botšišitše go tsenelela teori ye bohlokwa ya Niels Bohr pele ka paka ya 20, ka gore o be a sa kgolwe bonnete bja yona
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go botsa dipotso, gantsi e le mo maemong a semmuso kgotsa mo thutong e e kwa godimo / Einstein o ne a botsa dipotso tse dintsi tota ka kgopolo ya ga Niels Bohr mo masimologong a lekgolo la bo 20 la dingwaga, ka gonne o ne a sa dumele gore e boammaaruri.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kubuta imibuto, imvama kungcikitsi lesemtsetfweni noma yemfundvo / Einstein ngekutimisela wabuta ithiyori yequantum yaNiels Bohr yasekucaleni kweminyakalikhulu yema-20, ngoba bekangakholelwa ekubeni semtsetfweni kwayo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u vhudzisa mbudziso, kanzhi kha nyimele ya tshiofisi kana ya akademi / Vho Einstein vho vhudzisesa Vho Neils Bohr kha thyeori yavho ya ndeme mathomoni a ṅwaha ḓana wa vhu 20, ngauri a vho ngo tenda vhundeme hayo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku vutisa swivutiso, hi mikarhi yo tala eka xiyimo xa vatirhelamfumo kumbe swidyondzeki / Einstein hi ku hiteka u vutiserile thiyori ya antswiso wa Niels Bohr eku sunguleni ka dzana ra malembe ya vu- 20, hikuva a nga tshembi eka vutirhiseki bya xona.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubuza imibuzo, ivamisa ebujameni esisemthethweni nanyana kwezefundo / U-Einstein wayibuza ngokungathi sína ikolelo ye- quantum kaNiels Bohr ekuqaleni kwekhulu lama- 20, ngombana wayengakrholelwa ebunyeni bayo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubuza umbuzo, kaninzi kumxholo osemthethweni okanye wemfundo ephakamileyo / U-Einstein wayibuza ngenene ithiyori yekhwantam kaNiels Bohr ekuqaleni kwenkulungwane yama-20, kuba wayengakukholwa ukunyaniseka kwayo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubuza imibuzo, ngokuvamile kumongo wezemfundo. / U-Einstein wabuza nge-quantum theory kaNiels Bohr ekuqaleni kwamakhulu weminyaka yama-20 ngoba wayengakukholwa ukuba iqiniso kwakho.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: the critical process of asking questions / Niels Bohr refuted Einstein’s questioning of his quantum theory at the large gathering of scientists in 1927 by providing evidence for each and every one of Einstein’s questions. / the critical process of asking questions / his quantum theory at the large gathering of scientists in 1927 by providing evidence for each and every one of Einstein’s questions.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: kritiese proses van vrae te stel / Niels Bohr het Einstein se bevraagtekening van sy kwantumteorie tydens die groot byeenkoms van wetenskaplikes in 1927 weerlê deur bewyse te lewer vir elkeen van Einstein se vrae.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshebetso ya ho hloma dipotso ka tsela e sekasekang / Niels Bohr o ile a hanyetsa ho hloma dipotso ha Einstein thioring ya hae ya quantum sebokeng se seholo sa borasaense ka 1927 ka ho fana ka bopaki bakeng sa potso ka nngwe ya dipotso tsa Einstein.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshepetšo ye bohlokwa ya go botšiša dipotšiso / Niels Bohr o ganetšana le potšišo ya Einstein ka ga teori ye bohlokwa mo kopanaong ye kgolo ya boramahlale ka 1927 ka go fa bohlatse go potšišo ye nngwe le ye nngwe ya Einstein.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: thulaganyo e e gagametseng ya go botsa dipotso / Niels Bohr o ne a tsholola ntlha eno ya ga Einstein ya go botsa dipotso ka kgopolo ya gagwe kwa kokoanong e kgolo ya baithuta saense ka 1927 ka go ntsha bosupi go araba potso nngwe le nngwe e Einstein a neng a e botsa.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: inchubo lebucayi yekubuta imibuto / Niels Bohrwakucitsa kubuta kwaEinstein kwethiyori yakhe yequantum emhlanganweni lomkhulu wabososayensi ngabo- 1927 ngekuniketa bufakazi bamunye namunye wemibuto ya- Einstein.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: maitele ndeme a u vhudzisa mbudziso / kuvhudzisele kwa ndeme kwa Vho Einstein kha maguvhangano mahulwane a saintsi inga 1927 nga u ṋekedza vhuṱanzi ha iṅwe na iṅwe ya mbudziso dza Vho Einstein.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: endlelo ra nkoka ro vutisa swivutiso / yo antswisa eka nhlengeletano leyikulu ya van’wasayense hi 1927 hi ku nyika vumbhoni bya un’wana na un’wana ka swivutiso swa Einstein.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: inqubo ebucayi yokubuza imibuzo / UNiels Bohr ukuphikile ukubuzwa kuka-Einstein ngombono wakhe we-quantum embuthanweni omkhulu wososayensi ngo-1927 ngokunikela ubufakazi ngombuzo ngamunye ka-Einstein.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: inkqubo ebalulekileyo yokubuza imibuzo / UNiels Bohr wakungqina ukuba akuyonyani ukubuza kukaEinstein ithiyori yakhe yekhwantam kwintlanganiso enkulu yoosonzululwazi ngo-1927 ngokunika ubungqina kuwo ngamnye kwimibuzo kaEinstein.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: inqubo ebucayi yokubuza imibuzo / UNiel Bohr waphikisa ukubuza kuka- Einstein nge-quantum theory yakhe emhlanganweni omkhulu wososayensi ngo-1927 ngokunikeza ubufakazi bemibuzo ngayinye ka- Einstein.

afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: woorde van ’n ander persoon, wat iemand in sy of haar eie skryfwerk of toespraak gebruik, met ’n aanduiding van die bron / As jy aanhalings wil gebruik in ’n teks wat jy skryf, moet die bronne van sulke aanhalings behoorlik erken word.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: mantswe a motho e mong, ao motho e mong a a sebedisang sengolweng kapa puong ya bona, ka pontsho ya mohlodi. / Haeba o batla ho sebedisa diqotso ka hara sengolwa seo o se ngolang, mehlodi ya diqotso tseo e lokela ho tsebahatswa ka tshwanelo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: mongwe, ao yo mongwe a a šomišago mo go ngwaleng ga bona goba polelong ya bona, ka taetšo ya mothopo. / Ge o nyaka go šomiša ditsopolwa mo temaneng yeo o e ngwalago, methopo ya ditsopolwa e swanetše go tsebišwa gabotse.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: mafoko a a tswang mo mothong yo mongwe, a motho mongwe o a dirisang mo sekwalong sa gagwe kgotsa mo puong ya gagwe, ka go supa motswedi. / Fa o batla go dirisa dinopolo mo sekwalweng se o se kwalang, metswedi ya dinopolo tsa go nna jalo e tshwanetse go amogelwa le go kaiwa ka tsela e e maleba.

xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: amazwi avela komye umntu, lawo umntu othile ewasebenzisa kumbhalo wakhe okanye intetho, nokubonisa imvelaphi. / Xa ufuna ukusebenzisa izicatshulwa kumbhalo owubhalayo, imithombo yezicatshulwa ezinjalo kufuneka yaziswe ngokukuko.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: asetshenziswa ngomunye umuntu embhalwe wakhe noma enkulumweni yakhe, kodwa bese ekhombisa ukuthi lawo magama avela kumuphi umthombo. / acashuniwe embhalweni owubhalayo, imithombo lapho usuke uthathe khona lawo mazwi acashuniwe kusuke kumele uyisho ngendlela efanele.
