ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: miselwe ku noma kusebentisa sizatfu. / Ngenca yehlangabetana nekukhula kwemtselo, bosomabhizinisi labanyenti ba tawutsatsa sincumo lesinengcondvo sekutsi basebentise intalo yabo kunekutsi bayifake kulutjalomali.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwo ḓisendeka kana zwi shumisa ngelekanyo. / Nga nṱhani ha muthelo wo gonyiswaho, vhunzhi ha vhoramabindu vha ḓo ita tsheo yo elekanywaho ya u shumisa phurofiti dzavho u fhira u bindudza hafhu.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi ku ya hi kumbe ku tirhisa xivangelo / Hi fanele ku endla swiboho leswi nga swa mpimo naswona hi ku tsakela ka hina vinyi swinene.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: kudzimelele ekusebenziseni isizathu. / Ngokuqalana nomthelo okhuphukako, inengi labosomabhizinisi lizokuthatha isiqunto esinganangqondo sokusebenzisa iinzuzo zabo kunokobana basise ngobutjha.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokusekelwe okanye ngokusebenzisa ingqondo. / Ngokujongene nerhafu enyukayo, abanini bamashishini abaninzi baya kwenza isigqibo esinengqondo sokusebenzisa iinzuzo zabo kunokuzizalisa kakho.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okususelwe kwisizathu esithile. / bamabhizinisi abaningi bebebhekene nengwadla yentela ephezulu, bagcine sebethathe isinqumo esinengqondo sokuthi imali eyinzuzo abayitholayo bayisebenzise ukusenoma bayitshale futhi.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: act or process of rationalising / People often use the psychological trick of rationalisation as a defense mechanism to justify their poor behaviour through simplified arguments. / giving reasons for one's behaviour that makes the action taken sound logical, but that have been made up after the fact / He offers all sorts of rationalisations for his strange behaviour. / makes the action taken sound logical, but that have been made up after the fact / He offers all sorts of rationalisations for his strange behaviour. / the process of making a company or industry more efficient, especially by laying off staff / A spokesperson confirmed the company was proceeding with a rationalisation plan but said retrenchment figures had not been finalised.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: die gee van redes vir gedrag wat die optrede logies laat klink, maar wat agterna bedink is / Hy bied allerhande rasionaliserings vir sy vreemde gedrag aan.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho fana ka mabaka bakeng sa boitshwaro ba motho a etsang hore ketso e nkuweng e utlwahale e na le kelello, empa e le se entsweng ho pata nnete / O ile a fana ka tokafatso ba mefuta yohle bakeng sa boitshwaro ba hae bo sa tlwaelehang.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go fa mabaka a maitshwaro a motho ao a dirago gore tiro e kwagale e kwagala, eupša yeo e dirilwego ka morago ga ntlha / O aba mehuta ka moka ya phokotšo go maitshwaro a gagwe a go makatša.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: thulaganyo ya go dira gore setlamo se dire botoka, bogolo jang ka go fokotsa badiri / Mmueledi o ne a tlhomamisa gore setlamo se ne se tswelela ka thulaganyo ya sone ya go fokotsa mme o ne a re lefa go ntse jalo ga ba ise ba tlhomamise dipalo tsa ba ba tla kgaolwang mo tirong.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: inchubo yekwenta inkampani noma imboni isebente kahle, ikakhulukati ngekudziliza basebenti / ucinisekisile kutsi inkampani ichubeka neluhlelo lekuhlenga tintfo kodvwa watsi tibalo tekudzilitwa kwebantfu atikaphotfulwa.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: maitele a u ita uri khamphani kana nḓowetshumo i shumese, nga maanḓa nga u imisa mushumi / Muambeli o khwaṱhisedza uri khamphani yo vha i khou bvela phanḓa na u pika nga khumbulo fhedzi mbalo idzo dza vho fhungudzwaho mushumoni a dzi athu khunyeledzwa.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: endlelo ro endla khampani kumbe feme yo swi kota swinene, ngopfungopfu hi ku veketela vatirhi / Muvulavuleri u tiyisisa leswaku khampani yi ya emahlweni na pulani ya ku hunguta ku vula tinhlayo ta ku galacha vatirhi to ka ti nga si hetisiwa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: bonyana isenzo sithathwe sizwakale sinengqondo, kodwana lokho kwenziwe ngemuva kweqiniso / Unikela zoke izinhlobo zezizathu zokuziphatha kwakhe okungajayelekileko.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: isenzo okanye inkqubo yokunika ingcaciso / Abantu ixesha elininzi basebenzisa iqhinga elinxulumene nengqondo lokunika ingcaciso njengendlela yokuzikhusela ukuba izizathu ngokuziphatha kwabo kakubi ngeengxoxo ezenziwe lula.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: inqubo yokwenza ukuthi inkampani noma umkhakha uphumelele nakakhulu, ikakhulukazi ngokudiliza abasebenzi / Umkhulumeli waqinisekisa ukuthi inkampani yayiqhubeka nokudiliza kodwa wathi inani labantu abazodilizwa lalingakaqinisekiswa.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: cut spending and reduce jobs by layoffs / The government now has to rationalise and cut public service posts, because the country can clearly not afford the salary bill of public servants. / give a rational explanation or justification / Hitler’s re-occupation of the Ruhr area was a calculated decision, therefore historians can rationalise it. / give a rational explanation or justification / calculated decision, therefore historians can rationalise it.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: besteding verminder en werksgeleenthede deur afleggings verminder / Die regering moet nou rasionaliseer en staatsdiensposte besnoei, omdat die land duidelik nie die salarisrekening van staatsamptenare kan bekostig nie.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho fana ka qaqiso e utlwahalang kapa tokafatso / Ho kena hape ha Hitler sebaka sa Ruhr e bile qeto e neng e nahannwe, kahoo borahistori ba ile ba lokafatsa sena.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go fa tlhalošo ya go kwagala goba kgonthišo / Go dula gape ga Hitler lefelong la Ruhr e bie sephetho seo se badilwego, ka gona borahistori ba ka se fokotša.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go fokotsa ditshenyegelo le go fokotsa ditiro ka go tlogedisa ba bangwe tiro / Puso jaanong e tshwanetse go fokotsa ditshenyegelo mme e fokotse diphatlhatiro mo pusong, ka gonne ga go na pelaelo gore naga ga e kgone go duela madi a mantsi jaana a badiredi ba setšhaba.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kunciphisa kusetjentiswa kwemali nekunciphisa imisebenti ngekudzilitwa / Hulumende manje sekufanele alinganise futsi ancume tikhala temsebenti wemphakatsi, ngoba live ngalokusobala alikwati kukhokhela sikweleti semaholo sebasebenti bahulumende.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u fhungudza zwibviswa na u fhungudza mishumo nga u fhungudza vhashumi / Muvhuso zwino u tea u pika nga khumbulo na u fhungudza poswo dza vhashumeli vha muvhuso, ngauri shango zwi khagala uri a ḽi swikeleli miholo ya vhashumeli vha muvhuso.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku nyika nhlamuselo yo hunguta kumbe ya mfanelo yo endla xo karhi / ku hlayeleriwile xiboho, hikokwalaho vativamatimu va kota ku swi ehleketa.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: nikela ihlathululo enengqondo nanyana ukulungiswa / Ukuthathwa ngobutjha kukaHitler endaweni yaseRuhr kwakuyisiqunto esabalwa, ngakho-ke izazi-mlando zingasilinganisa.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: hlisa inkcitho kwaye wehlsie imisebenzi ngodendo / Urhulumente ngoku kufuneka anike izizathu aze ehlise izithuba kwinkonzo karhulumente, kuba ilizwe ngeke likwazi ukuhlawula ibhili yemivuzo yabasebenzi bakarhulumente.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukunciphisa izindleko nokudiliza abantu / Manje uhululumeni kudingeka ukuthi anciphise izindleko futhi amise ukuqasha, ngoba kusobala ukuthi inkampani ayikwazi ukukhokhela abasebenzi bakahulumeni.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: that has been placed into the sphere of reason or logic / His rationalised arguments didn’t fool anyone, because everyone knew what was really happening.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: wat in die sfeer van die rede of die logika ingetrek is / Sy gerasionaliseerde argumente het niemand geflous nie, want almal het geweet wat regtig gebeur.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ntho e behilweng boemong bo nang le mabaka kapa bo utlwahalang / Mabaka a hae a lokafatsang ha a ka a thetsa mang kapa mang, ka hobane e mong le e mong o tseba seo hantlentle se ileng sa etsahala.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: yeo e beilwego karolong ya go fa mabaka goba go kwagala / Dingangišano tša gagwe tša go kwagala ga se tša tlaetša motho, ka gore mang le mang o be a tseba gore go direga eng.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: se se akanyeditsweng kgotsa se utlwala / Dipolelo tsa gagwe tse di akanyeditsweng ga di a ka tsa tsietsa ope, ka gonne mongwe le mongwe o ne a itse se tota se diregang.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: loko kubekwe emkhakheni wekucabanga noma walokunengcondvo / timphikiswano takhe letilinganiselwe atikakhohlisi muntfu, ngoba wonkhe umuntfu bekati kutsi kwentekani .
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: zwo vheiwaho kha tshikhala tsha khumbulo kana thevhekano / Khanedzano dzavho dzi pikwaho nga khumbulo a dzo ngo fhura muthu na muthihi, ngauri muṅwe u a ḓivha uri ho vha hu khou itea mini.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: lexi nga vekiwa endzeni ka xiyenge xa ku anakanya kumbe vutlhari bya miehleketo / Mijhekanjhekisano ya yena yo hunguta a yi phuntisangi un’wana, hikuva un’wana na un’wana u tiva leswi nga ku humeleleni hi xiviri.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: lokho kubekwe emkhakheni wokucabanga nanyana okunengqondo / Iimpkiswano zakhe ezilinganisele azikhohlisanga muntu, ngombana woke umuntu wayazi bonyana kwenzakalani ngembala.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: okubekwe kwicandelo lokunika izizathu okanye ingqiqo / Ingxoxo zakhe azinike izizathu khange zibhanxe mntu, kuba wonke umntu ebeyazi into eyenzekayo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: okucatshangisiswe kahle / Izingxoxo zakhe ezinengqondo azizange zikholise abantu, ngoba wonke umuntu wayazi ukuthi yini eyayenzeka ngempela.

xho: ukulandela ingqondo yodwa nokungamkeli into engenakuqiqwa
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: any school of thought that overestimates the role of reason in the acquisition of knowledge / It is actually incomprehensible that people living in a so- called postmodern time still fall back into the rationalism of two centuries ago. / any school of thought that overestimates the role of reason in the acquisition of knowledge / It is actually incomprehensible that people living in a so-called postmodern time still fall back into the rationalism of two centuries ago.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: enige denkrigting wat die rol van die rede in die verwerwing van kennis oorskat / Dit is eintlik onbegryplik dat mense wat in ’n sogenaamde postmoderne tyd leef, nog terugval in die rasionalisme van twee eeue gelede.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: mohopolo ofe kapa ofe o buellang ka haholo karolo ya ho beha mabaka bakeng sa ho fumana tsebo / Ka nnete ke taba e sa utlwahaleng hore batho ba phelang nakong e bitswang kamora modenisimi ba sa ntse ba dumela mohopolong wa tokafatso wa dinako tsa makgolo a mabedi a dilemo a fetileng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: sekolo se sengwe le se sengwe sa kgopolo seo se dumelelago mošomo wa go fa lebaka mo go hwetšeng tsebo / Gabotse ga go kwešišege gore batho bao ba phelago ka seo se bitšwago nako ya ka morgao ga sebjalebjale ba sa wela morago ka go gabotse ga dipaka tše pedi tša go feta.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: tsela ya go akanya e e reng o tshwanetse wa bo o kgona go akanya tota gore o kgone go nna le kitso / Tota e bile go thata go akanya gore batho ba ba tshelang mo motlheng ono wa ditlhabologo ba sa ntse ba kgona go boela kwa morago thata jaana ba akanya ka tsela ya makgolo a mabedi a a fetileng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: noma ngusiphi sikolo semcabango lesisiveta kakhulu indzima yekucabanga ekutfolweni kwelwati / Ecinisweni akutfolakali kutsi bantfu labaphila esikhatsini lokutsiwa sesikhatsi lesedlule basabuyela ekuhlelweni kwamakhulu amabili eminyaka edlule.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshikolo tsha kuhumbulele tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tshine tsha anganyela lwo kalulaho mushumo wa kuhumbulele kha u wana nḓivho / A zwi pfesesei uri vhathu vhane vha khou tshila nga tshifhinga tshi vhidzwaho tsha nga murahu ha tsha musalauno vha kha ḓi ḓisendeka nga reshinalizimu ya miṅwaha ḓana mivhili yo fhiraho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: miehleketo yin’wana na yin’wana leyi pimanyetaka ku tlula mpimo ntirho wa nguva eka vukumi bya vutivi / Kahlekahle a swi twisiseki leswaku vanhu lava tshamaka eka nkarhi lowu vuriwaka manguvalawa va ha wela endzhaku ka vuhunguti bya malembexidzana mambirhi lama nga hundza.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: nanyana isiphi isikole somcabango esiveza indima yendima ekuzuzeni ulwazi / Empeleni akuzwisisakali bonyana abantu abaphila esikhathini okuthiwa sesikhathi esedlule basabuyela ekuhleleni kwamakhulu amabili eminyaka edlule.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: nayiphi ingcinga eethatha ngokungaphaya indima yengqiqo ekufumaneni ulwazi / Eneneni akunangqiqo ukuba abantu abaphila kwelo xesha kuthiwa lelokungabikho kwenyani engaphenjelelwa luluvo babe basabuyela ekulandeleni ingqondo yodwa nokungamkeli into engenakuqiqwa yeenkulungwane ezimbini zeminyaka eyadlulayo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: noma yimuphi umbono ocekela phansi indima yokubonisana ekutholeni ulwazi / abantu abaphila enkathini yemiphumela yesikhathi samanje basabuyela emuva ekucabangeni okunengqondo kwamakhulu amabili eminyaka edlule.

xho: yokulandela ingqondo yodwa nokungamkeli into engenakuqiqwa
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: too strongly focused on the reasonable at the expense of the spiritual / A rationalistic approach to problem solving denies the equally valid role that emotions, intuition, sensuality and imagination can play within human reasoning.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: te sterk gefokus op die redelike ten koste van die geestelike / ’n Rasionalistiese benadering tot probleemoplossing ontken die ewe geldige rol wat emosies, intuïsie, sensualiteit en verbeelding binne die menslike redenasie kan speel.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho tsepamisa haholo tabeng e utlwahalang ho feta ya bomoya / bothata e latolang seabo sa nnete seo maikutlo, monahano, maikutlo le boinahanelo bo ka bo phethang hara ho nahana ha batho.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go nepiša kudu go gii kwagala ka tahlegelo ya semoya. / Mokgwa wa go kwagala go go rarolla bothata o ganetša mošomo wan nete wa go lekana gore maikutlo, pono, dikwi le dikgopolo di ka kgatha tema mo go go fahleleng ga motho.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go tlhoma mogopolo thata mo go se se akanyediwang o tlogela sa semoya / Tsela ya go rarabolola bothata ka go bo akanyetsa thata e e latola seabe se le sone se leng botlhokwa sa gore maikutlo, nama, kutlo le mogopolo le tsone di na le seabe se segolo thata mo tseleng ya batho ya go akanya.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: wagcila ngemandla kulokufanelekile endzaweni yekwemoya / Indlela lecondzakalako yekucatulula tinkinga liphika lichaza lelilinganako lelingatsatfwa miva, umuzwa, inkhanuko nemicabango ekucabangeni kwebantfu.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: vha sedzesaho nga maanḓa kha zwi pfadzaho hu sa dzhielwi nṱha zwa muya / Kuitele kwa u pika nga khumbulo kha u tandulula thaidzo ku a hana mushumo wo khwaṱhaho une wa nga shumiwa nga vhuḓipfi, vhuḓinyanyuli, zwipfi na khumbulelo kha kuhumbulele kwa muthu.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku kongomisa hi matimba ngopfu swinene eka ku twisisa eka ku tinyiketela eka swa ximoya. / Endlelo ra swivangelo eka ku lulamisa swiphiqo ku landzula ntirho wa nkoka wo ringana leswaku switwi, vutivinkaseketelo, nyanyuko wa xirho xa rimbewu na miehleketo swi nga ha pfuna exikarhi ka ku ehleketa ka vanhu.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: wadzimelela ngokuqinile kokufanelekile ngokungcolisa okungokomoya / Indlela ezwisisakalayo yokurarulula izumraro iphika iqhaza elilinganayo elingathathwa yimizwa, umuzwa, inkanuko nemicabango ekucabangeni kwabantu.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukujolisa ngamandla kokufanelekileyo endaweni yokomoya / Indlela yokulandela ingqondo yodwa nokungamkeli into engenakuqiqwa ekusombululeni ingxaki iyayikhaba indima enyanisekileyo yokuba iimvakalelo, ukuziva, ukuthanda iziyolo zenyama kunye nengcinga zinokudlala ekucingeni komntu.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukugxila ngokunamandla emqondweni esikhundleni sokungokomoya / Indlela yokucabanga ngokunengqondo yokuxazulula izinkinga iphikisa ngokuphelele indima edlalwa imizwelo, umuzwa, ukukhanga nomcabango ekubonisaneni kwabantu.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to respond in a particular way / Students usually react positively to an enthusiastic lecturer. / to show a response to something / When the rich believe the poor will revolt, they react by trying to impose draconian restrictions.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: op ’n bepaalde manier reageer / Studente reageer gewoonlik positief op ’n entoesiastiese dosent.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho arabela ka tsela e kgethehileng / Hangata baithuti ba arabela hantle ho lektjhara e mafolofolo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go araba ka tsela ye e itšego / Baithuti gantši ba araba gabotse go mofahloši wa Lethabo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go arabela ka tsela e e rileng / Baithuti gantsi ba tsibogela motlhatlheledi yo o matlhagatlhaga ka tsela e e molemo.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kukhombisa kuphendvulo intfo letsite. / Nangabe tinjinga tikholelwa timphuya titawuvuka umbhejazana, baphendvula ngekuhlisibeta imikhawulo lematima.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u fhindula nga nḓila yo imaho ngauri / Matshudeni kanzhi a nyanyuwa zwavhuḓi kha mugudisi are na mafulufulu.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku kombisa n'wangulo eka swin'wana. / Loko van'wankumi va tshemba leswaku swisiwana swi ta va pfukela va angula hi ku ringeta ku tlhandleka swipimelo swo tika no vava swinene.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukutjengisa ipendulo yento. / Lokha abantu abanjingileko nabakholwa bona abantu abatlhagileko nazakubhenyoga, batjengisa ngokuzama ukubeka imibandela eqinileko.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubonisa ukusabela kwinto ethile. / Xa izityebi zikholwa ukuba amahlwempu aya kuvukela umbuso, zisabela ngokuzama ukubela izithintelo ezinzima.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukusabela ngendlela ethile / Ngokuvamile abafundi basabela kahle kumfundisi onomdlandla.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: action in response to something / It is evident from the students’ positive reaction that they enjoyed the lecture.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: dira sengwe e le fa o tsibogela se sengwe / Go a bonala go tswa mo tseleng e baithuti ba neng ba tsiboga ka yone gore ba ne ba itumelela thuto.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: sinyatselo uphendvula lokutsite / Kuyabonakala ngendlela lenhle yekuphendvula kwebafundzi kutsi basijabulele sifundvo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: nyito ya u fhindula kha tshithu / Zwi khagala u bva kha zwiiteo zwivhuya zwa matshudeni uri vho ḓiphiṋa nga ngudo.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: endlelo ro angula eka xin’wana / I vumbhoni ku suka eka angulo wa kahle wa machudeni lowu ma wu tsakelaka eku dyondzeni.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: isenzo sokuphendula okuthileko / Kuyabonakala ngokusabela okuhle kwabafundi bonyana bayithokozele inkulumo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: inyathelo lokuphendula entweni / Kucacile ngokuba nento abayenzayo entle abafundi ukuba basonwabele isifundo.

tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira gore sengwe se nne botoka. / Afrikaborwa e ne ya ntšhwafatsa gape tsamaiso ya yone ya thuto go tsepamisa mo dipoelong le mo mokgwatsamaisong.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kwenta intfo ibe ncono. / Iningizimu Afrika yakha kabusha inchubo yayo yetemfundvo futsi kute kutsi kungagcilwa kuphela kumiphumela, kepha nakunchubo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ita uri tshithu tshi vhe tsha khwiṋe. / Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽo khwiṋisa sisiṱeme ya pfunzo hafhu uri hu sa sedzeswe fhedzi mvelelo, hu sedzwe-vho na nyitothevhekani/kuitele.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku endla xin'wana xi va lexi antswaka. / nakambe ku tlhela ri pakanisa eka endlelo kambe ku nga ri eka mivuyelo ntsena.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza into ibe ngcono. / Isewula Afrika itjhugulule irherho layo lokufunda godu ukobana kutjhejwe ingasi kuphela imiphumela, kodwana nerherhweni ngokwalo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza into ethile ngcono. / UMzantsi Afrika uhlaziye inkqubo yayo yemfundi nokujolisa kwakhona hayi kwiziphumo kuphela, kodwa kananjalo nakwinkqubo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza into ibe ngcono. / INingizimu Afrika yaphinda yalushintsha uhlelo lwayo lwemfundo ukuze lungagxili nje kuphela ekubhekeni imiphumela, kodwa ibheke nohlelo ngokunjalo.

afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: dinge in verhouding tot ander dinge plaas, wat die absolute waarde daarvan verminder / As jy jou emosies relativeer, kan dit wees dat jy jou probleme wegpraat, hulle te lig stel of jou situasie te rooskleurig laat lyk.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho beha dintho kamanong le dintho tse ding, ketso e fokotsang boleng ba tsona bo feletseng / Haeba o amahanya maikutlo a hao, e ka nna ya ba o bebofatsa mathata a hao, o fana ka mathata a hao ka tsela e bobebe haholo kapa o etsa hore boemo ba hao bo shebahale bo le botle haholo.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go bea dilo go amantšha le dilo tše dingwe, yeo e fokotšago boleng bja bona ka moka / Ge o amantšha maikutlo a gago, e ka ba gore o tloša mathata a gago, wa aba mathata a gago bofefo goba wa dira maemo a gago gore a tshepiše.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go baya dilo go di bapisa le tse dingwe e leng selo se se dirang gore di se ka tsa tlhola di nna le boleng jo bokalo / Fa o tsaya maikutlo a gago o a bapisa le a ba bangwe, e ka tswa e le gore o bua ka mathata a gago jaaka a e seng mathata tota, o dira gore a utlwale a se makalo kgotsa o dira gore boemo jwa gago bo bonale e le go tlhaba kgobe ka mmutlwa.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kubeka tintfo macondzana naletinye tintfo, lokunciphisa linani lato leliphelele / Uma ugucula imiva yakho, kungenteka kutsi ubukhiphe bakho bumatima, utibeke kancane tinkinga takho noma wente simo sakho sibonakale simnandzi kakhulu.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u vhea zwithu maelana zwiṅwe zwithu, zwine zwa fhungudza ndeme ya vhukuma / Arali vha elanyisa vhuḓipfi, zwi nga vha zwa uri vha ambela kule zwikonḓi zwavho, vha kumedza thaidzo dzavho nga nḓila i leluwaho kana u ita uri nyimele yavho i vhonale i a zwavhuḓi.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku vekela swilo hi vuxaka eka swilo swin’wana, leswi hunguteka nkoka wa xiviri xa vona / Loko u tekela enhlokweni matitwelo ya wena, swi nga ha vula leswaku u le ku suseni ka ku tikeriwa ka wena n’wini, u hlamusela swiphiqo swa wena swinene katsongo kumbe ku endla xiyimo xa wena xi languteka xi komba xi tsakisa swinene.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubeka izinto mayelana nezinye izinto, okurhunyeza inani lazo eliphelele / nangabe uguqula imizwa yakho, kungenzeka bonyana ubukhiphe obakho ubunzima, uzibeke kancani izumraro zakho nanyana wenze ubujamo sakho sibonakale simnandi khulu.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubeka izinto enye ngokunxulumene nenye, oko kwehlisa ixabiso lazo elipheleleyo / Ukuba uthelekisa iimvakalelo zakho, kunokuba akukho mntu ukumameleyo xa uthetha ngeengxaki zakho, zibe njengezingephi iingxaki zakho okanye wenze imeko yakho ibonakale ibubunewu-newu kakhulu.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubeka izinto ngokuhlobene nezinye, okunciphisa inani lazo eliphelele / Uma uhlobanisa imizwa yakho nokuthile, kungase kube ukuthi ufihla ubunzima bakho, ubheka izinkinga zakho njengezingasho lutho noma wenza ukuthi isimo sakho sibukeke sisihle.

tsn: go fetoga ga dilo ka ntlha ya maemo a di mo go one
xho: ithiyori yokuba ulwazi nokunye zikhona ngokunxulumene nenkcubeko
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: theory that all knowledge, truth, norms and principles are relative, implicating that they can change from one group, culture or situation to another / In 1958 the poet N.P. van Wyk Louw pointed out how relativism deconstructs itself, because the theory of relativism is itself an absolute statement.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: teorie dat alle kennis, waarheid, norme en beginsels relatief is, wat impliseer dat dit van een groep, kultuur of situasie na ’n ander kan verander / In 1958 wys die digter N.P. van Wyk Louw daarop dat relativisme homself dekonstrueer, aangesien die teorie van relativisme self ’n absolute stelling is.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ditlwaelo le melao di relative, ka ho fana ka maikutlo a hore di ka fetoha ho tloha sehlopheng se seng, setsong kapa boemong h o fetela ho bo bong / Ka 1958 seroki N.P. van Wyk Louw o ile a bontsha kamoo relativisimi e iqhaqhang ka boyona, ka hobane thiori ya relativisimi ke polelo e feletseng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: maitshwaro le mekgwa di a amana, amantšhago le gore di ka fetogango tloga go sehlopha se sengwe go ya go se sengwe, setšo goba maemo go ba bangwe / Ka 1958 sereti N.P. van Wyk Louw o boletše ka moo tumelo e ke tshekatshekago ka gore teori ya tumelo ka boyona ke setatamente sa go felela.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: thuto ya gore kitso yotlhe, boammaaruri, ditlwaelo le melaometheo di ka nna tsa fetoga fa di kopana le tse dingwe, mo go rayang gore di ka nna tsa fetoga go tswa mo setlhopheng se sengwe, mo lotsong lo longwe kgotsa mo boemong jo bongwe go ya kwa go jo bongwe / Ka 1958 mmoki N.P. van Wyk Louw o ne a bontsha kafa kgopolo eno ya go fetoga ga dillo ka ntlha ya maemo a di mo go one e kgonang go iphetola ka boyone, ka gonne kgopolo eno ka boyone e itlhalosa.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono wekutsi lonkhe lwati, liciniso, tinkhambiso nemigomo kuyalingana, lokusho kutsi kungantjintja kusuka ecenjini, lisiko noma simo kuya kulesinye / Ngemnyaka we-1958 imbongi NP van Wyk Louw waveta kutsi lubumbano lutakha njani, ngoba ithiyori yelubumbano yona ngekwayo isitatimende lesiphelele.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: thyeori ya uri ndivho yoṱhe, ngoho, maitele na milayo zwi a elana, zwi sumbedzaho uri zwi a kona u shanduka u bva tshigwada tshithihi, mvelele kana nyimele u ya kha iṅwe. / Nga 1958 murendi Vho N.P. van Wyk Louw vho sumbedzisa uri reḽathivizimu I ḓifhaṱulula hani, ngauri thyeori ya reḽathivizimu yone iṋe ndi tshitatamennde tsho fhelelaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: thiyori ya leswaku vutivi hinkwabyo, ntiyiso, nkoka na milawu i maxaka, swi ringanyeta leswaku swi nga kota ku cinca ku suka eka ntlawa wun’we, ndhavuko kumbe xiyimo eka swin’wana. / Hi 1958 mutlhokovetseri N.P. van Wyk Louw u kombisile hilaha vuxaka byi vaka hakona hi vuntshwa hi byoxe hi xitatimente xa xiheri.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono wokuthi lonke ulwazi, iqiniso, izinkambiso nemigomo kuyalingana, okutjho bonyana kungatjhentjha kusuka eqenjini, isiko nanyana ubujamo kuya kesinye / Ngo-1958 imbongi uN.P. van Wyk Louw waveza bonyana ubudlelwano obuzihlanganisa nobunye buzivikela njani, ngombana ikolelo yokuthi ubudlelwano obunembile buwumqondo ophelele.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ithiyori yokuba lonke ulwazi, inyaniso, izithethe nemithetho-siseko ziyathelekiseka, okuthetha ukuba zinokutshintsha ukusuka kwiqela, inkcubeko okanye imeko enye ziye kwenye / Ngo-1958 ibongi u-N.P. van Wyk Louw wakhombisa ukuba ithiyori yokuba ulwazi nokunye zikhona ngokunxulumene nenkcubeko ingazihlalutya njani ngokwayo, kuba ithiyori yokuba ulwazi nokunye zikhona ngokunxulumene nenkcubeko ngokwayo iyingxelo epheleleyo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbono wokuthi lonke ulwazi, iqiniso, imikhuba nezimiso konke kuhlobene, okusikisela ukuthi kungase kuya ngeqembu, isiko, noma isimo sokunye. / Ngo-1958 imbongi uN.P. van Wyk Louw wabonisa indlela ukwenza izinto zihlobane kuzihlolisise, ngoba umbono wokwenza izinto zihlobane ngokwawo uyisitatimende esiphelele.

tsn: go leba dilo ka ntlha ya maemo a di mo go one
xho: ethiyori yokuba indalo yakhiwe phezu komthetho- siseko wokuba imilinganiso yesithuba nexesha iyalamana
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: according to the view that there are no abstract universal truths that apply to all peoples and cultures at all times / The view that there are no abstract universal truths that apply to all peoples and cultures at all times is relativistic.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: volgens die siening dat daar geen abstrakte universele waarhede is wat te alle tye op alle volke en kulture van toepassing is nie / Die siening dat daar nie abstrakte universele waarhede is wat te alle tye op alle volke en kulture van toepassing is nie, is relativisties.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: ho ya ka maikutlo a hore ha ho na dinnete tse akaretsang lefatshe lohle tse sebetsang ho batho bohle le ditso ka dinako tsohle / Maikutlo a hore ha ho na dinnete tse akaretsang lefatshe lohle tse sebetsang ho batho bohle le ditso ka dinako tsohle ke a relativisimi.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka kgopolo ya gore ga go na dinnete tša lefase tša kakeretšo di di amago batho ka moka ka dinako ka mokaa / Kgopolo ya gore ga go na dinnete tša lefase tša kakaretšo tšeo di amago batho le ditšo ka moka ka dinako ka moka ke ye e dumelago.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ya ka pono ya gore ga go na boammaaruri mo lobopong jo bo dirang mo bathong botlhe le ditso tsotlhe ka dinako tsotlhe / Pono ya gore ga go na boammaaruri mo lobopong jo bo dirang mo bathong botlhe le ditso ka dinako tsotlhe ke pono ya go leba dilo ka ntlha ya maemo a di mo go one.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngekwembono wekutsi awekho emaciniso laphatsekako lasebenta kubo bonkhe bantfu nemasiko ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi / emaciniso laphatsekako lasebenta kubo bonkhe bantfu nemasiko ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi ngekwemvelo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: a hu na ngoho nyangaredzi ya khumbulelwa ine ya shuma kha vhathu vhoṱhe na mvelele dzoṱhe misi yoṱhe. / nyangaredzi ya khumbulelwa ine ya shuma kha vhathu vhoṱhe na mvelele misi yoṱhe ndi u sedza kha zwa reḽathivizimu.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi ku ya hi mavonelo leswaku a ku na ntiyiso wo hetiseka emisaveni hinkwayo lowu tirhaka eka vanhu hinkwavo na midhavuko eka mikarhi hinkwayo yi nga ni vuxaka. / Vonelo ra leswaku a ku na ntiyiso wo hetiseka emisaveni hinkwayo leyi tirhisiwaka eka vanhu hinkwavo na midhavuko eka mikarhi hinkwayo yi nga ni vuxaka.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokombono wokuthi awekho amaqiniso aphathekayo angazwisisakali asebenza kibo boke abantu namasiko ngaso soke isikhathi / Umbono wokuthi awekho amaqiniso aphathekayo angazwisisakali asebenza kibo boke abantu namasiko ngaso soke isikhathi ungokwemvelo.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ngokombono wokuba akukho nyani ifanayo ithabathekisayo isebenza kubo bonke abantu kunye neenkcubeko maxa onke / Umbono wokuba akukho nyani ifanayo ithabathekisayo isebenza kubo bonke abantu kunye neenkcubeko maxa onke yeyethiyori yokuba indalo yakhiwe phezu komthetho-siseko wokuba imilinganiso yesithuba nexesha iyalamana.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuya ngombono wokuthi awekho amaqiniso wendawo yonke aqondakalayo asebenza kubo bonke abantu namasiko ngazo zonke izikhathi / Umbono wokuthi awekho amaqiniso wendawo yonke aqondakalayo asebenza kubo bonke abantu namasiko ngazo zonke izikhathi ngumbono wokuzinqumela.

tsn: Dilo tsotlhe di amana le tse dingwe
xho: ithiyori yokuba indalo yakhiwe phezu komthetho- siseko wokuba imilinganiso yesithuba nexesha iyalamana
eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: the absence of standards / We live in the dimension of relativity – we understand things because they exist in relation to other things.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: die afwesigheid van standaarde / Ons leef in die dimensie van relatiwiteit – ons verstaan dinge omdat hulle in verhouding tot ander dinge bestaan.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: bosiyo ba maemo a tekanyo / Re phela boemong ba relativiti – re utlwisisa dintho ka hobane di teng kamanong le dintho tse ding.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go hloka maemo / Re dula ka karolong ya go itshama – re kwešiša dilo ka gore di ba gona ka gor di amana le tše dingwe.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go se nang melao / Re tsela mo melaong ya gore dilo tsotlhe di amana le tse dingwe – re tlhaloganya dilo ka gonne di le teng fa di bapisiwa le tse dingwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kungabikhona kwemazinga / Siphila ebangeni lebudlelwano – siyativisisa tintfo ngoba tikhona macondzana naletinye tintfo.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u sa vha hone ha zwilinganyo / Ri tshila kha muelo wa u elana – ri pfesesa zwithu ngauri zwi hone maelana na zwiṅwe zwithu.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: xiheri xa mipimo / Hi tshama eka mpimo wa vuxaka – hi twisisa swilo hikuva swi kona eka vuxaka bya swilo swin’wana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukungabikho kwamazinga / Siphila ebangeni lobudlelwano - siyazwisisa izinto ngombana zikhona mayelana nezinye izinto.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukungabikho kwemigangatho / Siphila kwicandelo lethiyori yokuba indalo yakhiwe phezu komthetho-siseko wokuba imilinganiso yesithuba nexesha iyalamana – siyaziqonda izinto kuba zikhona ngokunxulumene nezinye izinto.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwentuleka kwezimiso / Siphila enkathini yombono wokuhlobana kwezinto okukhulu siyaqonda ukuthi izinto zikhona ngenxa yokuhlobana nezinye izinto.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: a protest against authority / On October 31, 1517, Martin Luther nailed his famous ninety-five statements to the church door in Wittenberg, which was a sign of the widespread revolt against the Church. / a protest against authority. / Martin Luther posted his famous ninety- five theses on the church door at Wittenberg on 31 October 1517, which were the signal for widespread revolt against the church. / a protest against authority. / Martin Luther posted his famous ninety-five theses on the church door at Wittenberg on 31 October 1517, which were the signal for widespread revolt against the church. / to reject authority, often violently / Jews under the leadership of the Maccabees to revolt. / to reject authority, often violently / The oppression of Antiochus caused the Jews under the leadership of the Maccabees to revolt.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: boipelaetso kgahlanong le bolaodi / Ka la 31 Mphalane, 1517, Martin Luther o ile a kgokgothela lemating la kereke dipolelo tsa hae tse tummeng tse mashome a robong a metso e mehlano Wittenberg, e leng letshwao bofetohedi ba hae bo nammeng kgahlanong le Kereke.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go gana taolo, gantši ka ntwa. / Kgatelelo ya Antiochus e hlotše MaJuta ka fase ga boetapele bja Maccabees go gwaba.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go ganena kgatlhanong le bothati. / Martin Luther o ne a baya kitsiso ya dithesise tsa gagwe tse di tumileng tse somearobonngwe-tlhano mo kgorong ya kereke ka la 31 Diphalane 1517, sengwe se e neng e le letshwao la botsuolodi jo bo anameng kgatlhanong le kereke.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: umbhikisho lomelene neligunya / Ngo-Okthoba 31, 1517, Martin Luther wabetsela titatimende takhe letidvumile letingemashumi lasishiyagalolunye nanhlanu emnyango welisontfo eWittenberg, lebekuluphawu lekuvukela liSontfo kabanti.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u gwalaba hu tshi lwiwa na muvhuso, zwi tshi anzela u vha na masungo. / Martin Luther u nambatedza thysisi yawe ya mbuno dza fuṱaheṱhanu dzi no ḓivhea kha vothi ḽa kereke ngei Wittenberg nga ḽa 31 Tshimedzi 1517 tsha vha tshiga tsha muvutshelo wa u lwa na kereke.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku landzula vufambisi, laha mikarhi yo tala ku va ka hi ndlela ya madzolonga. / Ntshikelelo wa Antiochus wu fikisile eka ku pfuxa dzolonga ra Mayuda ehansi ka vurhangeri bya Maccabees.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwala ukuthatha imilayo, esikhathini esinengi ngendlela elwako. / Igandelelo lika-Antiochus labangela bona amaJuda ngaphasi komdosiphambili wama-Maccabees ukobana alwe.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukukhaba isiphathamandla, ngamaxa amaninzi ngodushe. / Ingcinezelo ka-Antiochus yakhokelela kuvukelo lwamaJuda phantsi kobunkokeli bee- Maccabees.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuchitha labo abasemagunyeni, isikhathi esiningi lokho kwenziwa ngodlame. / Ukucindezelwa kuka-Antiochus kwaholela ekuhlubukeni kwamaJuda ngaphansi kobuholi bukaMaccabees.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: movement in the visual arts, literature and music that reached a peak in the late 18th and early 19th centuries, characterised by an increased interest in nature and the past, an emphasis on the individual's expression of emotion and imagination, an escape from reality and a revolt against existing conventions and social norms / You might for example define Romanticism as an artistic movement centrally concerned with the relationship between the self and others.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: beweging in die visuele kunste, literatuur en musiek wat in die laat 18de en vroeë 19de eeu ’n hoogtepunt bereik het, gekenmerk deur ’n toenemende belangstelling in die natuur en die verlede, die klem op die individu se uitdrukking van emosie en verbeelding, ’n ontsnapping uit die werklikheid en ’n opstand teen bestaande konvensies en sosiale norme / Jy kan die Romantiek byvoorbeeld definieer as ’n artistieke beweging wat sentraal staan in die verhouding tussen die self en ander.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: nako eo tshekamelo e kgolo mesebetsing ya bonono, dibuka le mmino e neng e fihla sehlohlolong dilemong tsa lekgolo la bo18 le mathwasong a bo19, e neng e na le thahasello e eketsehileng tlhahong le nakong e fetileng, kgatiso pontshong ya maikutlo a motho le boinahanelo, ho phonyoha maemo a sebele le bofetohedi kgahlanong le mekgwa le ditlwaelo tse neng di le teng bathong / Ka mohlala o ka hlalosa Romantisimi jwalo ka nako ya bonono e neng e amehileng haholoholo ka kamano pakeng tsa motho boyena le ba bang.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: bonwa, dingwlwa le mmino tšeo di lego sehlweng pakeng ya 18 le 19, e hlalošwa ka kgahlego ye e oketšegilego ka tlhago le mafelelo, kgatelelo go tšweletšo ya maikutlo le kgopolo, go tšhabela nnete le khuduego kgahlanong le dikopano le melao ya leago / O ka go fa mohlala wa hlaloša Kamano bjalo ka mosepelo wa bokgabo wo o lebeletšego kamano gare ga motho le ba bangwe.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: mokgatlho mongwe mo go tsa botaki, dibuka le mmino o o neng wa fitlhelela setlhoa sa one kwa bofelong jwa lekgolo la bo18 le masimologo a lekgolo la bo19 la dingwaga, o o neng o na le kgatlhego e kgolo mo dilong tsa tlholego le dilo tsa bogologolo, go gatelelwa tsela e motho a bontshang maikutlo ka yone, a tswa mo botshelong jwa rona jwa mmatota mme a kgaogana le tsela e go tshelwang ka yone gone jaanong / Ka sekai o ka nna wa tlhalosa Dilo tsa Marato e le dilo tsa botaki moo motho a akantseng fela ka kamano ya gagwe le ba bangwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: inhlangano kubuciko bekubona, tembhalo nemculo lefinyelele esicongweni ekupheleni kweminyakalikhulu ye-18 kanye nasekucaleni kwemnyakalikhulu we- 19, lokubonakale ngekukhula kwenshisakalo kundalo nelimuva, kugcizelela ekuveteni kwamunye imiva nekucabanga, kubalekela liciniso nekulwa netingucuko letikhona nemigomo yasenhlalweni / Sibonelo ungahle uchaze i- Romantisizimu njengenhlangano yetebuciko lesemkhatsini letsintsekile ngebudlelwane lobusemkhatsini wakho nalabanye.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: mitsukunyeo kha vhutsila ha u vhona, maṅwalwa na muzika zwo swikaho kha gumofulu mafheloni a ṅwaha ḓana wa vhu 18 na wa vhu 19, zwo ṱalulwa nga dzangalelo ḽo engedzeaho kha mupo na zwa kale, khwaṱhisedzo kha mubulo wa muthu wa vhuḓipfi na khumbulelo, u ponya kha ngoho na mugwalabo wa u lwa na thendelano dzi re hone na milayo ya matshilisano / Vha nga sa tsumbo ṱalutshedza Romethisizimu sa mitsukunyeo wa vhutsila une wa vha wo sedzesa vhushaka vhukati ha iwe muṋe na vhaṅwe.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: Mfambamfambo eka vutshila byo voniwa, matsalwa na vuyimbeleri lebyi fikaka emaninginingini eka khale ka vu-18 na le ku sunguleni ka malembedzana ya malembe ya vu- 19, ya tihlawulekisa hi ku engeteleriwa ka ku tsakela hi ntumbuluko na le ka nkarhi lowu nga hundza, ntiyisiso eka nhlamuselo ya munhu ya matitwelo na miehleketo, ku baleka ku suka eka xiviri na mpfilumpfilu ehenhla ka tinhlengeletano leti nga kona na milawu leyi vekiwaka hi vanhu. / Xikombiso, u nga ha hlamusela hi swa Rirhandzu tanihi mfambamfambo hi vutshila kusuhi hi mayelana ni vuxaka exikarhi ka vumina na van’wana.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukunyakaza kwezobukghwari obubukwayo, iincwadi kanye nomculo okwafinyelela inani eliphakeme ngasekupheleni kwekhulu le-18 nasekuqaleni kwekhulu le-19, okwabonakala ngentshisekelo eyandayo emveleni nasesikhathini esedlule, ukugcizelelwa ekuvezeni komuntu imizwa nokucabanga kwakhe, ukweqa iqiniso ukuvukela imihlangano ekhona kanye nezinkambiso zomphakathi / Ungahle wenze isibonelo ngokuhlathulula ubuRomaism njengenhlangano yobukghwari ethinteka khulu ebudlelwaneni obuphakathi kwakho nabanye.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: intshukumo kubugcisa obubonwayo, uncwadi nomculo owafikelela encotsheni phaya ekupheleni kwenkulungwane ye-18 kunye nasekuqaleni kweye-19, ephawulwa ngumdla onyukileyo kwezendalo kunye nokwangaphambili, ugxininiso lusekuvakaliseni komntu iimvakalelo neengcingane, ukuzama ukubaleka koko kuyinyani kunye nokuvukela iimvumelwano nezithethe zasekuhlaleni esele zikhona. / Umzekelo ungachaza ukuziYekelela kwingcinga ezingaphaya kwezinto ezikhoyo njengentshukumo yobugcisa ephathelene kakhulu nobudlelwane phakathi kwayo nezinye.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: utshinto kwezobuciko ezibonakalayo, emibhalweni ngisho nasemculweni olwaba khona ekuqaleni kwekhulu le-18 no-19 leminyaka, olwabonisa ukwanda kakhulu ezithakazelweni zemvelo nesikhathi esedlule, ukugxila ekuboniseni komuntu imizwa nokucatshangwayo, ukubalekela ukuphila kwangempela kanye nokuvukela endleleni izinto ezenziwa ngayo ezikhona kakade nendlela yokuphila / Ngokwesibonelo ungase uchaze i- Romanticisim ngokuthi ushintsho olukhathazeke kakhulu ngobudlelwano phakathi komuntu ngamunye nabanye.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: reasoning process consisting of two premises from which a logical derivation follows / Aristotle’s analysis of the syllogism demonstrated how to reason by combining thoughts in trains of deductive reasoning.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: proses van redenering wat bestaan uit twee uitgangspunte waaruit ’n logiese afleiding volg / Aristoteles se analise van die sillogisme demonstreer hoe om deduktief te redeneer deur gedagtes aaneen te skakel.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshebetso ya ho nahana e nang le mabaka a mabedi a ho nkuwang sephetho se utlwahalang / Tlhophollo ya Aristotle ya silojisimi e bontsha kamoo ho nahana ka ho kopanya mehopolo ho fumana lebaka la sephetho.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshepetšo ya go fahlela ya go ba le dikgopolo tše pedi moo mothopo wa go kwala o latelago / Tshekatsheko ya Aristotle ya selotšisemo e bontšha gore o ka fahlela bjang ka go kopanya dikgopolo ka tatelano ya go fahlela ga go kwagala.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: mokgwa wa go akanya o o reng go na le dintlha di le pedi tse re ka dirang tshwetso e e utlwalang ka tsone / Tsela ya ga Aristotle ya go akanyetsa dilo e ne e bontsha gore o ka dira jang go akanyetsa kgang ka go kopanya dikakanyo tse di farologaneng o bo o fitlhelela tshwetso e e akanyeditsweng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: inchubo yekucabanga lenetindzawo letimbili lapho kulandzela khona kutfolakala lokunengcondvo / Luhlatiyo lwa-Aristotle lwesilojizimu lukhombise kucabanga ngekuhlanganisa imicondvo kuluchungechunge lwekucabanga kwekukhipha.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: maitele a u humbula ane a vha na fhethu huvhili hune ha vha vhubvo hu pfadzaho / Musaukanyo wa Vho Aristotle wa saiḽodzhizimu wo sumbedza uri hu humbulwa hani nga u ṱanganyisa mihumbulo kha zwidimela na khumbulelo dzi pfadzaho.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: a combination of separate ideas from various sources with an indication of how they differ and how they are similar / Students do not realise the importance of a proper synthesis of viewpoints from various sources. / creative merging of unrelated elements into a new whole / Facebook is a synthesis between technological facilitation and the human need for communication.

sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: motswako wa mehopolo e fapaneng e tswang mehloding ka ho bontsha kamoo e fapanang le kamoo e dumellanang ka teng. / Baithuti ha ba lemohe bohlokwa ba kgokahano e nepahetseng ya dintlha tse tswang mehloding e fapaneng.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go kopanya ga go ithomela ga dielemente tša go amane ka palomoka ye mpsha / Facebook ke tlemaganyo gare ga kgokagano ya theknolotši le dinyakwa tša batho go kgokagana.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go kopanya dilo tse pedi tse di sa amaneng go di dira se le sengwe / Facebook e kopantse thekenoloji le go tlhoka ga motho go bua le ba bangwe.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuhlanganiswa lokwakhako kwemalunga langakahlobani abe ngulokusha / i-Facebook ingumhlanganisi emkhatsini wekwenta malula tebuchwepheshe nesidzingo semuntfu sekuchumana.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ṱanganyiswa ha vhusiki ha zwipiḓa zwi sa elani zwa vha tshithu tshiswa tsho fhelelaho / Facebook ndi mbumbekanyo vhukati ha u leludzwa ha thekhinoḽodzhi na ṱhoḓea dza vhathu u itela vhudavhidzani.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: vutshila lebyi nga yelaniki bya swiphemu hinkwaswo leswintshwa / Feyisibuku i nkatsakanyo exikarhi ka nkondletelo wa swa thekinoloji na xilaveko xa vanhu xa mbulavurisano.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ihlanganisela yemibono ehlukeneko kuneminye eminengi ebuya kwezinye iincwadi ngokutjengisa indlela ezihluka ngayo nokobana zivumelana njani. / Abafundi abakulemuki ukuqakatheka kokucabangisisa kuhle imibono ebuya kumibono yeencwadi ezihlukeneko.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuhlanganisa ngoyilo imiba enganxulumananga ine kokutsha okupheleleyo / I-Facebook ludibaniso phakathi kokwenza lula ubuchwepheshe kunye nemfuno yomntu yonxibelelwano.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ingxubevange yemiqondo eyahlukene evela kwimithombo eyahlukene nebonisa ukuthi leyo miqondo yehlukana kanjani futhi yefana kanjani. / Abafundi abakuqondi ukubaluleka kokuhlangana kahle kwemibono yabo evela kwimithombo eyahlukene lapho bethumela umsebenzi wabo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: to bring about an artificial composition / In building a theory, the researcher synthesises different facts and ideas into a coherent whole.

nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go hlola sebopego sa maitirelo / Ka go aga teori, monyakišiši o tšweletša dintlha tša go fapana le dikgopolo ka go palomoka ya dikgopolo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: go dira selo ka tsela ya maitirelo / Fa mmatlisisi a aga kgopolo nngwe, o kopanya dintlha tse di farologaneng le dikgopolo go di dira selo se le sengwe se se kopaneng.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuletsa kwakhiwa kwekufakelwa / Ekwakhweni ithiyori, umcwaningi uhlanganisa emaphuzu nemicondvo lehlukile ibe ngulokuphelele lokucacile.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u ḓisa mbumbeo ya mafanedza / vhumbekanya mbuno dzo fhambanaho na mihumbulo zwa vha tshithu tshithihi tsho fhelelaho.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku humelerisa hi mayelana ni xivumbeko lexi nga riki xa ntumbuluko / Eku akeni ka thiyori, mulavisisi u katsa timhaka to hambana na mavonelo eka hinkwabyo vuxaka byo tiya.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukuletha ukwenziwa kokufakelwa / Ekwakheni ithiyori, umrhubhululi uhlanganisa amaqiniso nemibono eyehlukene ibe yinto ekhambisanako.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza ulwakhiwo olwenziwe ngokungokokwendalo / Kwithiyori yokwakha, umphandi udibanisa imiba nezimvo ezahlukeneyo zibe kokunye okunamatheleneyo.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza isici esingesona esingokoqoba / Embonweni wokwakha, umncwaningi uxuba amaqiniso ahlukahlukene nemibono kube into eyodwa ehambisanayo.

eng_pos_or_descriptor_info: group of objects or parts that work togethe according to an ordering principle / Even in the times of the ancient Greeks, r accountants used complicated systems to keep accounting records. / group of objects or parts that work together according to an ordering principle / Even in the times of the ancient Greeks, accountants used complicated systems to keep accounting records.
afr_pos_or_descriptor_info: groep voorwerpe of onderdele wat volgens ’n ordeningsbeginsel saamwerk / Selfs in die tye van die antieke Grieke het rekenmeesters ingewikkelde stelsels gebruik om hulle boeke te laat klop.
sot_pos_or_descriptor_info: sehlopha sa dintho kapa dikarolo tse sebetsang hammoho ho latela molao o laolang / Esita le dinakong tsa MaGerike a boholoholo, baboloki ba dibuka tsa ditjhelete ba ne ba sebedisa disistimi tse rarahaneng tsa ho boloka ditlaleho tsa ditjhelete.
nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: sehlopha sa dilo goba dikarolo tšeo di šomago mmogo go ya ka motheo wa go beakanya / Le ka nako ya Magerika a bogologolo, dibalamatlotlo di šomišitše mananeo a go raragana go boloka direkoto tša sešupatlotlo.
tsn_pos_or_descriptor_info: setlhopha sa dilo kgotsa dikarolo tsa sone tse di dirang mmogo go ya ka molaomotheo mongwe / Tota le ka nako ya Gerika wa bogologolo, baithutadipalo ba ne ba dirisa ditsamaiso tse di raraaneng go boloka direkoto tsa bone tsa diakhaonto.
ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: incumbi yetintfo noma tincenye letisebenta kanye ngekwekuhleleka kwemgomo / Ngisho nangetikhatsi temaGrika akudzala, bosotibalo basebentisa tinchubo letiphitsene kuGcinwa emarekhodi abo ekubala .
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: tshigwada tsha zwithu kana zwipiḓa zwine zwa shuma zwoṱhe u ya nga ha mulayo wa u tevhekanya / Na nga zwifhinga zwa Vhagerika vha tshikale, akhaunthenthi vho vha vha tshi shumisa sisiṱeme dzi konḓaho u vhea rekhodo dza mbalelano.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ntlawa wa swilo kumbe swiphemu leswi tirhaka kun’we hi ku ya ka ku xaxameta milawu / Hambi emikarhini ya Magiriki va khale, van’watinkota a va tirhisa endlelo ro tika ku hlayisa tirhekhodo ta swa vukonta.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: isiqhema lezinto nanyana izingcenye ezisebenza ndawonye ngokomthetho woku-oda / Ngitjho nangezikhathi zamaGrigi asendulo, abatloli beemali babesebenzisa iindlela ezihllangahlangeneko ukugcina amarekhodi ezimali.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: iqela lezinto okanye amalungu asebenza kunye ngokomthetho-siseko wokuyalela / Nangawo na amaxesha amaGrike akudala, abacwangcisi mali babesebenzisa iinkqubo ezinzima ukugcina iirekhodi zocwangciso-mali.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: iqoqo lezinto noma izingxenye ezisebenzisana ngokuvumelana nesimiso sokuhleleka / Ngisho nasesikhathini samaGreki, izazi zezibalo zasebenzisa izinhlelo eziyinkimbinkimbi ukugcina amarekhodi wezibalo.

tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: hi endlelo ro humelerisa, hi ku ya hi pulani / Mikarhi hinkwayo swa phyuphyisa ku vona tirhiselo ro kumeka eka inthanete ra mhaka ya mavonelo.

zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: kuya ngohlelo noma umbono / USusan wethula umboniso wakhe ngendlela ehlelekile ukuze wonke umuntu alandele lokhu akushoyo.

nso_pos_or_descriptor_info: go bea ka lenaneong / Mošomo wa morutiši gantši e tla ba go thuša bana go beakanya tsebo yeo ba šetšego ba na le yona goba bohlatse bjoo b abo kgoboketšago, le go re nepo e dule e bonagala.

ssw_pos_or_descriptor_info: kubeka kunchubo / Umsebenti wathishela kutawuhlala kukusita bantfwana besikolo ekuhleleni Lwati lebanalo noma bufakazi labangabubutsa, nekugcina kugcila lokucacile.
ven_pos_or_descriptor_info: u vhea kha sisiṱeme / Mushumo wa mudededzi kanzhi u ḓo vha u thusa vhagudi ita uri nḓivho ine vha vha nayo i vhe kha sisiṱeme kana vhuṱanzi vhune vha vhu kuvhanganya, na u dzula zwe vha sedza zwi khagala.
tso_pos_or_descriptor_info: ku veka endzeni ka sisiteme / Ntirho wa mudyondzisi mikarhi yo tala wu ta pfuna vadyondzi ku lulamisa vutivi lebyi ana se va nga byona kumbe vumbhoni lebyi va nga byi hlengeleta, ku kota ku kongomisa hi ku tenga.
nbl_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubeka ngaphakathi kohlelo / Umsebenzi kathitjha uvamise ukuba wukusiza abafundi bakwazi ukuhlela ulwazi abanalo vele nanyana ubufakazi abaluqoqayo, nokugcina ukudzimelela kuqaqile.
xho_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukubeka kwinkqubo / Umsebenzi katitshala ixesha elininzi kukunceda abafundi babe ngendlela emisiweyo ulwazi olo sebenalo okanye ubungqina ababuqokelelayo, kunye nokugcina ujoliso lucacile.
zul_pos_or_descriptor_info: ukwenza uhlelo / Ngokuvamile umsebenzi kathisha kuzoba ukusiza abafundi bahlele ulwazi asebenalo kakade noma ubufakazi ababuqoqayo, futhi benze ukugxila kucace.
